description.hltext_display: HBO to air 'Pee-wee Herman Show'
description.content:
NEW YORK, Dec. 22 (UPI) -- HBO is taping a performance of "The Pee-wee Herman Show" on Broadway with plans to air it next year, The Wrap reported.
The stage comedy will premiere on the pay cable network three decades after actor Paul Reubens introduced the character in an HBO special, The Wrap noted Tuesday.
Reubens played the character onstage, in the films "Pee-wee's Big Adventure" and "Big Top Pee-wee," and on the children's television show "Pee-wee's Playhouse," but he stopped appearing as his alter ego after being arrested for indecent exposure in Florida in 1991.
He revived the child-like character with the too-short trousers and high-pitched voice, and starred in "The Pee-wee Herman Show" at the Nokia Theater in Los Angeles in January and February. The show opened on Broadway in October and is expected to run through Jan. 2.

description.hltext_display: PM Netanyahu Decides to Officially Appeal to US President Obama for Jonathan Pollards Release
description.content:
PM Netanyahu Decides to Officially Appeal to US President Obama for Jonathan
Pollard's Release
(Communicated by the Prime Minister's Media Adviser)
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu today (Tuesday), 21.12.10, decided to
accede to Jonathan Pollard's personal request and will, in the coming days,
officially and publicly appeal to US President Barack Obama regarding
Pollard's release.
The decision to accede to the request, which Prime Minister Netanyahu
received in writing, in a letter brought by Esther Pollard, was made
following a series of talks and contacts which the Prime Minister and his
representatives have held on the issue in recent months with senior US
administration officials.
It will be recalled that Prime Minister Netanyahu – during his previous term
in office – recognized Jonathan Pollard as an Israeli agent and granted him
Israeli citizenship. Later, he personally visited with him in prison. He
has raised the issue with US Presidents during both of his terms as Prime
Minister.
Prime Minister Netanyahu said that, "I intend to continue acting with
determination for Pollard's release, both because of the State of Israel's
moral obligation to him and so that he might live with his family and
restore himself to health after his prolonged incarceration."

event_or_fact.property: I intend to continue acting with determination for Pollard's release, both because of the State of Israel's moral obligation to him and so that he might live with his family and restore himself to health after his prolonged incarceration.

description.hltext_display: РФПЛ нужна своя телекомпания
description.content:
РФПЛ не прекращала переговоров с Первым каналом о показе матчей российской премьер-лиги в новом сезоне
ТЕКСТ: Сергей Алексеев
ФОТО: infovoronezh.ru
Российская футбольная премьер-лига опровергла сообщение о разрыве отношений с Первым каналом. Переговоры о продаже прав на показ матчей премьер-лиги в новом сезоне продолжаются. Одновременно с этим вице-президент РФС Сергей Капков разъяснил «Газете.Ru», в чем именно заключаются его претензии к показу российского футбола на российском телевидении.
В понедельник на сайте Российской футбольной премьер-лиги (РФПЛ) было опубликовано официальное сообщение о том, что появившаяся ранее в прессе информация о разрыве отношений премьер-лиги с Первым каналом не соответствует действительности. «Стороны выполнили друг перед другом все обязательства в уходящем году и ведут переговоры о продолжении сотрудничества», – говорится в заявлении.
«Мы не прекращали партнерства, так как это наши товарищи, и мы разговариваем на одном языке. Если даже не получится продолжить сотрудничество с Первым каналом в том объеме, который был ранее, то мы рассматриваем другие варианты сотрудничества. В том числе и с Первым каналом. Дверь ни для кого еще не закрыта, мы еще ведем переговоры, активным участником которых является телекомпания «НТВ-Плюс», которые ведет президент РФПЛ Сергей Прядкин. Нас устраивает качество работы с Первым каналом», – заявил «Газете.Ru» исполнительный директор РФПЛ Сергей Чебан.
В пресс-службе Первого канала от комментариев по ходу переговоров с РФПЛ воздержались, заявив, что пока в данном вопросе не наступит полная ясность, говорить о показе футбола этим телеканалом не имеет смысла. Корреспондент «Газеты.Ru» обратился к вице-президенту РФС и председателю правления фонда «Национальная академия футбола» Сергею Капкову с просьбой разъяснить суть его претензий к показу российского футбола российскими телекомпаниями, которые и послужили причиной появления сообщений о разрыве отношений между РФПЛ и Первым каналом.
Как сообщил Капков, все переговоры по показу футбола в новом сезоне ведет руководство РФПЛ, и на данный момент есть решение отдать все права на показ матчей премьер-лиги «НТВ-Плюс», чтобы затем этот телеканал, если конечно согласится, совместно с лигой отдал от 30 до 50 матчей какому-то центральному каналу для представления футбола в открытом доступе.
На данный момент наибольший интерес к этим 30-50 матчам проявляет ВГТРК.
У многих специалистов и простых болельщиков в последнее время были нарекания к показу футбола на телевидении. Согласен с общим мнением и Сергей Капков, который не видит большой разницы как в качестве комментаторов, так и качестве самой «картинки» между Первым каналом и «НТВ-Плюс». «Везде довольно условное качество. Те матчи, которые транслировал Первый канал, выглядели лучше остальных, так как это были центральные игры туров, или игры, которые проходили в Москве и Санкт-Петербурге. Только за счет этого эти матчи выглядели красиво. Те же матчи, что «НТВ-Плюс» показывало из провинции, где на стадионы приходит менее трети человек от их общей вместимости, и где нет спортивной интриги, было смотреть не интересно», – заявил вице-президент РФС.
По мнению Капкова, для улучшения качества показа футбола необходимо наличие профессиональных комментариев ко всем матчам, а также наличие более высокого качества показываемой «картинки», для чего необходимо использовать большее количество камер при съемках игр. Требует изменения и графическое оформление матчей РФПЛ. А также наличие постоянных аналитических передач перед каждым туром и после него,чтобы телеканалы поддерживали спортивную интригу.
В решении этого вопроса может принимать участие не только РФПЛ, продающая права на показ матчей, но и РФС, который передал РФПЛ право на ведение этих переговоров.
По словам Капкова, давно пора выработать общий стандарт показа футбола на телевидении. «В Москве и Санкт-Петербурге работает большее количество камер и телекомментаторов, хотя качество их комментариев зачастую оставляет желать лучшего. Когда же «НТВ-Плюс» показывает матчи из провинции, то смотреть их неинтересно, потому что за счет меньшего количества камер картинка хуже. Есть же единые стандарты показа матчей Лиги чемпионов или ведущих европейских чемпионатов», – выразил свое мнение Капков, предложивший два варианта решения этой проблемы.
Первым вариантом является создание собственной телекомпании РФПЛ, которая будет не только самостоятельно показывать футбольные матчи, но и самостоятельно растить телекомментаторов, которые будут делать качественный телевизионный продукт, чтобы продавать его потом другим телекомпаниям.
Это подразумевает начальные инвестиции в данный проект.
Либо выбрать в качестве постоянно партнера какой-либо телеканал, которому будут предъявлены не только определенные финансовые требования, но и технические требования к показу футбола. «Все прекрасно понимают, что матчи из провинции «НТВ-Плюс» будет снимать за счет ресурсов ВГТРК, поэтому картинка из Москвы и из регионов будет продолжать отличаться по своему качеству. Выезд московского «Спартака», допустим, в Нижний Новгород будет показан в формате, который станет неуважением к болельщикам этой команды. Нужно уважать болельщиков, и показывать им качественную картинку. Нужно заставить телеканал, которому будут переданы права на показ матчей, сделать приложение к контракту, в котором прописать единый телевизионный формат показа футбола, количество камер для работы на каждом матче, право РФПЛ отбирать телекомментаторов и согласовывать их. Как согласовываются судьи на каждый матч. Возможно, этим комментаторам премьер-лига будет сообщать какую-то дополнительную, «инсайдерскую» информацию, чтобы зрителям было интересно слушать их комментарии», – высказал свои предложения Сергей Капков.
На данный момент все права на продажу прав показа футбольных матчей российской премьер-лиги находятся у РФПЛ, которые были ей переданы на ближайший сезон на последнем исполкоме РФС. Вместе с тем авторитет президента РФС Сергея Фурсенко позволяет влиять на решение РФПЛ.
Новости российского футбола можно посмотреть на странице чемпионата России.
Тeги: чемпионат России по футболу, телеправа на футбол, показ футбола на телевидении, РФПЛ, РФС, НТВ-Плюс

description.hltext_display: Blood Sugar Foods And Herbs That Decreases Diabetes Posted By: austin07
description.content:
Diabetes is disease which has become very common these days. It is also known as diabetes mellitus. It is caused by accumulation of glucose or sugar in blood. Generally the carbohydrates we eat are converted in to glucose. The glucose is burnt down by a hormone called insulin secreted by our pancreas.
The burnt glucose enters the body cells, supplying the body with energy. When this process does not take place properly, glucose builds up in the blood stream leading to diabetes. Diabetes is of three major types: Type 1 diabetes is caused due to insufficient supply of insulin, Type 2 diabetes is caused due to cells becoming insulin-resistant and Gestational diabetes attacks women during pregnancy.
Foods and Supplements that Decreases Blood Sugar Levels
Cinnamon:
Studies are finding that cinnamon reduces blood sugar levels naturally when taken daily. If you completely love cinnamon you can shower the recommended six grams of cinnamon on your food throughout the day to attain the desired effect. If you are not that big a fan of cinnamon there is another substitute cinnamon capsules. This gives you the suggested cinnamon dose all in one tidy capsule.
Chromium:
To help your body's cells counter correctly to insulin you can use Chromium. There are researches that are finding that people with diabetes have lower Chromium levels than people who do not suffer from diabetes. But here question arises that how do you add Chromium to your diet? Well it is a trace mineral so the best stake it to take a Chromium Picolinate dietary supplement.
Zinc:
The mineral Zinc plays a enormous role in your body's production and storage of insulin. It is now being brought to light that people with diabetes mellitus have a Zinc deficiency. You can go about raising the Zinc in your diet by either taking a supplement or by eating foods that are high in Zinc value. This would include of lamb, oysters, pecans, almonds (badaam), chicken and sardines.
Herbs can control diabetes
Cinnamon has insulin like properties-
It also reduces blood cholesterol and triglycerides which are also important factors for Type 2 Diabetes. A half teaspoon of cinnamon powder daily in diet can reduce the blood glucose level.
Bitter gourd-
Bitter gourd has some compounds that help in lowering blood sugar levels. Taking its juice early morning in empty stomach can give desired results.
Onion-
Onion has a compound that is capable of blocking the breakdown of insulin and also stimulates the pancreas in insulin production. It gives good results whether eaten in raw or boiled form.
Fenugreek seeds-
Fenugreek seeds widely used as spice in different Indian recipes can lower the blood sugar levels. A teaspoonful of the powdered seeds if taken with a glass of water daily helps in the treatment.
Asian ginseng is usually used by the treat Diabetes. This herb stimulates the pancreas to produce insulin and increase the number of insulin receptors. These help in lowering the blood glucose levels.
Blueberry-
Blueberry leaves has given remarkable results in ridding the body of excess blood glucose. Soaking few leaves in hot water and drinking 3 cups a day can produce good results.
Gingko biloba-
Gingko biloba is a popular herb to treat various diseases. Extract of its leaves may have good results in treating diabetes at the early stage.

description.hltext_display: Pa. woman charged with faking diagnosis for money
description.content:
HARRISBURG, Pa.—Pennsylvania officials say a woman faked having cancer to collect nearly $100,000 in insurance money.
The state attorney general's office says 50-year-old Deborah Brown of Canonsburg was charged Monday with altering hospital paperwork to make it appear she had cancer and filing fraudulent claims for treatment she never got.
Also, officials allege Brown submitted fraudulent documentation to her insurer from 2006 to 2008 for cancer treatments for her husband. But officials say her husband had surgery for prostate cancer in November 2006 and received no further treatments.
Brown is charged with insurance fraud, theft by deception and tampering with records. It wasn't clear whether Brown had an attorney and a phone number for her could not immediately be found.

event_or_fact.property: altering hospital paperwork to make it appear she had cancer

description.hltext_display: Why Mizuno F-60 Fairway Wood Is Great?
description.content:
Mizuno's forgings have always been considered the very best mass produced forged clubs in the world. Only hand forged clubs form the likes of Honma, and other Japanese Sword Makers have been known to match them in feel. Their fairway metals, and drivers have faces that have gone through similar processes. This gives them unbeatable feel at impact. Why?
The Mizuno F-60 fairway woods produce an effortlessly powerful ball flight, attainable through the combination of an ultra-lightweight titanium crown and stainless steel body. Previously difficult to bond, the titanium crown is affixed to the high-tech precision stainless steel face and body through a patented new brazing process. The brazing process which uses a 3rd material to bond the two metals allows weight to be positioned very low in the clubhead.
The technology replaces Mizuno's previous graphite crown / steel body combination which required a heavier bonding material. Mizuno engineers found that by using this lightweight titanium crown, which is only 3% of the total weight of the club head, they could strategically reposition the COG to enable players to launch the ball with greater ease and increased control. In addition, the Mizuno F-60 fairway woods feature Mizuno's CORTECH face design, which utilizes three multi-thickness areas to ensure uniform face deflection and a thin responsive face to generate high initial ball velocity for increased distance and consistency.
What with rescue clubs and hybrids being so popular right now, fairway woods have taken a bit of a back seat when it comes to great designing over the last couple of years. So Mizuno have really stepped up their game with the Mizuno F-60 fairway wood for 2008. Where in the past carbon crowns have been the favoured way of freeing up useless weight to relocate, Mizuno reckon their new Mizuno F60 titanium crown is the bees knees! It only weighs 3% of the entire golf club head weight which means more weight can be put to better use making the club more stable on off centre hits. This is by far one of the best feeling fairway woods out there. It is also one of Mizuno's longest ever. Once again, however, as with the irons, you buy a Mizuno Club for "feel" first and foremost. They just have it for some reason. It's nice to see that their woods have started to come on line w/the feel that their irons are so well known for. It's almost mind blowing in the sense that 6 or 7 year ago I wouldn't give you a hill of beans for a Mizuno Driver, much less a Fairway Metal. Finally, the last two generations of their drivers have begun to catch on;and now after all this time, the same can be said for their Fairway Metals. If you're a fan of traditionally shaped fairway woods you'll really enjoy these as their wide subtly curved pear shaped golf club heads are perfect for drilling shots off the deck. Tell you, the Mizuno F-60 fairway wood heads are also nicely shaped to match both Mizuno's new drivers and sound more pleasing than previous models due to the stainless steel and titanium materials used. Just to top off the whole design Mizuno techies have also worked hard to create a sole which is hittable from any type of lie and reduces turfdrag so maximum power is transferred to the ball everytime. Overall, I'd have to say that Mizuno has really hit a lot of important hot buttons with this one. It is a very good club that feels great, gets respectable distance, and is about as workable as a fairway metal gets. But if you've ever really read Hogan seriously, the shot he talks about at length is his 4 wood from the fairway bunker.

description.hltext_display: Warm Russian, Indian ties outlive Cold War
description.content:
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - Russian President Dmitry Medvedev's warm reception in India, including wrapping up a stealth fighter jets deal potentially worth $35 billion, dispels Russian fears its former Cold War ally has turned to the West.
Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, who has in the space of a few months hosted all the leaders of the permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, said "Russia is a time-tested friend of India" at the start of Medvedev's two-day trip on Tuesday.
Russia has been India's close economic and political partner since Soviet days, and monopolized India's defense market for decades, but India wants to reduce its reliance on one country to reflect its growing influence on the world stage.
"President Dmitry Medvedev has done well to dispel the growing misperception that Indo-Russian relations have lost their salience amidst India's new warmth with the U.S. and the West," the Indian Express newspaper said in an editorial on Wednesday.
Medvedev will spend his last day in India touring the Taj Mahal in Agra, meeting students in Mumbai and touring "Bollywood" film studios.
Russia joined the United States and France in offering support for India for a permanent seat at an expanded Security Council to reflect the growing might of emerging economies.
India says a seat on the Security Council would reflect the G20 nation's importance as its $1.3 trillion economy helps spur global growth and its government exerts more and more influence over issues from Doha trade to climate talks.
India's growing ties with the United States, underscored by a landmark civil nuclear deal, has made Russia ill at ease.
India, the second fastest-growing major economy in the world after China, is one of the top arms importers and plans to spend about $50 billion on defense in the next few years to upgrade its aging Soviet-era arsenal, mainly to counter a perceived China threat.
World leaders, accompanied by top executives, are hungry to secure a slice of India's economy, expected to grow at near-double digit rates for the next decade, making it one of the five largest economies in the world by 2020.
BARGAINING POWER
Russia has long seen India as a counterweight to China and a potential ally in Afghanistan.
"The strategic, economic and political importance of Russia can not be overstated," said Bhaskar Roy, a New Delhi-based strategic affairs columnist.
"India needs Russia for its energy requirements, to counter-balance China, for retaining influence in Afghanistan once the Western troops leave, for influence in energy-rich Central Asia, and generally for support and backing at all major international fora. India needs Russia to realize its ambitions, global goals," Roy said.
No details were given as to the size of the potential aircraft deal between Russia and India, but both countries have in the past talked about producing 250-300 such fighters over 10 years, unofficially said to be worth about $35 billion.
"That in turn has enormously increased India's bargaining power with the U.S. and European suppliers of advanced conventional weapons," the Indian Express said.
Boeing's F/A-18 Super Hornet, France's Dassault Rafale, Lockheed Martin Corp's F-16, Russia's MiG-35, Sweden's Saab JAS-39 Gripen and the Eurofighter Typhoon are competing for a separate order from India for 126 fighter jets, valued at about $10.4 billion.
India and Russia agreed to open talks on building a third and fourth reactors for a nuclear power plant in India's southern state of Tamil Nadu, but failed to sign a firm deal because of Russian concerns over a recently passed liabilities bill.
(Additional reporting Krittivas Mukherjee; Editing by Robert Birsel)
(c) Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. Check for restrictions at: http://about.reuters.com/fulllegal.asp

event_or_fact.property: India needs Russia for its energy requirements, to counter-balance China, for retaining influence in Afghanistan once the Western troops leave, for influence in energy-rich Central Asia, and generally for support and backing at all major international for
The strategic, economic and political importance of Russia can not be overstated

description.hltext_display: اعتراض مکتوب وزارت خارجه آذربایجان به اتحادیه اروپا و لهستان تقدیم شد
description.content:
آذربایجان، باکو، 30 آذر، خبرگزاری «ترند»، خبرنگار: م. علی اف/ به گزارش خبرگزاری «ترند» از واحد مطبوعاتی وزارت خارجه آذربایجان، بخاطر سفر غیر قانونی توماس پوربان گزارشگر لهستانی پارلمان اروپا در امور ارمنستان به اراضی اشغالی آذربایجان، در روز 21 دسامبر رولان کوبیا رئیس نمایندگی اتحادیه اروپا در باکو و میخائیل لابندا سفیر لهستان در آذربایجان به وزارت خارجه آذربایجان احضار شده اند. پیام اعهتراض رسمی وزارت خارجه آذربایجان به آنها تقدیم شده است.
در این نامه اعتراض وزارت خارجه آذربایجان با اشاره به سفر غیر قانونی توماس پوربان به اراضی اشغالی آذربایجان بیان شده که وی بخاطر این اقدام به تمامیت ارضی آذربایجان بی احترامی کرده و لذا در فهرست افراد نامطلوب در آذربایجان قرار گرفته است. وزارت خارجه آذربایجان در این پیام از اتحادیه اروپا و لهستان خواستار اجرای اقداماتی برای جلوگیری اینگونه اقدامات تحریک کننده جهت کاهش شدت وخامت منطقه شده است.

description.hltext_display: US teen birth rate at all-time low, economy cited
description.content:
Chart shows the birth rate for girls ages 15 to 19-years-old from 1940 to 2009.
ATLANTA—The U.S. teen birth rate in 2009 fell to its lowest point in almost 70 years of record-keeping—a decline that stunned experts who believe it's partly due to the recession.
The birth rate for teenagers fell to 39 births per 1,000 girls, ages 15 through 19, according to a government report released Tuesday. It was a 6 percent decline from the previous year, and the lowest since health officials started tracking the rate in 1940.
Experts say the recent recession—from December 2007 to June 2009—was a major factor driving down births overall, and there's good reason to think it affected would-be teen mothers.
"I'm not suggesting that teens are examining futures of 401(k)s or how the market is doing," said Sarah Brown, chief executive of the National Campaign to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy.
"But I think they are living in families that experience that stress. They are living next door to families that lost their jobs. ... The recession has touched us all," Brown said.
Teenage moms, who account for about 10 percent of the nation's births, are not unique. The total number of births also has been dropping, as have birth rates among all women except those 40 and older.
For comparison look to the peak year of teen births—1957. There were about 96 births per 1,000 teen girls that year, but it was a different era, when women married younger, said Stephanie Ventura, a co-author of the report issued by the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The CDC births report is based on a review of most birth certificates for 2009.
Overall, about 4.1 million babies were born in 2009, down almost 3 percent from 2008. It's the second consecutive drop in births, which had been on the rise since 2000.
The trend may continue: A preliminary count of U.S. births through the first six months of this year suggests a continuing drop, CDC officials said.
A decline in immigration to the United States, blamed on the weak job market, is another factor cited for the lower birth rate. A large proportion of immigrants are Hispanic, and Hispanics accounted for nearly 1 in 4 births in 2009. The birth rate among Hispanic teens is the highest of any ethnic group with 70 births per 1,000 girls in 2009. However, that rate, too, was down from the previous year.
Other findings in the new report include:
— The cesarean delivery rate rose yet again, to about 33 percent of births. The C-section rate has been rising every year since 1996.
— The pre-term birth rate, for infants delivered at less than 37 weeks of pregnancy, dropped for the third straight year to about 12 percent of all births. It had been generally increasing since the early 1980s.
— Birth rates were down from 2008 in almost every age group of women of childbearing. The birth rate for women in their early 20s plummeted 7 percent, the largest decline for that age group since 1973.
The one exception was women older then 40—a group that may be more concerned with declining fertility than the economy. The birth rate for women ages 40-44 was up 3 percent from 2008, to about 10 births per 1,000 women. That's the highest rate for that group since 1967.
The drop in birth rates was less pronounced in women in their 30s than women in their 20s, noted Carol Hogue, an Emory University professor of maternal and child health and epidemiology.
"If women feel they are up against a biological clock, that is a counterbalance to 'I can't afford to have a baby right now,'" she said.
CDC officials said the most striking change was the decline among teens, and some experts credited popular culture as playing a role. The issue of teen pregnancy got a lot of attention through Bristol Palin, the unmarried daughter of former GOP vice presidential candidate Sarah Palin. Bristol Palin had a baby boy in December 2008. Teen pregnancy is also cast in a harsh light by "16 and Pregnant," a popular MTV reality show which first aired in 2009 and chronicles the difficulties teen moms face.
Gabriela Briela, 17, a high school senior in Chicago, believes TV shows like that one are a big factor. She also credits sex education that goes beyond abstinence and advises birth control for teens who have sex.
Briela recalled one of her eighth grade teachers telling students to write down how they would tell their parents if they became pregnant.
"It's something that I still keep with me. It forced you to really ponder that thought" and think about the consequences, she said.
For decades, health educators have been emphasizing the hazards of teen pregnancy, including higher dropout rates and other problems for these young mothers and their kids. The cumulative effect of such campaigns may have played an important role in pushing down the teen birth rate, Ventura said.
But experts acknowledge they are speculating. Hogue noted a lack of key data for 2009 that would answer questions about whether teens are having the same amount of sex, whether their use of contraception changed, or whether they were getting pregnant just as often as in earlier years but were having more abortions.
Abortion could be a factor, said Jaqui Johnson, 17, a senior in Des Moines, Iowa.
Because teens generally don't plan pregnancies, she doubts the recession as an explanation. When financial considerations do creep into a teen's conversation about pregnancy, it most likely involves a bleak assessment of their ability to support a child, Johnson said.
"If girls do get pregnant, they're probably looking more into getting abortions" than teens may have in years past, she said.
None of the experts was able to explain an uptick in the teen birth rate in 2006 and 2007.
Also, there's reason to rein in celebration of the 2009 numbers. The U.S. teen birth rate continues to be far higher than that of 16 other developed countries, according to a 2007 United Nations comparison that Brown cited.
Still, news of the large decline was a stunning and exciting surprise for advocates, Brown noted. "This is like a Christmas present," she said.
———
AP Medical Writer Lindsey Tanner in Chicago contributed to this report.
———
Online:
The CDC report: http://www.cdc.gov/nchs

description.hltext_display: Эвертон не нарушил традицию
description.content:
Динияр Билялетдинов сыграл в концовке около 20 минут и отметился эпизодом перед самым финальным свистком, когда отлично держал мяч и вынудил сфолить Коло Туре, удаленного в итоге с поля.
Матч в Манчестере оказался одним из немногих, что не были перенесены в 18-м туре из-за снегопада. Потому, учитывая, что конкуренты не играли, «горожане» получили отличный шанс возглавить турнирную таблицу. Для Роберто Манчини, который отмечал годовщину своего пребывания во главе «Сити», это стало бы неплохим подарком. Однако «Эвертон» в последние годы удачно играет против «горожан», и традиция не нарушилась.
Накануне подвел итальянца капитан команды Карлос Тевес, в открытую высказавший намерение покинуть клуб, за что, как было объявлено, лишен повязки. Так что главным наказанием для строптивого аргентинца стал отказ его продавать, хотя вроде бы был не против его вернуть «Манчестер Юнайтед». Только исключить Тевеса из состава Манчини не мог - с 10 голами он лидирует среди бомбардиров команды. Да и оказалось, что Тевес по-прежнему капитан: у аргентинца с руководством клуба произошло примирение, хотя матч он провел крайне неудачно. По сравнению с последним матчем с «Вест Хэмом» Тевес заменил оставшегося в запасе Жо, Коларов играл вместо Боатенга, а Милнер - дисквалифицированного Де Йонга.
У «Эвертона», которому очки были необходимы в борьбе за выживание, отсутствовал из-за травмы лидер полузащиты Стивен Пинар, которого, увы, заменил не Динияр Билялетдинов, а Леон Осман.
Тогда как Виктор Аничебе вышел вместо Луи Саа. Не смогли принять участие в матче также Хейтинга и Артета. Матч для хозяев начался с конфуза - уже на 4-й минуте ливерпульцы открыли счет. Все началось с забегания по правому флангу Лейтона Бэйнса, мяч попал на противоположный край Коулмэну, и после короткого навеса Тим Кэхилл переправил мяч в сетку - при полном попустительстве защитников Коло Туре и Компани. Невысокий австралиец забил очередной гол со «второго этажа».
«Мансити» выглядел явно не проснувшимся, гости чувствовали себя на Городском стадионе уверенно, и лишь на 11-й минуте подопечным Манчини удалось создать первый голевой момент, но Давид Сильва в ворота не попал. Когда же показалось, что «Сити» выровнял игру, «Эвертон» с удивительной легкостью забил второй мяч. Бэйнс совершил очередной забег по флангу, сыграл в «стенку» с Кэхиллом и красивым обводящим ударом послал мяч в нижний угол.
В довершение всех бед хозяев в борьбе с Кэхиллом получил травму головы (австралиец переусердствовал в использовании локтей) Пабло Сабалета. Показалось, что аргентинец поле покинет, но Сабалета с перевязанной головой остался на поле и на 27-й минуте совершил проход по флангу, но к его прострелу Тевес чуть не успел. Вот только контратака «Эвертона» вышла куда острее, но свой выпад точным ударом Осман завершить не сумел.
Последняя треть тайма прошла уже при подавляющем преимуществе «Манчестера», в одной из атак хозяева четырежды пробили по воротам Ховарда, но каждый раз мяч блокировали защитники.
Завершилась же первая половина встречи разбитым лицом у Фила Невилла - в верховой борьбе с Яя Туре. Невилл игру тоже продолжил, зато Сабалета продолжил играть… в чужой футболке с 60-м номером без фамилии - своя была уже окровавлена. Манчини тем временем на правый фланг выпустил Адама Джонсона вместо Милнера, «Сити» продолжал владеть мячом, вот только взломать насыщенную оборону гостей не удавалось. Дальние удары успеха не приносили (обычно они попадали в защитников, и лишь Коларову несколько раз удавалось пробить опасно), а с навесами в штрафную защитники «Эвертона» легко справлялись.
Помог «Сити» Виктор Аничебе, который в течение пяти минут получил две желтые карточки и поле покинул.
Сначала нигериец врезался в голкипера Джо Харта, а затем «срубил» в центре поля несчастного Сабалету. А затем в дело вмешался случай, когда «горожане» провели неплохую атаку правым флангом, и после удара Яя Туре мяч переправил в свои ворота Джэгилка. А на 78-й минуте обязан был забивать Балотелли, который, правда, находился в офсайде, но, перебросив мяч через Ховарда, попал в штангу. А Ховард затем помешал добить мяч в ворота Тевесу.
Дэвид Мойес тут же выпустил на поле Билялетдинова, который минут за 20 отведенного ему времени в игру практически не вступал, занимаясь разве что прессингом на своем левом фланге. А Тим Ховард тем временем стал героем матча, парировав дальний удар Яя Туре, попытку Давида Сильвы забить в ближний угол и «выстрел» в упор Тевеса, проведшего невыразительный матч. А завершился матч отличной игрой Билялетдинова, который отобрал мяч у Тевеса, обыграл нескольких соперников и был сбит Коло Туре, заработавшим на россиянине свою вторую в матче желтую карточку.
«Газета.Ru» вела онлайн-трансляцию матча «Манчестер Сити» – «Эвертон».
Другие новости премьер-лиги, Кубка лиги, а также Кубка и Суперкубка, подробности матчей и положение команд в турнирной таблице можно посмотреть на странице чемпионата Англии.
Тeги: чемпионат Англии по футболу, Динияр Билялетдинов, Карлос Тевес, «Манчестер Сити»
— 21.12.10 01:05 —
«Манчестер Сити» проиграл на своем поле «Эвертону» в матче чемпионата Англии по футболу
ОТПРАВИТЬ:
Добавить в избранное
Карлос Тевес желает вернуться в «Манчестер Юнайтед», однако «манкунианцы» не горят желанием видеть в своих рядах игрока,
В центральном матче 18-го тура английской премьер-лиги, а, возможно, и первого круга, «Челси» на «Стэмфорд Бридж» примет
Место уволенного из «Блэкберна» Сэма Эллардайса может занять Диего Армандо Марадона. Владелица клуба, глава индийской

description.hltext_display: I'm a better bowler when I'm sledging: Siddle
description.author: IBNLive.com editor@ibnonline.com
description.content:
Melbourne: Australia paceman Peter Siddle was unapologetic for his tirade at Matt Prior after dismissing the England wicketkeeper in the third Test in Perth and described sledging as 'good fun' enjoyed by both the Ashes rivals.
Siddle sprayed invective at Prior after bowling him for 12, prompting the wicketkeeper to fire back a few choice words of his own before trudging off the field.
Prior vented his anger in a newspaper column on Tuesday: "There are not many boxing matches when a guy knocks someone out and then kicks him when while he's on the floor," he wrote.
But Siddle described the episode as "part of the game."
"It's always going to be there, we fight hard in the field and the emotions come out. It's always around and no doubt going to be around in the future as well," he told reporters at a luxury hotel in Melbourne on Wednesday.
"I think that's part of my game anyway. When I play my best that's what I'm doing anyway. Sometimes it comes off and sometimes it doesn't, in this case it has.
"It's just both teams going hard at it. It's good fun out there - they're at us, we're at them and it makes the game a bit more lively and no doubt the spectators like to see it."
Australia's pacemen skittled England for 187 and 123 in a stunning turnaround in form to clinch a series-levelling victory at Perth after managing only six wickets for 1,137 runs in their previous two innings in Adelaide and Brisbane.
The five-Test series is tied at 1-1 but Australia have all the momentum as they head into the fourth Test in Melbourne, which starts on December 26.
The 26-year-old Siddle, a fiery red-head from country Victoria, managed only one wicket in Perth, where Mitchell Johnson and fellow quick Ryan Harris took 18, but said he was happy enough scoring the verbal points over England.
"I enjoy having some fun with the batters and it's just the way I like to play my cricket, so if it helps the other boys get the job done, I'm happy to do it," he said.
Australia's selectors are likely to persist with the four-pronged pace attack at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, where the wicket is expected to favour their seamers.
Only captain Ricky Ponting remains a doubt after breaking his little finger in a catch attempt during Jonathon Trott's dismissal in the second innings at Perth.
Siddle was bullish about Ponting's recovery and said the Tasmanian should be fit for selection.
"It's looking good, he's come over here confident, and he said he's holding the bat fine and all that type of thing.
"It doesn't matter how sore you are or how injured you are, I don't think you ever want to miss a Boxing Day Test, so I think everyone will definitely be 100 percent fit for this one."

description.hltext_display: 'วิกิลีกส์' หรือ 'เฟซบุ๊ก' เว็บไหนอันตรายกว่ากัน?
description.content: บางครั้งทั้งวิกิลีกส์และเฟซบุ๊กก็กลายเป็นช่องอันตรายที่ผู้คนจำนวนมากถูกขโมยความลับส่วนตัว...เมื่อวันที่ 22 ธ.ค. สำนักข่าวฟ็อกซ์นิวส์ ได้เผยแพร่บทความกล่าวถึง� ัยของ 2 เว็บไซต์เครือข่ายสังคมออนไลน์ชื่อดังอย่าง วิกิลีกส์ และเฟซบุ๊ก ว่า ปัจจุบันอินเทอร์เน็ตนับว่าเป็นแหล่งฐานข้อมูลหลักที่มีขนาดกว้าง� ข้อมูลจำนวนมหาศาลถูกนำมาเผยแพร่ไว้บนสารบบ โดย 2 เว็บไซต์เครือข่ายสังคมออนไลน์ ที่มีการเปิดเผยข้อมูลส่วนบุคคลมากที่สุด ได้แก่ 'วิกิลีกส์' กับ 'เฟซบุ๊ก'วิกิลีกส์ ก่อตั้งโดย จูเลียน แอสเซนจ์ จะมุ่งแฉเอกสารลับของทางราชการและบริษัทขนาดใหญ่ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นการคอรัปชันในหมู่ผู้นำประเทศ เรื่องฉาวโฉ่ และเรื่องลวงโลกของรัฐบาล ข้อดีของวิกิลีกส์ก็คือการกระตุ้นให้รัฐบาลรับผิดชอบต่อปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้น ส่วนเฟซบุ๊ก ก่อตั้งโดย มาร์ค ซัคเคอร์เบิร์ก นั้นจะมุ่งเน้นให้ผู้คนติดต่อ และร่วมแบ่งปันเรื่องราวของกันและกันแต่ปัญหาหลักคือเฟซบุ๊กได้บรรจุข้อมูลส่วนบุคคลของผู้คนเป็นจำนวนมาก จึงเป็นเรื่องง่ายดายที่นักการตลาดจะใช้เฟซบุ๊กเป็นช่องทางสำรวจกลุ่มลูกค้าเป้าหมาย หรือเป็นช่องทางสำหรับผู้ไม่พึงประสงค์ที่คอยแสวงหาประโยชน์จากการขโมยความลับส่วนตัวของคุณ เพราะมีหลายคนเคยถูกไล่ออกจากที่ทำงาน เนื่องจากพวกเขาโพสต์ข้อความบางอย่างบนเฟซบุ๊กมาแล้ว และยังมีอีกจำนวนมากที่เคยถูกโจรกรรมความลับส่วนตัวหากลองย้อนถามว่า ระหว่างวิกิลีกส์ ที่แฉข้อมูลลับขององค์กรระดับบน หรือว่าเฟซบุ๊กที่เปิดเผยข้อมูลส่วนบุคคลของคนธรรมดาทั่วๆ ไป อย่างไหนจะเป็นอันตรายต่อการถูกโจรกรรมข้อมูลลับของผู้คนมากกว่ากัน ความแตกต่างอยู่ที่ว่า สำหรับหน่วยงานรัฐบาลนั้น เมื่อถูกโจมตีก็พอจะใช้อำนาจรัฐปกป้องตนเอง หรือกดดันองค์กรต่างๆ ได้ แต่สำหรับผู้คนธรรมดาเดินดินทั่วไป กลับไม่ได้รับอนุญาตให้ทราบจากทางเว็บไซต์เลยว่า ข้อมูลส่วนตัวของพวกเขาที่ถูกบันทึกไว้ในเฟซบุ๊กนั้น จะแอบถูกนำไปใช้เพื่อเอามาทำร้ายพวกเขาใน� ายหลังหรือไม่.

description.hltext_display: Alderman Resigns due to Cannabis ...
description.content:
Alderman Resigns due to Cannabis Lobby
THE HAGUE, 21/12/10 - Alderman Jos Wolterink of Oost Gelre municipality has resigned. He turned out to be chairman of a foundation that runs a cannabis cafe.
Wolterink announced his resignation yesterday. His own VVD party had no confidence in him any more. Other parties also found the two functions irreconcilable.
Wolterink was until this month chairman of the Jemig de Pemig Mozes Kriebel foundation. This organisation is the owner of a cannabis cafe ('coffee shop') in Almelo.
There was to have been a council debate on Wolterink's job on the side today, but this has been dropped due to his resignation.

description.hltext_display: عضو پارلمان آذربایجان: باید قانونی در مورد اعلام کردن سفر کنندگان به سرزمین های اشغالی آذربایجان بعنوان عناصر نامطلوب تصویب گردد
description.content:
آذربایجان، باکو، 30 آذر، خبرگزاری «ترند»، خبرنگار: مِ. علی اف/
قنیره پاشایوا، عضو مجلس ملی آذربایجان روز سه شنبه در جلسه پارلمان گفت، باید قانونی در مورد اعلام کردن افرادی که بدون اجازه دولت آذربایجان به سرزمین های اشغالی سفر می کنند، بعنوان عناصر نامطلوب تصویب گردد.
وی افزود: «این قانون باید نه تنها شامل سیاستمداران، بلکه فرهنگیان نیز باشد».
به گفته عضو مجلس ملی، مهم اینکه پیام ارسالی به رئیس پارلمان اروپا در ارتباط با توماش پوریبو همچنین به تمامی نمایندگان پارلمان اروپا فرستاده شود. این پیام اعتراض بایستی بطور جداگانه به رئیس و اعضای پارلمان لهستان فرستاده شود.
خانم پاشایوا همه سازمانهای لابی آذربایجان را به ارسال پیام اعتراض به پارلمانهای کشورهای اروپایی در مورد توماش پوریبو فرا خواند.
به گزارش رسانه های ارمنستانی، توماش پوریبو، نماینده پارلمان اروپا و گزارشگر ارشد در امور ارمنستان از 19 دسامبر در سفر بسر می برد و با مقامات این جمهوری خودخوانده دیدار و مسایل مربوط به حل مناقشه قره باغ، اوضاع منطقه و روابط دوجانبه را مذاکره می کند.
مناقشه بین دو کشور قفقاز جنوبی - ارمنستان و آذربایجان در سال 1988 بعلت ادعای ارضی ارمنستان به خاک آذربایجان آغاز شده است. در پی حملات ارمنستان به آذربایجان از سال 1993 بیست درصد از سرزمینهای متعلق به آذربایجان، یعنی همراه با 7 شهر و ناحیه دیگر اطراف آن همچنان تحت اشغال ارتش ارمنستان میباشد. در سال 1994 طرفین به پیمان آتش بس دست یافتند. از آن زمان نیز گروه مینسک سازمان امنیت و همکاری اروپا با ریاست مشترک روسیه، فرانسه و ایالات متحده آمریکا در مسئله حل صلح آمیز مناقشه میانجیگری می کنند که تاکنون فعالیتهای آنها هیچ نتیجه ای نداشته است.
تابحال چهار قطعنامه صادره از سوی شورای امنیت سازمان ملل متحد مبنی بر آزادی اراضی اشغالی آذربایجان نیز اجرا نشده است.

description.hltext_display: Double blow for Celtic as Gary Hooper suffers suspected broken leg and more points are dropped at home to Kilmarnock
description.content:
CELTIC were dealt a savage title blow last night when they lost top scorer Gary Hooper to a feared broken leg and ankle ligament damage as they spilled another two points at home to Kilmarnock.
A late Thomas Rogne goal salvaged a draw - Celtic's third in a row at Parkhead - but the loss of Hooper, potentially for months, is more damaging than the two dropped points.
The £2 million striker, who has scored 11 times this term, will have a scan to assess the damage caused by an accidental clash with Killie's Frazer Wright but Hoops boss Neil Lennon fears the worst.
Lennon admitted he will now step up his efforts to sign another striker in next month's transfer window.
He said: "It looks like ankle ligament damage but the early prognosis isn't good. There is a worry about the fibula as well but I don't want to sound too doom and gloom about it.
"We hope it's not a break. He'll be scanned in the morning but it's a huge blow because he's the top scorer .
"I think if Gary had been on the pitch a bit longer the scoreline would have been different.
"It's looking like he will be out of the Old Firm match but I wouldn't like to call it just yet. The guy has wrapped his foot round Gary and his ankle has just gone. It has twisted and the ligaments have been stretched.
"We were probably looking at going into the market for a striker anyway but that reinforces it."
Lennon was annoyed at the loss of another two points but insisted his team played well enough to win at a canter. In the end, though, they needed Rogne's header to cancel out Conor Sammon's 15th goal of the season.
The Celtic gaffer added: "I don't think a lot went wrong apart from failing to take our gilt-edged chances.
"We played as well as we have in a while and our attacking play was very good. At times we lacked a bit of composure with our finishing and we should have been out of sight at half-time.
"The opposition are always going to get a chance or two and we lost a poor goal.
"But the least we deserved was a point. I can't criticise the players too much.
"We played with width and verve and put umpteen crosses in the box but were let down by people missing easy chances.
"We were wasteful and we can't keep dropping points at home. It's going to cost us.
"I think you can win the league with a performance like that as long as you put the ball in the net.
"We should have been four or five up but we weren't and that's football. Three draws at home is a concern obviously. We have gone a goal down but showed great resilience to come back and get the goal.
"I will take more positives out of that performance than I have done for a while.
"When you drop points at home it's always an opportunity missed. I'm not angry, I'm annoyed. I thought we played well and got the tactics right."

event_or_fact.property: It looks like ankle ligament damage but the early prognosis isn't good.

description.hltext_display: The almanac
description.content:
the 356th day of 2010 with nine to follow.
The moon is waning. The morning stars are Venus and Mercury. The evening stars are Jupiter, Uranus, Saturn, Mars and Neptune.
Those born on this date are under the sign of Capricorn. They include Nobel Peace Prize laureate Frank Kellogg in 1856; opera composer Giacomo Puccini in 1858; former Philadelphia Athletics' Manager Connie Mack, the "Dean of Baseball," in 1862; former first lady Claudia "Lady Bird" Johnson, wife of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson, in 1912; TV game show host Gene Rayburn in 1917; actors Barbara Billingsley in 1915 and Hector Elizondo in 1936 (age 74); baseball Hall of Fame member Steve Carlton in 1944 (age 66); TV news anchor Diane Sawyer in 1945 (age 65); Robin Gibb (age 61) and twin brother Maurice Gibb in 1949, members of the Bee Gees pop group; and actor Ralph Fiennes in 1962 (age 48).
On this date in history:
In 1785, the American Continental Navy fleet was organized, consisting of two frigates, two brigs and three schooners. Sailors were paid $8 a month.
In 1864, after his Civil War march across Georgia, Union Gen. William T. Sherman sent U.S. President Abraham Lincoln this message: "I beg to present you as a Christmas present the city of Savannah."
In 1894, French Capt. Alfred Dreyfus was convicted of treason by a military court-martial on flimsy evidence in a highly irregular trial and sentenced to life in prison for his alleged crime of passing military secrets to the Germans.
In 1944, ordered to surrender by Nazi troops who had his unit trapped during the Battle of the Bulge, Gen. Anthony McAuliffe of the U.S. 101st Airborne Division replied with one word: "Nuts!"
In 1956, the first gorilla to be born in captivity arrived into the world at the Columbus Zoo in Ohio.
In 1971, the U.N. General Assembly chose Austrian diplomat Kurt Waldheim to lead the United Nations.
In 1972, 5,000 people died when a series of earthquakes left the Nicaraguan capital of Managua in ruins.
In 1984, "subway vigilante" Bernard Goetz shot four would-be hold-up men on a New York City subway. He ended up serving eight months in prison for carrying an illegal weapon but was cleared of assault and attempted murder charges.
In 1986, political dissident and Nobel laureate Andrei Sakharov and his wife, Yelena Bonner, were allowed to return to Moscow after seven years of internal exile.
In 1989, Romanian President Nicolae Ceausescu, the last hard-line communist holdout against East Bloc reforms, fell from power in the face of continuing massive demonstrations.
In 1992, all 158 people aboard a Libyan Boeing 727 died when the jetliner crashed, apparently following an in-flight collision with a military plane.
In 1993, the daughter of Cuban President Fidel Castro was granted political asylum in the United States.
Also in 1993, South Africa's Parliament gave a strong endorsement to an interim constitution that ended centuries of white-minority rule.
In 1994, Italy's Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi resigned after seven months in office, following corruption charges against him.
In 1997, members of a pro-government militia attacked the village of Chenalh, Mexico, killing 45 people, including a number of children.
In 2001, American Airlines passengers and attendants overpowered a man trying to light a match to detonate powerful explosives hidden in his sneakers on a flight from Paris to Miami.
In 2004, 13 U.S. soldiers and nine others were killed in a suicide bomber attack on a U.S. military dining hall near Mosul, Iraq.
In 2005, Wal-Mart was ordered to pay more than 100,000 California employees $172 million for depriving them of breaks to eat.
In 2006, rape charges against three former members of the Duke University lacrosse team were dropped after the alleged victim said she couldn't be sure she had been raped.
In 2007, the U.S. Air Force reported finding major structural flaws in eight models of its F-15 fighter jets, grounding some U.S. air defense capabilities.
Also in 2007, 2 million children in Iraq faced malnutrition, lack of education and threats of disease and violence, the U.N. Children's Fund said in a report.
In 2008, a federal jury in New Jersey convicted five Muslim men of plotting to attack soldiers at Fort Dix, a plot prosecutors say was inspired by al-Qaida. The defendants were acquitted of attempted murder.
Also in 2008, an earthen retraining wall ruptured at a Kingston, Tenn., power plant, allowing 5.4 million cubic yards of coal and sludge to spill from a storage pond, blocking roads and rail lines, polluting 500 acres of land and contaminating the Emory River.
In 2009, Iranian security forces and anti-government protesters clashed in the holy city of Qom at the funeral of a founder of the Islamic revolution 30 years earlier. Grand Ayatollah Hussein Ali Montazeri, who died at 87, became a prominent critic of June's disputed presidential voting that re-elected President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
A thought for the day: James Dewar has been quoted as saying: "Minds are like parachutes. They only function when they are open."

event_or_fact.property: Minds are like parachutes.; They only function when they are open.

description.hltext_display: พระอาการประชวร พระองค์โสมฯ ทรงตัว ไม่มีพระปรอท
description.content: แถลงการณ์สำนักพระราชวังฉบับที่ ๒ เผย (ไข้) ผลการตรวจพระโลหิตไม่พบเชื้อไข้หวัดใหญ่ ...เมื่อวันที่ 22 ธ.ค. แถลงการณ์สำนักพระราชวัง เรื่อง พระเจ้าวรวงศ์เธอ พระองค์เจ้าโสมสวลี พระวรราชาทินัดดามาตุ เสด็จไปประทับ ณ โรงพยาบาลจุฬาลงกรณ์ ส� ากาชาดไทย ฉบับที่ 2 ความว่า ตามที่สำนักพระราชวังได้ออกแถลงการณ์เรื่อง พระเจ้าวรวงศ์เธอ พระองค์เจ้าโสมสวลี พระวรราชาทินัดดามาตุ ประชวรด้วยพระโรคปอดบวม และเสด็จไปประทับรักษาพระอาการ ณ โรงพยาบาลจุฬาลงกรณ์ ส� ากาชาดไทย นั้นวันนี้ คณะแพทย์ผู้ถวายการรักษารายงานว่า พระอาการทั่วไปทรงตัว ไม่มีพระปรอท (ไข้) ผลการตรวจพระโลหิตไม่พบเชื้อไข้หวัดใหญ่ แต่พบว่ามีการติดเชื้อในกระแสพระโลหิต และ� าวะน้ำตาลในกระแสพระโลหิตขึ้นสูง ซึ่งคณะแพทย์ฯ ได้ถวายการรักษาด้วยพระโอสถปฏิชีวนะ และพระโอสถควบคุมระดับน้ำตาลต่อไปจึงประกาศมาเพื่อทราบโดยทั่วกันสำนักพระราชวัง.

description.hltext_display: NORTH EAST MEP URGES US TO BE SAFETY SAVVY
description.content:
More research needs to be done into the use of some chemicals found in toys – that’s according to a North East MEP.
2 years ago a stricter toy safety law was passed by the European Union.
Most people would associate dangerous toys as being ones with small parts or sharp edges.
But there have also been concerns about the chemicals used in plastics and other materials.
Fiona Hall says new toys must be checked and double checked.
Fiona Hall says when it comes to children's toys in particular, making sure the CE mark is there should be a first check.

description.hltext_display: Brazil: Fast-food chains must show calorie counts
description.content:
RIO DE JANEIRO—Brazil's fast-food chains have six months to start giving consumers calorie counts and nutritional information about their burgers, fries and milkshakes.
The new data are required under the terms of an agreement reached between the federal government and 60 chains.
New data from the government's IBGE statistics bureau show the Brazilian diet is changing rapidly. Brazilians are eating less rice and beans—the traditional meal—and more high-calorie processed foods and sugary sodas.
Outgoing Minister of Health Jose Gomes Temporao warned President-elect Dilma Rousseff that Brazil could reach U.S.-levels of obesity by 2022.
The agreement was announced Tuesday.
American legislators approved a similar measure as part of a national health-care reform this year, giving U.S. chains a year to comply.

event_or_fact.property: Brazil could reach U.S.-levels of obesity by 2022.

description.hltext_display: Кливленд услышал Джаз
description.content:
Для Андрея Кириленко нынешний сезон – определяющий. У него завершается контракт с «Ютой Джаз», и агент российского баскетболиста должен будет приложить немало усилий, чтобы трудоустроить своего клиента. Ведь на роль Джона Стоктона и Карла Мэллоуна в «Джаз» Кириленко не потянул. Хотя в каждом матче старается принести максимальную пользу своей команде.
В Кливленде джазмены одержали уверенную победу (101:90).
Вклад Кириленко, который провел на площадке почти 33 минуты, составил 6 очков, 4 передачи и 5 подборов.
Самым результативным в составе «Юты» был защитник Си Джей Майлс, записавший в свой актив 22 очка.
Центральный матч дня состоялся в Майами. Лидер регулярного чемпионата принимал «Даллас», идущий на 3-м месте в Западной конференции. В упорном поединке верх взяли гости (98:96). Самым результативным в составе «Маверикс» был, конечно, Дирк Новицки, набравший 26 очков.
Немец затмил лидера «Хит» Леброна Джеймса, который ограничился 19-ю очками и 10-ю подборами.
В этом матче прервалась победная серия «Майами», составившая 12 матчей.
Главным событием прошедшей недели в НБА стал трехсторонний обмен, затеянный руководством «Орландо». Четверо «волшебников» отправились в Вашингтон и Финикс, а взамен удалось заполучить Гилберта Аринаса из «Уизардз» и Джейсона Ричардсона с Хидайетом Туркоглу из «Санз».
Мнения баскетбольных аналитиков относительно этого обмена разошлись. Одни посчитали, что с новобранцами «Орландо» в одночасье превратился в едва ли не главного претендента на победу в сезоне, другие обращают внимание на неспособность всех троих отрабатывать в защите.
Результат матча в Атланте подтверждает опасения скептиков.
Местные «Ястребы» уверенно разобрались с гостями из Флориды (91:81). Никто из трех новичков «Мэджик» не внес свои имена в летопись героев тура. У «Атланты» отличился центровой Эл Хорфорд, на счету которого «дабл-дабл»: 24 очка и 11 подборов. Под щитами хорошо отработал Дуайт Ховард. На счету центрового «Орландо» 20 подборов и 19 очков.
Из остальных матчей, состоявшихся этой ночью, выделим победу «Индианы», в составе которой отличился набравший 27 очков Денни Грейнджер, над «Нью-Орлеаном» (94:93) и успех «Сан-Антонио» в домашнем матче с «Финиксом» (118:110). Для «Сперз» эта победа стала девятой подряд.
НБА официально стала владельцем «Нью-Орлеана» после того, как совет управляющих утвердил покупку, сообщает официальный сайт лиги. Руководить клубом будет тандем назначенного администратора Джэка Сперлинга и президента клуба Хью Уэбера.
Новости и результаты можно посмотреть на странице НБА.
Тeги: НБА, Юта Джаз, Орландо Мэджик, Даллас Маверикс, Майами Хит, Андрей Кириленко, Дирк Новицки, Леброн Джеймс
— 21.12.10 09:53 —
«Юта» с Андреем Кириленко одержала победу на выезде
ОТПРАВИТЬ:

Присутствие Марии Шараповой вдохновило «Нью-Джерси» на победу над «Атлантой». «Бостон» выиграл в 13-й раз подряд, победив
12 очков Андрея Кириленко помогли «Юте» обыграть «Милуоки», реабилитировавшись за безвольное поражение от «Нью-Орлеана».
Андрей Кириленко не сумел помочь «Юте» в гостях обыграть «Нью-Орлеан», набрав всего семь очков за

description.hltext_display: Νέος διάπλους τουρκικής κορβέτας στα χωρικά μας ύδατα
description.author: editors@naftemporiki.gr (Η ΝΑΥΤΕΜΠΟΡΙΚΗ ON LIN
description.content:
Όπως έγινε γνωστό από το ΓΕΕΘΑ η τουρκική κορβέτα «Bodrum» ενώ βρισκόταν το βράδυ της Τρίτης, 21 Δεκεμβρίου, σε διεθνή ύδατα στο βορειοανατολικό Αιγαίο, ακολουθώντας νοτιοδυτική πορεία, εισήλθε σε εθνικά χωρικά ύδατα μεταξύ Ευβοίας και Σκύρου τις πρώτες πρωινές ώρες σήμερα.
Στη συνέχεια ακολουθώντας νοτιοανατολική πορεία κινήθηκε σε διεθνή ύδατα του κεντρικού Αιγαίου. Σε όλη τη διάρκεια της κίνησης του το τουρκικό πλοίο παρακολουθείτο από ελληνικά πολεμικά.

description.hltext_display: Winter Tips To Keep Safe On A Motorcycle This Fall Posted By: Wayne Hemrick
description.content:
If you ride a motorcycle, you know that the cold isnt always an excuse to not go out for an afternoon ride. But that doesnt mean you should take needless risks that might result in a motorcycle accident. Colorado riders need to watch the winter weather and take measures to ensure their safety.
Winter poses its own special risks for riders, due to with the well known fickleness and harshness of our weather. So it is smart to keep in mind a few safety tips to prevent you from becoming an accident statistic this year. Wearing a helmet can do much to keep you off the fatality list, and helmeted riders receive fewer injuries to the head, neck, and spine. Enough said. Remember that helmets are mandatory in Colorado for riders and passengers under the age of 18.
Savvy bikers advise that you make a habit of checking your tire tread and inflation before you head out for your first winter ride. As they say, when you only have two wheels, you really need both! Dont wait till you are on a back road in the mountains, with bad weather moving in, to notice that the steel belt is peeking through your tire.
Your hands tend follow your eyes, so look where you want to go, not at the snow-covered peaks on the horizon. Resist other common temptations, too. Sure, its cold, but if you need a hot drink to thaw you out, stop. And if you are running late, consider taking the car.
Practice defensive driving. Even in good weather, automobile drivers can fail to notice an oncoming motorcycle when you are turning left; a leading cause of injuries to motorcyclists. Better to assume the car driver does not see you, and be prepared to take avoidance maneuvers if necessary.
During a warm week in February, it may have been awhile since you have ridden; give yourself some time to regain your former skill level. While it may take you, say, only a week to get back in the saddle again after a short hiatus, it might take you a month or more to recover skills lost from a long stretch of non-riding. Busy roads with snow and ice are no place to get back up to speed.
If, despite your best efforts to be a safe driver, you are involved in an accident, you should seek out the best legal counsel from among the motorcycle accident lawyers in Denver. First and foremost, look for an attorney who is also a motorcycle rider himself, someone who understands the prejudice typically experienced by riders, even when they are not at fault and there are witnesses to support that fact. Attorneys that have experience in the saddle and in the courtroom are often the best motorcycle accident lawyers. They will know how to combat this discrimination and will not be caught by surprise when the bias surfaces. With direct knowledge of motorcycle riding, as well as the experience and perspective needed to understand your case, he can provide the legal assistance you need.
With the high winds, snow and ice that characterize our winters, it is almost inevitable that some rider will be in a motorcycle accident. Colorado residents who find themselves involved in an incident should seek out an experienced attorney for more information.
Article Source: http://www.articlesnatch.com
About the Author:
Wayne Hemrick writes about--motorcycle accident lawyers also learn more about A denver personal injury lawyer

description.hltext_display: 황정민, 영화 '모비딕' 최고의 분위기 메이커
description.content:
[OSEN=조경이 기자] 배우 황정민이 영화 ‘모비딕’ 촬영장의 최고의 분위기 메이커로 알려져 눈길을 끈다.
영화 ‘모비딕’ 한 관계자는 “현장에서 제일 맏형님으로서 황정민이 후배들에게도 먼저 스스럼없이 다가가 편안한 분위기에서 촬영을 하신다”며 “후배들인 김민희와 진구 등 연기자들에게도 스스럼없이 먼저 다가가고 즐겁고 적극적으로 촬영에 임하신다”고 밝혔다.
또한 ‘모비딕’에 출연중인 배우 정만식 역시 “‘부당거래’ 촬영할 당시에는 많이 부딪치는 신이 없어서 사실 친해질 기회가 많지 않았는데 ‘모비딕’에서 다시 호흡을 맞추게 될 때는 친근하게 해주셔서 촬영장에서 서로 이야기도 많이 하며 즐겁게 촬영을 하고 있다”고 말했다.
영화 ‘모비딕’은 의문의 폭발 사건을 계기로, 특종을 노리는 기자가 사건을 조사하는 과정에서 폭발 사건 배후에 있는 비밀 세력과 그들이 꾸미는 음모를 파헤치며 이를 밝히려는 이야기.
황정민이 특종을 위해서는 수단과 방법을 가리지 않는 기자 ‘이방우’ 역을, 김상호가 또 다른 특종 메이커 ‘손진기’ 역을, 김민희가 미모와 용기를 겸비한 후배기자 ‘성효관’ 역을 맡아 음모를 파헤치게 된다. 그리고 폭발사건과 그 배후에 대한 실마리를 제공하는 내부고발자 ‘윤혁’ 역은 진구가 분한다.
연출을 맡은 박인제 감독은 미장센 단편영화제에서 ‘여기가 끝이다’라는 작품으로 ‘비정성시’ 부문 최우수상을 수상하며 연출력을 인정받은 바 있다. 영화는 현재 촬영에 한창이며 내년 상반기에 개봉할 예정이다.

description.hltext_display: รักใหม่สะดุด! 'โคล'ส่อไม่ว่างสวีทกิ๊กใหม่ที่แอลเอ
description.content: แอชลีย์ โคล อาจไม่สามารถบินไปเริงรักกับกิ๊กคนล่าสุด ช่วงคริสต์มาสที่แอลเอ ได้ เนื่องจากมีโปรแกรมโหดรอเพียบจนถึงเดือน พ.ค. เผยสาวเจ้าหลงเสน่ห์แข้งเชลซีแทบโงหัวไม่ขึ้น...สำนักข่าวต่างประเทศรายงานวันที่ 22 ธ.ค.เผย เคย์ลา คอลลินส์ สาวเพลย์บอย วัย 23 ปี หลงเสน่ห์ แอชลีย์ โคล แบ็กซ้ายจอมเจ้าชู้ของ "สิงห์บูล" เชลซี หัวปักหัวปำ แถมหวังให้สตาร์ดังแห่งศึกพรีเมียร์ลีก บินมาฉลองปาร์ตี้คริสต์มาสด้วยกันที่ ลอส แองเจลิส เพื่อนของสาวเจ้าเม้าท์ว่า "เคย์ลาชอบ แอลลีย์ โคล จริงๆ เธอบอกว่า เขาเป็นสุ� าพบุรุษ และเป็นผู้ชายที่เจ๋งมากๆ พวกเขาเคยเดทกัน 3ครั้ง แต่เธอก็ตกหลงรักเขาและไม่ต้องการกลับไปที่ สหรัฐฯ เพราะเธอรู้ว่า เธอคงคิดถึงเขามาก และเธอยังร้องขอให้เขามาที่ สหรัฐฯ เพื่ออยู่กับเธอช่วงคริสต์มาสกับเธออีกด้วย"อย่างไรก็ตาม เชื่อว่า โคล วัย 30 ปี อาจไม่สามารถทำตามคำอ้อนวอนของ นางแบบสาวสุดเอ็กซ์ได้ เนื่องจากเขามีคิวลงเตะให้ต้นสังกัดแน่นเอี้ยดในช่วงฤดูกาลหลัง เนื่องจากศึกพรีเมียร์ลีก ไม่มีช่วงพักเบรคหน้าหนาวเมื่อลีกอื่นๆ ในยุโรปแหล่งข่าวของทีม "สิงห์บลู" เผยว่า "แอชลีย์ จะลงเล่นสองเกมต่อสัปดาห์ ไปจนกระทั่งช่วงสิ้นเดือน พ.ค. และตารางฝึกซ้อมมันก็หนักมากๆ เขาอาจแอบไปได้ 2-3 วัน แต่ ผู้จัดการทีมคงไม่มีความสุข ถ้าเขากลับมาพร้อมกับอาการเจ็ท-เลค".

description.hltext_display: 손흥민, '원조 갈색 폭격기' 최연소 기록 깰까?
description.content:
[OSEN=서귀포, 우충원 기자] '신예 갈색 폭격기' 손흥민(18, 함부르크)이 원조 '갈색 폭격기'의 최연소 기록 뛰어 넘게 될까?.
조광래 감독이 이끄는 축구 국가대표팀이 22일 제주 서귀포 월드컵경기장에서 자체 청백전을 통해 아시안컵을 위한 국내 훈련을 사실상 마무리했다.
올 시즌 분데스리가 7경기서 3골을 터트리며 '깜작 스타'로 떠오른 손흥민은 적극적인 움직임을 보이며 조광래 감독에게 가능성을 인정 받았다. 눈에 띌 만큼 폭발적인 움직임은 아니었지만 충분히 가능성을 인정 받을 만한 모습이었다.
조광래 감독의 말처럼 아직 손흥민의 아시안컵 출전이 확정된 것은 아니지만 큰 기대를 걸고 있기 때문에 향후 미래를 위해 손흥민을 아시안컵 대표팀에 포함 시킬 가능성이 높아졌다.
조광래 감독은 "손흥민의 경우 오늘 플레이를 봐서는 아시안컵에 데려가도 괜찮을 것 같다"면서 "만약 해외파 선수들이 합류되어 함께 경기를 한다면 더 좋은 플레이를 펼칠 수 있을 것"이라고 대표 선발 의사를 나타냈다.
이어 조 감독은 "물론 아직 확정된 것은 아니다. 코치들과 상의를 해봐야 하지만 개인적인 의견으로는 데려가고 싶다"고 강조했다.
1992년 7월8일 생인 손흥민은 내년 1월8일부터 열리는 대회에 출전하게 되면 아시안컵 대표팀 사상 최연소다. 기존의 기록은 차범근 전 수원 감독의 18년 11개월. 지난 1972년 태국 방콕에서 열린 제 5회 아시안컵 대회에 대표팀 멤버로 차범근 감독이 출전하면서 최연소 기록을 가지고 있다.
당시 차범근 감독은 크메르와 가진 1차선서 팀이 4-0으로 승리를 거두는 가운데 득점포를 터트리며 '갈색 폭격기'다운 모습을 보여줬다.
만약 손흥민이 카타르에서 열리는 아시안컵에 참가하게 되면 최연소 기록과 함께 분데스리그 선배인 차범근 감독의 기록을 깨게 된다.
손흥민은 "대표팀에서 쟁쟁한 선배들과 훈련을 하며 경험을 쌓으려고 했는데 감독님이 그렇게 말씀하셔서 놀랐다"면서 "확정은 아니지만 감독님께 정말 감사하다"고 고마움을 표시했다.

description.hltext_display: Γ.Μπουτάρης: Καλύτερη λύση το Σλαβομακεδονία
description.author: editors@naftemporiki.gr (Η ΝΑΥΤΕΜΠΟΡΙΚΗ ON LIN
description.content:
«Καλύτερη ιδέα για το όνομα (της ΠΓΔΜ) είναι το Σλαβομακεδονία. Η ονομασία αυτή είναι καλύτερη από το Βόρεια ή ’νω Μακεδονία», εκτιμά ο νεοεκλεγείς δήμαρχος Θεσσαλονίκης Γιάννης Μπουτάρης σε εκτενή συνέντευξή του στην εφημερίδα των Σκοπίων, Utrinski Vesnik), κατηγορώντας παράλληλα τον Νίκολα Γκρούεφσκι ότι επιδιώκει για προσωπικό όφελος, τη διατήρηση μίας κατάστασης «που μας κρατάει όλους ομήρους ενός εθνικοπατριωτισμού».
«Οι Σλάβοι ήρθαν στα Βαλκάνια τον 6ο αιώνα μ.Χ. Στην περιοχή ζούσαν άλλοι λαοί, πολύ πριν απ' αυτούς. Το γεγονός ότι οι Σλάβοι μετακινήθηκαν και ζουν στην περιοχή αιώνες τώρα, σίγουρα τους δίνει τη δυνατότητα να αποκαλούνται Μακεδόνες, όμως είναι απαραίτητο ένα ειδικό χαρακτηριστικό για να υπάρξει μία διάκριση, διότι εδώ, και πριν απ' αυτούς ζούσαν Μακεδόνες. Πρόκειται για δύο διαφορετικά πράγματα και πρέπει να γίνει σαφές σε όλους. Αυτό που μου φαίνεται παράξενο είναι γιατί ένας Σλάβος ή μία ομάδα που κατάγεται από Σλάβους, οι οποίοι ως λαός έχουν κάνει πάρα πολλά και έχουν μία σημαντική ιστορία, για την οποία πρέπει να είναι υπερήφανοι, ζητούν και θέλουν και άλλα πράγματα και άλλη ιστορία, με την οποία θα υπερηφανεύονται. Κατά την άποψή μου, η καλύτερη ιδέα για το όνομα είναι το Σλαβομακεδονία. Η ονομασία αυτή είναι καλύτερη από το Βόρεια ή ’νω Μακεδονία», αναφέρει ο κ. Μπουτάρης, σύμφωνα με το ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ, στη συνέντευξή του.
Σημειώνοντας ότι πρέπει να πέσουν γενικότερα οι τόνοι για την εκκρεμότητα που ταλανίζει τις σχέσεις των δύο χωρών, ο κ. Μπουτάρης επικρίνει σφοδρά την πολιτική με την οποία προσεγγίζει το ζήτημα ο πρωθυπουργός της ΠΓΔΜ, Νίκολα Γκρούεφσκι.
«Νομίζω ότι μία μεγάλη εστία έντασης θα αποτελέσει το άγαλμα του Μ.Αλεξάνδρου στα Σκόπια (...). Θεωρώ τεράστιο λάθος το άγαλμα του Μ. Αλεξάνδρου, το οποίο θα προκαλέσει οργή στην Ελλάδα και θα χειροτερέψει τα πράγματα (...). Ο Νίκολα Γκρούεφσκι, για προσωπικό όφελος, φαίνεται να επιδιώκει τη διατήρηση μίας κατάστασης, η οποία μας κρατάει όλους, ομήρους ενός εθνικοπατριωτισμού», υπογραμμίζει, εκτιμώντας πως «ο μοναδικός τρόπος να αλλάξει αυτή η κατάσταση είναι να μειωθούν οι τόνοι στις συνομιλίες για το όνομα».
Στη συνέντευξή του εξάλλου, ο νέος δήμαρχος της Θεσσαλονίκης διατυπώνει τις θέσεις του για την ανάπτυξη και την προοπτική της πόλης, δίνοντας έμφαση στη διεύρυνση των σχέσεων της Θεσσαλονίκης και των δημοτών της, με τις γειτονικές χώρες και λαούς.

description.hltext_display: House sends food safety bill to president
description.content:
WASHINGTON—The House has passed a sweeping bill aimed at making food safer following recent contaminations in peanuts, eggs and produce, sending it to President Barack Obama for his signature.
The legislation passed Tuesday would give the government broad new powers to inspect processing plants, order recalls and impose stricter standards for imported foods. The $1.4 billion bill would also require larger farms and food manufacturers to prepare detailed food safety plans and tell the Food and Drug Administration how they are working to keep their food safe at different stages of production.
Praising the House, FDA Commissioner Margaret Hamburg said the bill will give her agency new tools to make substantial improvements in food safety.
"This law makes everyone responsible and accountable at each step in today's global food supply chain," Hamburg said.
The food safety bill has faced several false starts since the House first passed it in July 2009. It stalled in the Senate for more than a year as small farms objected to the increased oversight and conservatives complained about the cost. Most recently, the Senate passed the bill in November with tax provisions that were supposed to originate in the House under the Constitution, threatening completion of the bill.
House leaders tried to revive the bill by including it in year-end budget legislation, but that legislation later died when Senate Republicans objected to adding food safety and other unrelated measures to the giant spending bill. Democratic leader Harry Reid gave the legislation a last-minute, surprise reprieve Sunday by working with Republicans to pass a stand-alone food safety bill by voice vote, sending it to the House. The House passed it 215-144, sending it to Obama just under the wire as Congress prepares to adjourn for the year.
The bill would emphasize prevention so the agency could try to stop outbreaks before they begin. The recent outbreaks have exposed a lack of resources and authority at the FDA as the embattled agency struggled to trace and contain the contaminated products. The agency rarely inspects most food facilities and farms, visiting some every decade or so and others not at all.
"Really this is a major victory for every American who will sit down at the dinner table and have more confidence that their food is going to be safe," said Erik Olson, director of food and consumer product safety at the Pew Health Group.
The legislation has unprecedented backing from many major food companies, many of which realize that safe food is good for business. Recent outbreaks in spinach and other foods have hurt those industries financially as consumers hear about widespread recalls.
Still, the bill came under fire from advocates of buying locally produced food and operators of small farms, who said it could bankrupt some small businesses. Senators eventually agreed to an amendment by Sen. Jon Tester, D-Mont., to exempt some of those operations from costly food safety plans required of bigger companies, rankling food safety advocates and larger growers but gaining support from farm-state senators. Those exemptions are included in the final bill.
The legislation would:
—Allow the FDA to order a recall of tainted foods. Currently the agency can only negotiate with businesses to order voluntary recalls;
—Require the FDA to create new produce safety regulations for producers of the highest risk fruits and vegetables;
—Increase inspections of domestic and foreign food facilities, directing the most resources to those operations with the highest risk profiles. The riskiest domestic facilities would be inspected every three years;
—Require farms and processors to keep records to help the government trace recalled foods;
—Require grocery stores to proactively alert consumers about recalls.
The bill would not apply to meat, poultry or processed eggs, which are regulated by the Agriculture Department. Those foods have long been subject to much more rigorous inspections and oversight than FDA-regulated foods.
New estimates released by the federal Centers for Disease Control this month say that about 48 million people—or about one in six Americans—are sickened, 128,000 are hospitalized and 3,000 die each year from foodborne illnesses.

description.hltext_display: Rangers & Celtic hit back at Aberdeen chief Willie Miller's accusations of poaching young players
description.content:
THE Old Firm last night hit back at Aberdeen hero Willie Miller as a war of words erupted between the clubs.
Celtic youth chief Chris McCart furiously defended his club in the wake of accusations from the Dons' director of football while Rangers' Academy boss Jimmy Sinclair also waded in.
Miller lit the touchpaper when he accused Celtic and Rangers of trying to tap up and poach Aberdeen's stars of the future.
The Pittodrie club plough £500,000 each year into their youth development programme and Miller insisted the investment has paid off.
But Miller also told Dons shareholders it is a continual struggle to fend off the Glaswegian predators.
Miller, who has seen the emergence of Chris Maguire, Peter Pawlett, Fraser Fyvie, Ryan Jack and Clark Robertson since taking over his role six years ago, said: "This is the best crop of young players in Scotland.
"That has taken a lot of work from everyone involved to make sure we keep these young players.
"Believe me, it is a tough environment for these kids at 14. Rangers and Celtic are constantly at our games, trying to tap up our players and steal them away.
"We have top players at under-16 level and everyone in British football, not just in Scotland, is chasing them.
"We have to work hard with the boys and thei r parents to get them to believe when I tell them not to go to Rangers and Celtic, but to come to Aberdeen.
"Here they can see a pathway to the first team but I have to make them realise if you go to these other clubs you won't get a chance.
"The reason I do it is to make sure there is a future for the club with the young players we have developed."
McCart - head of youth at Parkhead - said: "This is absolute nonsense and we are very disappointed at these accusations .
"Celtic conducts itself with absolute integrity in terms of the recruitment of players.
"We are not aware of any issues whatsoever with Aberdeen FC and do not understand why these comments have been made."
Sinclair said: "Any dealings we have had with Aberdeen regarding the recruitment of young players has been in accordance with SPL and SFA regulations.
"We would give Willie the benefit of the doubt in his language used to shareholders as I think he would be the first to acknowledge that he would be unable to substantiate any irregularity on the part of Rangers."

description.hltext_display: '아시안컵 낙점' 손흥민, "배우려는 마음이었다"
description.content:
[OSEN=서귀포, 우충원 기자] '신예 갈색 폭격기' 손흥민(18, 함부르크) 국가대표 발탁 가능성에 겸손한 태도를 보였다.
손흥민은 22일 제주 서귀포 월드컵경기장에서 진행된 자체 청백전을 통해 2011 카타르 아시안컵 국내 훈련을 마쳤다.
이번 훈련에서 손흥민은 적극적인 움직임으로 조광래 축구 대표팀 감독의 눈도장을 받았다. 조광래 감독은 "손흥민은 오늘 플레이를 본다면 아시안컵에 데려가도 괜찮을 것 같다"고 평가했다.
올 시즌 독일 분데스리가에서 7경기에 출전해 3골을 터트린 손흥민의 플레이가 국가대표에서 통한다는 뜻이었다.
손흥민도 활짝 미소를 지었다. 손흥민은 "배우려는 마음으로 왔는데 조광래 감독님의 말씀에 놀랐다"고 말했다.
이어 손흥민은 "아직 확정된 것은 아니지만 그런 말씀을 해주셔서 고맙다. 함부르크는 부담을 느꼈는데 어쨌든 훈련에 참가해 다행이다"고 미소를 지었다.
