description.hltext_display: A Christmas poem from and for the U.S. Armed Forces ...
description.content:
Servicemembers stationed from Antarctica to Afghanistan lent their talents and time to craft a video for a poem titled "'Twas a Night in December," based on Clement Clarke Moore's "A Visit from St. Nicholas," but rewritten with a military twist.
More than 40 commands around the world, representing every branch of the military service, participated.
Along with the military people who contributed to this creative effort, country music star Toby Keith introduced the video, reinforcing his long-term support for military and their families stationed around the world.
Some of the servicemembers involved in this holiday greeting were located in the most remote regions in the world. For example, Air Force Capt. Graydon Muller of 6th Special Operations Squadron and Air Force Capt. Rob Marshall of the 8th Special Operations Squadron departed Nov. 24 to climb Vinson Massif, the highest mountain in Antarctica. Muller and Massif took time away from their climb to speak a few lines for the video.
Other servicemembers from Afghanistan, Germany, Iraq, Italy, Pakistan and throughout the United States participated in making the video. In fact, people on six out of the world's seven continents took part. The video was produced by Defense Media Activity's emerging media directorate.
'Twas a Night in December
'Twas a night in December and all over the world,
At bases and stations where our flag flies unfurled,
The Holiday season had long since commenced,
And spread its spirit of cheer through the Department of Defense.
Combat boots sat at ease by the fence line with care,
In hopes that a return date soon would be there.
At home, loved ones slept sound in their beds,
With visions of troops coming home in their heads.
As Moms perform night patrols, and Dads conduct checks,
A long winter's nap is the last thing they expect.
When out on the tarmac arose such a clatter,
Soldiers and sailors sprang up to see what was the matter.
Away to the deck, they hustled, they dashed,
Some ran through a passageway, one opened a hatch.
In Antarctica, moonlight shimmered on the snow,
A sliver of light shown on the objects below.
And what to our wondering eyes should appear,
But letters and packages bundled with care.
Yet it wasn't just there that we saw these things land,
We received them as well, here in Afghanistan!
They were packaged so well that they could withstand,
The harsh desert winds full of Iraqi sand.
Onto Nicaragua with volcanoes and lakes,
Padded so carefully that nothing would break
Addressed from our family and friends we hold dear,
With Holiday greetings and a "Wish You Were Here!"
We lined up and claimed them, with smiles ear-to-ear,
Every person overcome with Holiday cheer.
Your support and your thoughts are the best possible gift,
We send you our thanks for giving our spirits such a lift.
Thanks from the National Guard
Thanks from the Army,
Thanks from the Navy,
Thanks from the Marines,
Thanks from the Air Force,
Thanks from the Coast Guard,
We want you to know how much this gift means.
In our eyes you're super, and we mean A-OK.
We will do our duty and keep defending our freedom,
And wish you and yours the very best this Holiday season!

description.hltext_display: 消費税含む税制抜本改革、12年度の実施を目指す精神＝財務相
[视频]金明敏、韩智敏携手新片《朝鲜名探》
description.content:
11:19)
21日上午11时，新片《朝鲜名探》制作发表会在东大门MegaBox影院进行。导演Kim Seok-yun、主演金明敏、韩智敏等参加了发表会。
新片《朝鲜名探》讲述了朝鲜正祖时期天才名探（金明敏饰）侦破离奇案件的故事。影片以朝鲜时期为背景展开、是有着《福尔摩斯探案》风格的推理作品。
片中的金明敏将大胆摆脱过去作品中深沉的形象，变身诙谐幽默的名侦探，奉献精彩的喜剧表演。演对手戏的吴达秀称赞说：“金明敏很有喜剧天分。一般演员忌讳夸张的表演，但是他用力很得当，演得真是很好。”
韩智敏饰演的是一位性感霸气的古代新女性“韩客朱”，率领着朝鲜时期最大的商团。金明敏对此表示：“韩智敏平时性格爽朗，就像自己的妹妹一样。但是，上妆后简直让人认不出来，连我都被她的气势压倒，不敢正视她。”导演Kim Seok-yun也说：“韩智敏平时的形象清纯可爱，选定她出演后也曾非常担心，但她的表现超出了我的预想，非常满意。”
影片《朝鲜名探》被称为古代朝鲜版“福尔摩斯”的探案故事正备受期待，该片将于1月27日上映。
朝鲜日报中文网 chn.chosun.com
本文内容归朝鲜日报和朝鲜日报网版权所有，未经许可，不得摘编

description.hltext_display: De plus en plus de règlements collectifs de dettes
description.content:
BRUXELLES Le nombre de règlements collectifs de dettes a augmenté de 222% sur l’ensemble de l’année 2010 par rapport à 2009. «Le nombre de consommateurs ne disposant pas d’une vue claire sur leurs revenus augmente toujours davantage et se traduit par des personnes noyées sous les dettes. Pas moins de 364.309 Belges rencontrent des difficultés quant au remboursement d’un ou de plusieurs crédits», commente-t-on chez Intrum Justitia, une société
active dans la gestion de crédits. L’entreprise plaide pour passer d’une approche d’assistance à une politique de prévention «là où il est possible d’éviter que les consommateurs s’endettent trop lourdement». Elle estime que la nouvelle législation sur le crédit à la consommation constitue «un pas dans la bonne direction». e_SRitn

description.hltext_display: Army 88, Brown 86: Sluggish start proves to be Bears' undoing
description.author: CAROLYN THORNTON
description.content:
PROVIDENCE — With the stress of final exams now in the rearview mirror, the Brown men’s basketball team took the court for the first time in 15 days Tuesday night and found itself faced with another difficult test. This time it was Army, a squad eager to get on a winning track after dropping five of its last six games.
Despite having nearly five players reach double figures, the Bears still didn’t have quite enough, as Army pulled out an 88-86 win at the Pizzitola Sports Center.
"It was a tremendous test,” said Brown coach Jesse Agel. "We didn’t come out to start the game well, and we didn’t come out in the second half to start it well, but we played real well for long stretches. . . . . We just didn’t create enough good luck.”
As the seven ties and five lead changes would indicate, Tuesday’s game was one of dramatic momentum swings. Brown showed some of the rustiness one would expect after a two-week layoff and fell behind early on. But after a 3-pointer by Alex Godette put Army up, 15-6, Sean McGonagill and Peter Sullivan drained back-to-back three’s for the Bears, sparking a 12-3 run that Garrett Leffelman capped with back-to-back baskets that evened the score at 18-all.
With the teams still tied at 23-23 with 8:16 remaining in the half, the Cadets jumped back on top, courtesy of a short jumper by Jeremy Hence, followed by a basket by Julian Simmons.
That lead would be shortlived, though, as Sullivan sank a layup on Brown’s next possession and Tucker Halpern followed with back-to-back treys.
Sullivan and Leffelman each picked up another five points over the last five minutes, as the Bears outscored Army, 15-11, down the stretch and carried a 46-38 advantage into the break.
"We just started playing at a better pace,” said Agel. "Our guys have been playing well together, and we’re going to do very well in spurts.”
A three-pointer by Sullivan in the opening minute of the second half put Brown up, 52-40, for what would be the biggest lead of the night for either team. But that lead, too, would be shortlived, as Army ran off 11 unanswered points, pulling within one, 52-51, on a three-pointer by Simmons.
Sullivan temporarily halted the Cadets’ rally, sinking all three free throws after being fouled while attempting a three-pointer. A trey by Army freshman Chris Welker sparked another 11-2 run by Army. But after a bucket by Hence put the Cadets ahead, 64-57, Brown took off on an 11-0 run of its own, regaining the lead on a three-pointer by Leffelman.
"I think when Sean (McGonagill) came out of the game, we struggled for a little bit, but then we got our footing,” Agel said. "Matt (Sullivan) really stepped up in the second half and made plays.”
The Bears were still up by five with 5 minutes to play, but Army kept knocking on the door, and with 1:14 remaining, Cadets guard Mitch McDonald banked a shot to tie it at 84-all.
After Sullivan missed a three-pointer on Brown’s next possession, the Army freshman then sank a layup to put his team on top. That time it would be for good. After another missed three-pointer by Brown, Nathan Hedgecock sealed it for the Cadets, sinking two free throws with six seconds left.

description.hltext_display: U.S. offers condolences, help after Iranian quake
description.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States offered condolences and help on Tuesday to its adversary Iran after an earthquake jolted the southeastern part of the country.
There were no initial reports of casualties from the quake in Kerman province. Iran's state television put its magnitude at 6.5 on the Richter scale.
"The United States is saddened by the loss of life in Monday's earthquake in Kerman, Iran," White House National Security Council spokesman Mike Hammer said in a statement.
"The people of Kerman have suffered a great deal as a result of this natural disaster. We offer our condolences to the victims and their loved ones and are prepared to offer assistance to those in need during this difficult time," Hammer said.
(Writing by Caren Bohan; Editing by Eric Walsh)
(c) Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. Check for restrictions at: http://about.reuters.com/fulllegal.asp

description.hltext_display: CHP Officer Hurt When Pickup Hits Cruiser
description.content:
A California Highway Patrol officer investigating a crash in Novato suffered minor injuries Monday when a pickup truck struck his patrol car on the shoulder of Highway 101.
The officer, who was standing next to his patrol car, was knocked to the ground by his own vehicle, said CHP Officer Chris Rardin. The name of the injured officer was not released.
The incident occurred around 1 p.m. on northbound Highway 101, where the officer was handling a two-vehicle collision near the Atherton Avenue exit, Rardin said.
A woman driving a 1970 Chevrolet pickup truck then skidded off the freeway into the shoulder and struck the CHP officer's car, pushing it into the patrolman. The pickup then struck another 2004 GMC pickup that was parked on the shoulder in connection with the initial collision.
Rardin said the Chevrolet's driver, 22-year-old Melissa Maldanado of Walnut Grove, had been traveling at an unsafe speed and locked her brakes when she approached slowed traffic. She was not injured.
Firefighters took the CHP officer to Marin General Hospital for treatment.

description.hltext_display: Das iPad ist das Geschenk des Jahres Von Patrick Bernau
description.author: Patrick Bernau
description.content:
Ein Computer, der nicht aussieht wie ein Computer: Das ist der Trick von Apple. Das Tablet ist ein Gerät, mit dem man konsumiert. Und jeder hat das Gefühl, damit zurechtzukommen.
7 Millionen von diesen Tablet-Computern wurden bisher weltweit verkauft
Die Playstation ist out. Der Walkman sowieso. Auf den Weihnachtswunschzetteln amerikanischer Kinder steht etwas ganz anderes oben: Apples iPad. Der Minicomputer hat seit dem Verkaufsstart im April eine enorme Karriere hingelegt: Mehr als sieben Millionen hat Apple nach eigenen Angaben allein bis September verkauft, damit hat sich das iPad viel schneller durchgesetzt als das iPhone und die meisten anderen Elektrogeräte. Im Weihnachtsgeschäft dürfte noch so manche Million dazukommen – nicht nur, weil Familienmitglieder beschenkt werden: Auch einige Firmen schenken ihren Mitarbeitern zum Jahresende iPads.
Inzwischen ist die flache Scheibe im Alltag überall zu sehen: An der Uni lesen technikbegeisterte Studenten ihre Unterlagen auf dem Pad. In ICEs sitzen gestandene Manager und spielen auf dem Gerät zu zweit gegeneinander Billard. Und wer die Nachrichten ansieht, sieht den bislang nicht als besonders technikaffin aufgefallenen Wirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle, wie er im Bundestag auf seinem iPad herumwischt, während die Bundeskanzlerin eine Regierungserklärung abgibt. Das iPad ist das Produkt des Jahres.
Es kann nicht so viel
Dabei waren Technikkenner gar nicht so begeistert, als Steve Jobs im Januar sein iPad vorstellte. Ein besonders toller Computer ist es schließlich nicht. Dateien lassen sich nur schwer auf andere Computer schicken. Auch das Tippen macht auf der Bildschirmtastatur wenig Freude. Und viele Internetseiten funktionieren gar nicht. Wer Ahnung von Technik hat, so hieß es Anfang des Jahres, dem reicht der Laptop und das iPhone – das iPad war etwas für die Leute, die keine Ahnung von Computern hatten: ein „omiPad“.
Doch genau das macht das iPad so beliebt, argumentiert der Psychologe Sebastian Buggert, der im Kölner Rheingold-Institut neue Medien untersucht: Es kann nicht so viel. Und es ist eben gerade nicht das Internet, sondern viel, viel einfacher. „Vom Internet fühlen sich viele Leute überfordert. Es ist unübersichtlich, kompliziert und voller Ablenkungen – sie haben Angst, dass sie vom Hölzchen aufs Stöckchen kommen.“ Auf dem iPad ist diese Angst weg. Das Gerät nutzt zwar die Möglichkeiten des Internets, aber in vielen Fällen eben in Form eines Zusatzprogramms, einer „Application“. Die hat nur eine Aufgabe und ist auch genau darauf zugeschnitten – da ist alles ganz übersichtlich.
„Übergang von der Arbeit zur Freizeit“
Natürlich reicht das iPad nicht, um damit eine starke Präsentation für die nächste Verkaufsverhandlung zu bauen oder gar einen Roman zu schreiben. Das Tablet ist ein Gerät, mit dem man konsumiert. Um Dinge zu produzieren, braucht man weiter den Computer – und das macht das iPad bei seinen Besitzern sogar noch beliebter, wie der Marktforscher Dirk Ziems, Chef der Agentur Concept M, herausgefunden hat.
„Leute, die einen Laptop und ein iPad haben, die markieren damit den Übergang von der Arbeit zur Freizeit. Sie legen auf der Couch die Beine hoch und entspannen sich“, sagt Ziems. Vielleicht schauten sie dann noch mal nach ihren E-Mails, aber nur beiläufig. „Dass die Tastatur nicht besonders gut ist, hilft diesem Gefühl auch noch.“ In mancher Familie wollen die Kinder überhaupt nicht mehr an den Computer, weil sie beobachtet haben: Was dort passiert, ist Arbeit.
Das iPad passt aber nicht nur aufs Sofa – auch das mögen die Besitzer. Es kann mit ins Flugzeug, ins Meeting, aber auch schlicht in die Küche. Laptops sind dort eher selten zu sehen. Aber wer beim Kochen ein Rezept braucht, legt das iPad häufig daneben – wenn es einen Spritzer abkriegt, wird der eben abgewischt. Bei der Laptoptastatur wäre das nicht so leicht. „Mit dem iPad gehen Leute robuster um“, hat Marktforscher Ziems erfragt. „Es hat dem Computer neue Orte erschlossen.“
Das Internet anfassen
Die Besitzer haben schließlich auch eine andere Beziehung zu ihrem iPad als zu einem Computer. „Das ist viel intimer und unmittelbarer“, sagt Psychologe Buggert. „Weil man über das Gerät wischen kann, fühlt es sich so an, als würde man das Internet anfassen. Und man hat die göttliche Macht des Internets ganz spielerisch.“ Gleichzeitig sei das Pad aber auch sozialer als ein Computer. „Wenn Sie einen Laptop aufklappen, haben Sie immer eine Wand zwischen sich und den anderen. Ein Tablet dagegen ist flach, das ist schon im Wortsinn eine soziale Sache.“ Die Trendforscherin Susanne Maisch stimmt zu: „An einem Computer zieht man sich zurück. Wenn Kinder an der Spielekonsole spielen, wirkt das gleich autistisch“ – schließlich drehen sie den Eltern den Rücken zu. Wer um das Pad sitzt, wirkt gleich deutlich gesellschaftsfähiger.
Und gesellschaftsfähig ist das iPad, gekauft vor allem von reichen und sehr gebildeten Leuten, wie die Marktforscher von Nielsen zumindest für die Vereinigten Staaten ermittelt haben. Für Deutschland passt dieser Trend vermutlich auch. Das iPad gilt als teuer und avantgardistisch – genau das richtige für eine reiche, gebildete Zielgruppe, die anderes zu tun hat, als sich um Technik zu kümmern. Und beim Durchsetzen hat die Marke Apple geholfen, wie Marktforscher Ziems glaubt. Nachdem Steve Jobs mit iPod und iPhone zwei Erfolge abgeliefert hat, habe er von selbst das Image: Seine Produkte sind die Zukunft. Damit kann man sich gut schmücken, deshalb verschenken Firmen so gerne iPads an ihre Mitarbeiter. „Auf diese Weise hat die Marke Apple ihre selbsterfüllende Prophezeiung.“

description.hltext_display: Le secteur aérien ne s’inquiète pas de l’avenir
description.content: Dans son rapport annuel Global Markets Forecast, le constructeur européen Airbus affirme que le nombre d’avions transportant des passagers doublera, passant de plus de 14.000 à l’heure actuelle à 29.000 d’ici 2029. Airbus affirme que de nouveaux avions seront indispensables pour aider les marchés traditionnels comme l’Europe et l’Amérique du Nord à passer à une flotte plus respectueuse de l’environnement, mais aussi pour répondre à la demande croissante des pays émergents et des transporteurs low-cost, surtout en Asie. Le constructeur prédit également que d’ici 20 ans, les compagnies aériennes de la zone Asie-Pacifique seront responsables d’un tiers du trafic passager, dépassant les 25% de passagers transportés par les compagnies européennes et les 20% par les compagnies nord-américaines. Si le marché intérieur des Etats-Unis devrait rester le plus important au monde en termes de circulation, le marché intérieur chinois devrait dépasser le marché intérieur européen, actuellement deuxième: sept des vingt itinéraires avec la plus forte croissance en termes de circulation relient la Chine au reste du monde, selon Airbus. La société prévoit aussi une demande plus forte pour les très gros porteurs comme l’A380, qui seront de plus en plus utilisés pour les vols vers les «mégapoles». John Leahy, d’Airbus, a déclaré que «les gens veulent et ont besoin de voyager en avion», faisant remarquer que la reprise économique qui a suivi la crise a été plus forte qu’annoncé.

description.hltext_display: IAF Strikes Hamas Target in Southern Gaza Strip in Response to Rocket Fire
description.content:
IDF Spokesperson Announcement
For Immediate Release
19:00 A short while ago, the IAF targeted a Hamas terror activity center in the
southern Gaza Strip. A direct hit was confirmed.
The IAF struck this terror target in response to the rocket fire directed at
Israel's southern communities over the past week. Just this morning, a
Qassam rocket landed near a kindergarten in Kibbutz Zikim. This rocket was
approximately the fifteenth military-use projectile that landed in Israel
since Monday morning.
Since the beginning of 2010, over 200 Grad missiles, Qassam rockets and
Mortar shells have been fired from the Gaza Strip into Israeli territory.
The IDF holds the Hamas terrorist organization solely responsible for
maintaining the calm in the Gaza Strip and for any terrorist activity
emanating from it. The IDF will also continue to respond harshly to any
attempt to use terror against the State of Israel.
International News Desk
Spokesperson's Unit
Israel Defense Forces
Telephone: +972-3-6080245

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content: 'Berlin (dpa) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Man habe mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrührten, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. Die Politik werde zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht würden, so Ramsauer.

description.hltext_display: Wis. Detective Gets DWI While Driving Cruiser
description.content:
A Juneau County Sheriff's Office detective has been arrested on suspicion of operating a motor vehicle while under the influence after his department-issued vehicle was found in a ditch early Saturday morning, the Juneau County Sheriff's Office said.
Randy Georgeson, a 19-year veteran of the Juneau County Sheriff's Office, has been placed on administrative leave following the arrest.
The Juneau County Sheriff's Office said Georgeson lost control and slid into the south ditch of 43rd Street near the intersection of Highway 58, just outside of Mauston.
The incident happened at 3:40 a.m. Saturday, and sources said Georgeson was on his way home from a holiday party.
A sheriff's deputy was sent to the crash and then called in the Wisconsin State Patrol after identifying the driver as a sheriff's detective.
According to the police report, the Wisconsin State Patrol trooper noticed an overpowering smell of intoxicants coming from the vehicle. The trooper also noted that Georgeson had very blood shot eyes and was slurring his speech.
The state patrol said Georgeson refused a field sobriety test and was arrested after failing the breath test. He registered a 0.193 and was arrested on charges of first-offense OWI and having a prohibited blood alcohol content over 0.15, according to the state patrol.
The state patrol trooper arrested Georgeson and transported him to the Juneau County Jail.

description.hltext_display: L’Etat en cassation contre l’arrêt KB Lux
description.content:
BRUXELLES Le ministre de la Justice, Stefaan De Clerck, a indiqué hier que le parquet général allait se pourvoir en cassation contre l’arrêt de la Cour d’appel de Bruxelles dans l’affaire KB et KB Lux. Le 10 décembre, la cour d’appel de Bruxelles a confirmé le jugement intervenu en première
instance et a donc déclaré irrecevables les poursuites à l’encontre de dirigeants et de clients des anciennes KB et KB Lux. La cour d’appel a suivi le premier juge et a, globalement, motivé son arrêt de la même manière. La Kredietbank et sa filiale luxembourgeoise, la KB Lux, étaient prévenues d’une fraude fiscale évaluée à 400 millions € par le Parquet et considérée comme la plus grande que la Belgique aurait connue. n

description.hltext_display: 75.869: el premio más madrugador
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: USA belangen Deutsche Bank für Steuersparmodelle
description.content: 'New York (dpa) - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, rund eine halbe Milliarde Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen. Im Gegenzug würde der Fall nicht weiter verfolgt, teilte die US- Bundesstaatsanwaltschaft mit. Die Fälle liegen nach Angaben der Deutschen Bank allerdings schon Jahre zurück - von 1996 bis 2002.

description.hltext_display: La position dominante de GDF Suez inquiète
description.content:
Au mois d’août 2010, GDF Suez annonçait son intention d’acquérir International Power. Le 29 novembre 2010, GDF Suez a notifié son projet d’acquisition à la Commission européenne qui devrait décider d’approuver ou non cette transaction.
Concernant la Belgique, l’acquisition d’International Power par GDF Suez (qui contrôle l’opérateur historique Electrabel) va également permettre à cette dernière d’acquérir une participation de contrôle de 33,3% dans la société T-Power. Cette société T-Power possède une turbine gaz-vapeur (TGV) de 420 MW qui devrait démarrer sa production commerciale à partir de juin 2011, explique l’Auditorat auprès du Conseil de la concurrence. «Conformément à un accord entre T-Power et Essent, la production de cette unité sera vendue exclusivement à Essent pour une durée de 15 ans. Toutefois, par l’acquisition d’International Power, GDF Suez deviendra l’opérateur de cette unité de production. Conformément au règlement sur les concentrations et à la loi belge sur la protection de la concurrence économique, l’Auditorat a demandé le 20 décembre à la Commission européenne de renvoyer ce projet d’acquisition à l’Autorité belge de la concurrence en ce qui concerne les marchés belges de l’électricité», ajoute l’Auditorat. Le Conseil de la concurrence pourra ainsi déterminer si cette transaction respecte les règles belges de la concurrence. Selon l’Auditorat, cette acquisition menacerait d’affecter de manière significative la concurrence dans plusieurs marchés de l’électricité en Belgique.

description.hltext_display: Scunthorpe rule out Williams loan
description.content:
Williams has found first team chances limited at Reading Scunthorpe United have ruled out trying to re-sign their former left-back Marcus Williams in January.
The 24-year-old is out of favour at Reading having left the Iron for the Madejski Stadium last summer.
Scunthorpe are looking for a left-back but boss Ian Baraclough told BBC Radio Humberside: "Marcus's wages have probably rocketed out of our bracket. "He left the club and wanted to seek his future elsewhere. I don't think he'd be an option for us." Williams came up through the youth ranks at Glanford Park and went on to make 196 appearances during a seven year period before his departure in May 2010.
The Doncaster-born defender has struggled to make an impact at Reading, making just five starts and had spent time on loan at League One Peterborough in November.

event_or_fact.property: "Marcus's wages have probably rocketed out of our bracket

description.hltext_display: Hochwasser in Los Angeles - Orkan im Anzug
description.content: 'Los Angeles (dpa) - Nach anhaltenden Regenfällen mit Überschwemmungen wird der Süden Kaliforniens auch von orkanartigen Stürmen bedroht. Das nationale US-Wetteramt hat für Los Angeles und die Region eine Sturmwarnung ausgegeben. Die Evakuierung besonders gefährdeter Regionen werde vorbereitet, berichtet die "Los Angeles Times". Durch die schweren Regenfälle drohe Flutgefahr auch in den ebenen Gebieten rund um die Millionenmetropole.

description.hltext_display: N.H. Officer Pulls Man From Burning Car
description.content:
A Raymond police officer pulled a man from a burning vehicle Monday morning.
Police said Officer Ryan Lehman responded to a report of a crash on the exit 5 off-ramp of Route 101 at about 9 a.m. Lehman saw a vehicle in the woods off the highway as he heard an update that the vehicle was on fire.
Police said Lehman ran through marshy woods to the car and saw that flames were reaching the legs of the driver, Cameron Kaufman, 20, of Bedford.
"I pulled off the shoulder of the on ramp and hoofed it," Lehman said. "I ran through kind of a marshy scene, came up on the car that was partially engulfed in flames. I was able to pry the door open, un-seat belt him, grab him by his jacket and pull him out. It was a close call."
Lehman was able to remove Kaufman's seat belt and carry him to safety.

description.hltext_display: Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
description.content: 'Athen (dpa) - Im griechischen Parlament geht die Debatte über den umstrittenen Sparhaushalt in die letzte Runde. Nach fünf Tagen hitziger Kontroversen soll unmittelbar nach Mitternacht die Abstimmung über den Haushalt 2011 beginnen. Das neue Budget sieht massive Sparmaßnahmen und Mehrbelastungen für die Bürger vor. Damit will die sozialistische Regierung über sechs Milliarden Euro zusätzlich aufbringen. Aus Protest gegen die harten Sparmaßnahmen legten Busfahrer und Zugführer in Athen heute erneut für 24 Stunden die Arbeit nieder.

description.hltext_display: Breathing Trouble? 7 Signs Of Danger
description.content:
By Melanie Haiken, Caring.com We hear a lot about the risks of lung cancer -- but less about a lung condition that's just as common and debilitating, called COPD. This term, which stands for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, refers to a combination of two conditions, emphysema and chronic obstructive bronchitis, both of which are caused by lung damage from smoking or exposure to other lung irritants, such as asbestos.
Whether you're a smoker, a former smoker, or just unlucky, you can develop COPD as a result of damage to your lungs that gradually limits their ability to take in oxygen. IBSYS.ad.AdManager.registerPosition(}); When a Cough Isn't "Just a Cough" When your lungs aren't functioning at full capacity, symptoms begin to appear that are sometimes so subtle that you may not recognize them as such. And because COPD is a progressive disease that can't be slowed without treatment -- and because it's the fourth leading cause of death in the U.S. -- it's critical to catch it as soon as possible. Here, seven signs that your lungs are trying to tell you they're in trouble.
Respiratory Symptoms 1. Shortness Of Breath
"Many people start to experience shortness of breath, and they just think 'I'm old, I'm out of shape,' and they don't do anything about it other than cutting back their activity level," says Byron Thomashow, a physician and professor at Columbia University Medical Center and chairman of the board of the COPD Foundation. "Then when you have shortness of breath just getting to the bathroom, all of a sudden you take notice."
The problem with this, Thomashow says, is that the lung damage that constitutes COPD can't be reversed; all you can do is halt or slow the progression of the disease. And if you don't start treating it until you're already out of breath just walking around the house, you've got a lot less to work with. Not only that, but cutting back is the last thing you want to do to prevent COPD progression maintaining and even increasing your activity level is key to keeping the lung function that you have.
One thing to look for: When you're climbing steps or exercising, do you have trouble inhaling a deep breath? An even more telltale sign: Do you take the elevator instead of the stairs to avoid this feeling? Experiment with different activities to see if you have shortness of breath when you increase your level of exertion, and note if there have been any changes over time. "I ask people, how's your breathing compared to last year -- can you do what you used to do a year ago?" says Thomashow. If you feel your ability to draw a deep breath is declining, ask your doctor to perform lung function tests to give you a clear picture of your lung health.
15 Medical Tests Every Woman Should Have Cough Symptoms 2. Frequent Or Worsening Coughs
Everyone gets a cough once in awhile, but if you seem to be getting them more frequently, or they linger for a long time or become chronic, it's time to talk to your doctor. COPD inflames the bronchial tubes and the tiny sacs called alveoli that line the lungs, making them less flexible and elastic. When that happens, the walls of the airways thicken and produce more mucus than usual, which clogs them up.
What you'll notice is a phlegmy cough that feels like the type that usually accompanies the flu -- except you don't have other flu symptoms. If you cough up mucus that's any other color than clear, that can be a sign your condition is worsening, says Byron Thomashow of Columbia and the COPD Foundation. The mucus may be yellow, green, or even have blood in it.
One interesting fact to be aware of: If you're still smoking, your sputum production may not increase despite advancing COPD, whereas sputum production tends to increase after you quit.
Headaches, Edema
3. Morning Headaches
One of the more mysterious symptoms of COPD is waking up after a night's sleep with a dull, throbbing headache. "What's happening is that you're not breathing deeply enough at night, and the carbon dioxide builds up while you're sleeping," says physician Norman Edelman, chief medical officer for the American Lung Association. The buildup of carbon dioxide causes blood vessels in the brain to dilate, resulting in headaches.
Many people don't connect the headaches to COPD, though; instead they treat them as a separate symptom. But unless you treat the underlying cause -- making sure you get enough oxygen into your lungs while you sleep -- the headaches won't go away. Talk to your doctor about setting up a treatment regimen for COPD designed to reduce inflammation and increase the absorbent capacity of the lungs.
4. Swollen Ankles
As COPD advances, it becomes intertwined with heart failure, because your circulatory system isn't getting the oxygen it needs to be healthy. This can lead to fluid buildup, which is most easily recognizable as swollen feet and ankles. "As lungs get progressively worse, the ability of the body to compensate goes down and the heart can't pump strongly enough," says Norman Edelman of the American Lung A ssociation. When the heart can't pump enough blood to supply the liver and kidneys, they can't perform their necessary functions of flushing out toxins and removing fluid. The result: the same type of edema many people experience while flying or women experience when pregnant.
Sleep Problems
5. Trouble Sleeping Or Staying Asleep
Ask yourself this: Do you pile up pillows to raise your chest and head and make it easier to breathe while you sleep? Do you sleep in a chair, such as a recliner, because breathing's easier in that position? It's also possible that you sleep flat but wake up feeling unwell or even dizzy.
10 Biggest Sleep Problems and How to Fix Them Because lying flat forces your lungs to work harder, many people with COPD find they have trouble sleeping deeply -- but they may not realize it's the lung condition causing it. "Sleep is also hard for people with COPD because they may cough throughout the night, waking themselves up or interrupting deep sleep," says Byron Thomashow of the COPD Foundation.
The relationship between COPD and poor sleep gets complicated, because many people with COPD also develop sleep apnea and GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), neither of which is conducive to deep, refreshing sleep.
The bottom line: If you wake regularly throughout the night with breathing difficulties or coughing, or you wake up in the morning feeling weak, unrested, and possibly with a headache, talk to your doctor.
Barrel Chest, Blue Blood
6. A Barrel Chest
One informal test that some doctors use to check for COPD progression is to have you breathe while raising your arms over your head. Why? They're looking for a change known as "barrel chest," which describes a particular posture and body shape that tends to develop as a secondary symptom of COPD.
As a result of chronic inflammation, the lungs become enlarged and push the diaphragm downward, which makes it harder for the diaphragm to contract as efficiently. The chest wall becomes enlarged as well, weakening muscles in the chest, neck, and between the ribs; these are known as the "accessory respiratory muscles." When this happens, people with COPD unconsciously try to compensate by leaning forward when sitting, with their arms on their knees or in front of them. This posture stabilizes the upper chest and shoulders, making it easier to use the accessory breathing muscles.
7. A Bluish Tinge To Lips Or Fingernails
Over time, if your blood doesn't circulate enough oxygen throughout your body, your lips and fingernails can take on a blue or gray tone. Sometimes the color, known as cyanosis, is most apparent in the nail beds; some people develop an overall grayish-blue tinge to the skin. The cause: Oxygen-rich blood is bright red, while blood with less oxygen turns dark and bluish-colored.
In dark-skinned people, the discoloration is most visible in the lips, gums, and around the eyes, and it can be easier to spot. Cyanosis usually occurs when oxygen levels in the blood drop below 90 percent. A doctor can check this for you; you can also monitor it yourself using a finger pulse oximeter, available in medical supply stores.

event_or_fact.property: Sleep is also hard for people with COPD because they may cough throughout the night, waking themselves up or interrupting deep sleep
What's happening is that you're not breathing deeply enough at night, and the carbon dioxide builds up while you're sleeping
I ask people, how's your breathing compared to last year -- can you do what you used to do a year ago?
As lungs get progressively worse, the ability of the body to compensate goes down and the heart can't pump strongly enough

Many people start to experience shortness of breath, and they just think 'I'm old, I'm out of shape,' and they don't do anything about it other than cutting back their activity level; Then when you have shortness of breath just getting to the bathroom, al
physician and professor, Columbia University Medical Center
If you cough up mucus that's any other color than clear, that can be a sign your condition is worsening
the lung damage that constitutes COPD can't be reversed; all you can do is halt or slow the progression of the disease.

description.hltext_display: Hochwasser in Los Angeles - Orkan im Anzug
description.content:
vor 20 Min.
Los Angeles (dpa) - Nach anhaltenden Regenfällen mit Überschwemmungen wird der Süden Kaliforniens auch von orkanartigen Stürmen bedroht. Das nationale US-Wetteramt hat für Los Angeles und die Region eine Sturmwarnung ausgegeben. Die Evakuierung besonders gefährdeter Regionen werde vorbereitet, berichtet die «Los Angeles Times». Durch die schweren Regenfälle drohe Flutgefahr auch in den ebenen Gebieten rund um die Millionenmetropole.

description.hltext_display: 日本代表に田児、広瀬ら＝池田、潮田や末綱、前田も－バドミントン（時事通信）
جعفر رجب / تحت الحزام / حكمة الوزير العبدالله
description.content:
ما بين الحكة والحكمة حرف، واختفاء حرف واحد انحراف وانجراف، فالحكة تعني ان يضع الانسان يده على رأسه ثم يحكه، قد يكون سببه استغرابا او وجود قشرة... اما الحكمة فتأتي من داخل الرأس لا خارجه، ولا يوجد حكيم يفرك رأسه بل يضع يده تحت ذقنه ثم يجلس متأملا متألما... وما اسعد الجهلاء ومن يحكون رؤوسهم ولا يستعملونها!
ننتقل عبر بث مباشر الى الوزير الحكيم السيد وزير الاعلام الشيخ احمد العبدالله المبجل، حيث اجاب عن الصحافيين بحكمة خالدة قال فيها «والله العظيم انتو ما تفهمون طبعا ليس كل حكمة يمكن معرفتها، فبعضها عميق ويحتاج الى رؤية ثلاثية الابعاد، وحكمته دامت بركات عميقة عمق تقرير ديوان المحاسبة عن وزارة الاعلام، وبعمق الكهف الذي خبأ به لصوص الاعلام مسروقاتهم!
الوزير اقسم، والوزير قسمه «غير فعندما يقسم مثلا ان يخدم وطنه ويراعي مصلحة الناس فهو قسم حقيقي و«طالع من قلب، وعندما قال الوزير فقوله حق وهو صادق في ما يقول، والصحافيون كاذبون وما يفهمون، واليكم ادلة صدقه:
1. اولا لو كان الصحافي يفهم، ما سأل وزير الاعلام، عن اي قضية في الاعلام!
2. ولو كان الصحافيون يفهمون لما عملوا صحافيين من الاساس، ولبحثوا عن مهنة شريفة!
3. الوزير قال ما يفهمون لانه عندما سألوه عن الاعلام كان لابس وزير نفط، «لازم ينطرون يلبس لبس وزير اعلام ويسألونه! 4. لو الصحافيون يفهمون، لا يسألونه وينتظرون الاجابة، يفترض ان يسألوا ثم نيابة عنه يجيبوا، ويكتبوا قال الوزير قبل سؤاله «بان الامور تسير وفق آلية واضحة التزاما بالقانون والدستور وماله داع يتعبون الوزير، فهو وزير اعلام ونفط، وكما تعرفون دوام النفط شفتات وتعب!
5. لو كانوا يفهمون لما سألوه مثل هذه الاسئلة، هو قال من قبل عند تعيين الزنكي في النفط، انه ماله شغل، فهو ماله شغل... ليش مو راضيين يفهمون!
6. لا اعلم لماذا لا يفهم الصحافيون انه لا يوجد احد يفهم، الا الوزير الاعلامي النفطي بارك الله فيه وارضاه ومنع عنه الحسد، وكره الناس، وحب الشباب، والحساسية... وجعله ذخرا لنا ولاجيالنا القادمة... قولوا آمين...!
جعفر رجب
jjaaffar@hotmail.com p

description.hltext_display: DIHK: Winterwetter könnte Wirtschaftswachstum um 0,5 Prozent dämpfen
description.content:
vor 13 Min.
Das strenge Winterwetter könnte das Wirtschaftswachstum erheblich bremsen: Eine lange und schneereiche Frostperiode könne drei Milliarden Euro Wertschöpfung kosten - was eine Verlangsamung des Wirtschaftswachstums um einem halben Prozentpunkt im Quartal bedeute, sagte der Chefvolkswirt des Deutschen Industrie- und Handelskammertages (DIHK), Volker Treier, der "Berliner Zeitung" (Mittwochsausgabe). Er verwies auf die Erfahrungen zu Beginn dieses Jahres, als ähnliche Wetterbedingungen herrschten. Deutschlands Wirtschaft war in den ersten Monaten nur um 0,6 Prozent im Vergleich zum Vorquartal gewachsen.

description.hltext_display: Mass. Officers Tackle Would-Be Bank Robber
description.content:
A Massachusetts State Police trooper and a Somerville police detective tackled a would-be bank robber as he approached the Cambridge Trust Bank in Cambridge on Monday.
Paul Gowell, 53, of Wakefield, had been under police surveillance for several days, police said. He was taken into custody as he walked up to the bank shortly before 11 a.m.
"There are clues left behind. We haven't quite connected all the dots or certainly didn't have enough to obtain an arrest warrant and therefore we were (watching him) for additional information," said Randy Jarvis, of the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force.
At the time of his arrest, police said he was wearing a baseball cap, hooded sweatshirt and gloves. Police watched him change into those clothes after he parked behind the bank on a side street, according to Massachusetts State Police.
When Gowell drove up to the bank, two members of the FBI alerted the bank. The workers locked the doors, while State Trooper Michael Grassia and Somerville Police Detective John Oliveria stood in the entranceway.
Authorities said Gowell put on a mask when he got outside the bank's main entrance.
"As he approached the bank they witnessed him put a handkerchief over his face and begin to enter the bank," Jarvis said
The officers tackled him before he entered the bank.

description.hltext_display: 白鵬、将来の夢へ永住許可申請済み／大相撲（サンケイスポーツ）
2010 Goes Viral: YouTube's Best Videos
description.content:
YouTube has become such a part of our lives that it sometimes seems like it's been around forever.
In reality, the website only turned 5 years old this year. Then again, five years might as well be five decades when it comes to the Internet.
The video sharing site has grown so fast for one reason: everybody loves a good viral video. After all, nothing gets an office buzzing or sends e-mails flying quite like a sneezy baby Panda or a home video of a stupid person about to do something even stupider.
Every year brings great viral videos, but 2010 was a banner year, almost as if the video gods planned a special treat for YouTube's fifth birthday. With that in mind, we sorted through the best videos of the year to come up with the following five viral gems.
Viral Video No. 5: So Beautiful! PREV Intro 5 4 3 2 1 NEXT Distributed by Internet Broadcasting. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: Szász Károly: Meg kell szüntetni a bankadót
description.content:
A magyar pénzügyi közvetítő rendszer stabil, a működését rövidtávon, alapvetően fenyegető veszély nem látható; hosszabb távon, a pénzügyi rendszer nemzetközi versenyképessége szempontjából fontos lenne, hogy a bankadó tervezhető legyen - nyilatkozta a PSZÁF elnöke az MTI-nek.
Szász Károly ismertette: a nemzetközi és hazai gazdasági környezet az idén kedvezőbbé vált. Az intézményeknek ugyanakkor most kell megküzdeniük a pénzügyi-gazdasági válság hatásaival - többek között az eszközminőség romlásával, ami az értékvesztés megképzésén keresztül rontja a jövedelmezőségüket -, ezek ugyanis fáziskéséssel jelentkeznek az amerikai és európai piacokhoz képest, ahol a válság már korábban lezajlott, és hatása "brutálisabb" volt, mint nálunk.
A magyar pénzügyi rendszer az elnök szerint viszonylag jól teljesített a válságban, kevésbé sérült a gazdaság többi szereplőjéhez képest, amiben szerepe volt annak is, hogy a válság első szakaszában a bankok pozíciójukból fakadóan még át tudták hárítani a terheket ügyfeleikre. Ezt jelzi, hogy amikor az európai és amerikai bankok már veszteségesek voltak, és felszámolásokra, fúziókra került sor, a magyar hitelintézetek még kiemelkedő eredményeket könyveltek el.
Az idén azonban már összességében nullszaldós, de az is lehet, hogy veszteséges lesz a magyar pénzügyi rendszer. Ebben a válság mellett szerepe van annak is, hogy jelentősen megváltozott a nemzetközi és a hazai szabályozási környezet, szigorodtak például a fogyasztóvédelmi szabályok, s ehhez társult a bankadó bevezetése. A válság következményeinek felszámolása ezért most már a tartalékok felélésével folyik. A pénzügyi rendszer teljesítménye és alkalmazkodóképessége azonban a PSZÁF elnöke szerint a válság második szakaszában is jó.
Szász Károly szerint a pénzügyi intézmények már elfogadták a bankadót, mint "a válság terheihez való közösségi hozzájárulás" formáját. Szükségesnek tartaná azonban, hogy az adó mértéke és alkalmazása hosszabb távon összhangba kerüljön az uniós szabályozással, vagy fokozatosan megszűnjön. A tervezhetőség hiánya ugyanis ronthatja a nemzetközi versenyképességet, nemkívánatos tendenciák jelentkezhetnek, így például elindulhat a fiókosodási folyamat, a bankok visszafoghatják teljesítményüket.
Az elnök hangsúlyozta: kulcskérdés, hogy a magyarországi hitelezés elinduljon, ehhez pedig a tőkeerős, devizaforrásokkal rendelkező intézmények mindegyikére szükség van. A hitelezés visszafogása a gazdasági növekedés lassulását jelentené, ezért fontos volna, hogy a vállalati és a lakossági hitelezés is minél előbb visszaálljon a korábbi szintre.
A parlament által az elmúlt félévben elfogadott jogszabályváltozásokról - a PSZÁF januártól önálló alkotmányos szerv lesz, rendeletet alkothat, a fogyasztók érdekében közérdekű pert indíthat, és a jövő év közepétől pénzügyi békéltető testületet működtethet - elmondta: nagyon örül a felügyelet által kapott lehetőségeknek, ugyanakkor ennek nagy felelősségét is átérzi. A jogszabály szerint ugyanis a PSZÁF lesz a felelős a pénzügyi közvetítő rendszer működtetéséért és a pénzügyi szabályozásért, ami óriási feladat. A felkészülést erre már megkezdték - tette hozzá.
A rendeletalkotási jog kapcsán hangsúlyozta: ez nem korlátlan felhatalmazás, hanem az ágazati törvények alapján, konkrét területek szabályozására vonatkozik. A felügyelet azt tervezi, hogy a rendeletalkotással összefüggő jogszabályi előírások betartásán túl általános konzultációs lehetőséget biztosít a szakmának. A közvetítő rendszer érdekképviseleti szerveinek és a jelentősebb intézmények vezetőinek megkérdezése mellett a tudományos, az oktatási és az üzleti szféra tapasztalatait is szeretnék hasznosítani.
Megjegyezte: a szabályozás az Európai Unióban is hasonló irányban változik. Mivel a direktívákban nem lehet a nagyon bonyolult pénzügyi szolgáltatások teljes sprektumát szabályozni, különböző végrehajtási rendeleteket bocsátanak ki.
A pénzügyi békéltető testületek működéséről elmondta: a felügyelet létre fog hozni egy országos hálózatot a fogyasztóvédelmi szervezetekkel együttműködve, s a helyi képviselők segítenek majd abban, hogy a pénzügyi szolgáltatásokkal kapcsolatos ügyfélproblémák közvetlenül a szolgáltatónál megoldódjanak. Ha ez nem sikerül, az ügyfél eldöntheti, hogy a bírósághoz vagy a békéltető testülethez fordul. A pénzügyi békéltető testületek működése a PSZÁF-tól független lesz, de a felügyelet biztosítja, hogy az ezekben az ügyekben eljáró mini választottbírósági fórumok jól képzett jogász, közgazdász "bírókból" álljanak, ami már önmagában tekintélyt teremt.
Szász Károly megjegyezte: az intézményeknek mindenképpen együtt kell működniük a békéltető testületekkel. Ez azt jelenteni, hogy rendelkezésre kell bocsátaniuk azokat az információkat, amelyeket az ügyfél kér, és az eljárásban részt kell venniük. Ellenkező esetben a felügyelet határozatával erre kötelezheti, és szankcionálhatja a szolgáltatót.
Ha valamely intézmény nem veti alá magát a békéltető testület döntésének, a felügyelet ajánlást ad ki, amit a békéltető testület honlapján is közzétesznek, így üzenetértéke lesz. A felügyeleti elnök arra számít, ha a felek látják majd, hogy a testületek szakszerűen, hatékonyan és gyorsan működnek, jobban respektálják majd az alternatív vitarendezési eljárást.
A magatartási kódex előírásait az intézmények túlnyomó többsége igyekezett betartani, a dokumentum azonban módosításra szorul, mert a megszületése óta eltelt több mint egy év alatt számos jogszabály változott (például már egyáltalán nem lehet egyoldalúan módosítani a költségeket, jutalékokat, s a kamatváltozás feltételei is tovább szigorodtak), a felügyelet ezért azt javasolta a szakma képviselőinek, hogy a változásokat figyelembe véve alakítsák át a kódexet - mondta Szász Károly.

description.hltext_display: سعد المعطش / رماح / أكل الوزارة أم أوكل لها
description.content:
في السينما هناك أهداف عدة يحاول بعض المنتجين تحقيقها وغالبا ما تكون تلك الأهداف متوافقة مع أهداف ومصالح جهات أخرى كالربح المادي أو لتوصيل رسالة معينة للمتلقي والمشاهد للتأثير عليه.
في السينما العربية القديمة كانت غالبية تلك الأفلام تظهر لنا البطل الذي يتناول المشروبات الكحولية ويدخن السجائر ويكون زير نساء، أما البطلة فيجب أن تكون مدخنة وراقصة جيدة ولا بأس من بعض كؤوس من الشمبانيا في بعض المشاهد.
كان الهدف من تلك الأفلام تحطيم أخلاقيات المجتمع ومبادئه التي جبل عليها حتى أصبحت العلاقات بين الجنسين أمرا غير مستغرب في بعض المجتمعات العربية وكأنه وضع طبيعي لدرجة المجاهرة به وهذا ما كان اليهود يبحثون عنه من أجل تفشي كل العادات السيئة في المجتمع الإسلامي والعربي المحافظ وهذا ما كان يسمى بحرية الإعلام.
وزارة الإعلام في الكويت تقوم بدور أخطر بكثير من كل المشاهد الساخنة في الأفلام العربية فهي المتهم الأول بتفكيك المجتمع وبعثرة وحدته الوطنية التي كنا نفاخر بها ونعتبرها سلاحنا الأول ضد أي عدوان وهذا ما حدث فعلا أثناء الغزو العراقي للكويت.
لقد تركت الجمل بما حمل لمن يريد ضرب النسيج الاجتماعي تحت ذريعة الإعلام الحر وأخذت تتفرج على الاسفاف والتطاول على أهل الكويت من خلال بعض القنوات التي يدعمها المنتجون الخفيون وأصبح بعض مسؤولي وزارة الإعلام متفرغين لأكل الوزارة وبيع أرشيفها وهذا أثبته ديوان المحاسبة.
أدام الله من راقب الله في عمله الذي أوكل به ولا دام من أكل الوزارة وميزانيتها...
سعد المعطش
saad.almotish@hotmail.com p

description.hltext_display: Konstanz bereits schneefrei
description.content:
vor 6 Min.
Offenbach/Konstanz (dpa) - Konstanz am Bodensee ist der einzige Ort ohne Schnee in den bundesweiten Messungen des Deutschen Wetterdienstes DWD. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
Die Stadt im äußersten Süden Deutschlands war mit Stand vom Dienstagabend schneefrei und verzeichnete in der Nacht zum Mittwoch mit plus drei Grad eine in diesen Tagen milde Temperatur.
Alle übrigen über ganz Deutschland verteilten 64 Orte, von denen die DWD-Zentrale in Offenbach Schneehöhen abruft, waren eingeschneit. An der Spitze lag der Brocken im Harz, wo sich die Flocken auf 155 Zentimetern Höhe stapelten. Auf der Zugspitze waren es nur fünf Zentimeter weniger. Selbst auf den Nordseeinseln Norderney, Sylt und Helgoland blieb die weiße Pracht liegen - was dort selten ist.
Allerdings sagten die Meteorologen in ihrer ersten Prognose am frühen Mittwochmorgen Tauwetter für den ganzen Süden voraus. Im Laufe des Tages könnte der Schnee dort also an vielen Orten fortschmelzen.

description.hltext_display: クボタ、従業員作った歌励みに残留だ／ＴＬ（サンケイスポーツ）
Hatályos a pénztártörvény, lehet nyilatkozni a kasszaválasztásról
description.content:
Hatályos a múlt héten elfogadott nyugdíjtörvény, ezért ügyfélként hívogattunk nyugdíjkirendeltségeket a pénztárválasztással kapcsolatos felvilágosításért. Az volt a kérdésünk, hogy akkor most mi a teendő? A legtöbb nyugdíjiroda elfogadható felvilágosítást adott, két helyen azonban teljes volt a tanácstalanság, ezeknél azt a tanácsot kaptuk, hogy majd januárban érdeklődjünk. Pedig mostantól mindenhol lehet nyilatkozni azoknak, akik kasszatagok maradnának.
Több mint egy hét telt el . A Magyar Közlönyben való megjelenéssel kedden hatályba lépett jogszabály kapcsán időszerűnek láttuk tesztelni a nyugdíjbiztosító területi kirendeltésgeit, hogy vajon felkészültek-e a pénztárváltással kapcsolatos teendőikre. Ügyfélként még a kihirdetés előtt, kedden napközben tárcsáztuk a zalaegerszegi, soproni, szombathelyi, esztergomi, balassagyarmati, debreceni, nyíregyházi és kaposvári nyugdíjirodát.
A beszélgetésekből úgy éreztük, hogy a legalapvetőbb tényekkel – a törvény fontosabb részleteivel, a határidőkkel és a váltás következményeivel – mindenhol pontosan tisztában vannak, sőt, egy-egy ügyfélszolgálaton kérdezés nélkül is elmondták, hogy milyen következményei vannak a nyilatkozat kitöltésének.
Ez nem kis előrelépés az egy héttel ezelőtti állapothoz képest. Egy index-olvasó múlt heti beszámolója szerint az egyik fővárosi ügyfélszolgálaton azzal zavarták el, hogy a maradóknak a saját magánnyugdíjpénztárukban kell nyilatkozniuk, illetve, hogy nem kell személyesen megjelenni, a kitöltött nyilatkozatot postai úton is fel lehet adni. Az ügyintéző mindkét dolog kapcsán tévedett, nem a pénztáraknál kell nyilatkozni hanem a nyugdíjbiztosító kirendeltségein, és mindezt csak személyesen lehet megtenni.
Tapasztalataink szerint mára sokat javult a helyzet. Országszerte összesen nyolc nyugdíjirodát hívtuk föl, az alapvető tényekkel mindenhol tisztában voltak. Csak szombathelyi és zalaegerszegi ügyfélként tettük le a telefont csalódva. Lényegében mindkét helyen azt mondták, hogy semmilyen információt nem kaptak arról, mi lesz a teendőjük az ügyben, januárban telefonáljunk be újból, hátha akkora többet tudnak mondani.
A többi irodában azt hallottuk, hogy készen van az adatfeldolgozáshoz szükséges szoftver és megvannak a nyomtatványok is, csak arra várnak, hogy a jogszabály megjelenjen a közlönyben. Az azonosításhoz a személyi igazolvány, a lakcímkártya és a taj kártya kell, ezt mindenhol el is mondták, illetve több helyen említették, hogy szükség lesz a nyugdíjpénztárral kötött szerződésre is (de legalábbis valamilyen módon igazolni kell, hogy melyik nyugdíjpénztár tagjai vagyunk.)
A legtájékozottabb irodisták azt is tudták, hogy a nyilatkozatot három példányban kell kitölteni, az egyiket megkapjuk, ezt öt napon belül be kell mutatni a munkaadónak, a másik kettő pedig a nyugdíjbiztosítási főigazgatóságra kerül, innen érkezik majd a nyugdíjpénztárhoz. A soproni, debreceni, nyíregyházi és kaposvári nyugdíjbiztosítónál is említették, hogy január végéig meghosszabbított ügyfélfogadási idővel várják a pénztártagok nyilatkozatait.

description.hltext_display: Crime Beat: Man assaulted while holding a child
description.content:
EDITOR’S NOTE: The following is a summary of some crime reports taken from the Greeley Police Department’s daily log. Only a few of the hundreds of reports will be used in this weekly column because of space limitations.
4:11 a.m.: A woman reported her boyfriend was drunk, angry and “breaking up the house.” Officers arrived at the house and separated the man and woman who were fighting. The man had damaged the home and furniture, which belonged to his girlfriend. He was arrested on charges of domestic violence and criminal mischief.
9:41 a.m.: A report was made from University High that a student was threatening another student. A school resource officer will handle the situation and the Weld District Attorney’s Office will determine if charges should be filed.
2:50 p.m.: A report was received from a man who said his neighbors were engaged in “illicit activity.” An officer will follow up.
9:22 p.m.: An officer on patrol noticed a suspicious man in the 3400 block of 28th Street. The officer contacted the man, checked his identification and found a warrant for his arrest. The man was booked into the Weld County Jail.

description.hltext_display: Report says fatal bullet ricocheted off Weld deputy's badge
description.content:
DA's investigation clears Evans police officer who killed suspect in last month's deadly chase, shootout
mpeters@greeleytribune.com
Share on FacebookEmail Print Comment
Copyright 2010 The Greeley Publishing Co.. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. December, 22 2010 12:37 am DA's investigation clears Evans police officer who killed suspect in last month's deadly chase, shootout
ENLARGE
Brownlee
The bullet that killed Weld County sheriff's deputy Sam Brownlee last month ricocheted off his badge and hit him in the face.
The Weld District Attorney's Office on Tuesday released the results of a monthlong investigation into the shooting deaths of Brownlee and the man who shot him with the officer's own gun. Calling the shooting of the suspect justified, the report said no charges will be filed against the Evans police officer who shot the gunman three times in the back.
Brownlee was killed on Nov. 23, following a long car chase from Fort Morgan, in which three other agencies had called off their chase “out of concerns for public safety.” Brownlee became the first Weld Sheriff's deputy killed in the line of duty in nearly 70 years.
The deputy was shot by Rueben Reyes, 20, a gang member who had stolen his girlfriend's car in Fort Morgan 30 minutes before the confrontation.
The 43-mile chase ended in Evans, and in the midst of a chaotic struggle on the ground with three deputies and an Evans police officer, Reyes took Brownlee's .45-caliber service handgun from his holster and fired three times.
The report stated: “Deputy Brownlee suffered one gunshot wound to his right hand. Two additional rounds struck Deputy Brownlee in the left chest. The body armor worn by Deputy Brownlee captured one round. The second round also struck the body armor, but appears to have been deflected by Deputy Brownlee's badge. This round appears to have followed the contour of the vest and then exited the vest before entering Deputy Brownlee's face, resulting in the fatal wound.”
The name of the Evans officer who then shot Reyes will not be released, according to Evans police policies.
According to the report, the officers chasing Reyes ordered him out of the car, but “Mr. Reyes continued his belligerent and evasive actions.”
Reyes had earlier told his grandmother that he was suicidal and said he would rather die than go back to prison.
The chase began when Reyes grabbed the car keys from his girlfriend's hand and drove off in her car. She first reported the theft to Fort Morgan police, but said she didn't want to file charges.
A short time later, Reyes called his girlfriend's mother and said he wanted to return the car and talk. Fort Morgan officers were parked in the neighborhood when Reyes drove up in the car. He then sped off, starting the chase.
Before it ended in Evans, the Fort Morgan police, Colorado State Patrol and the Greeley police called off their pursuit. Evans police joined the chase with Weld sheriff's deputies as the cars entered Evans city limits.
Morgan County dispatchers warned the deputies and police officers that Reyes was “dangerous and possibly armed, but that was not known for sure.” The report also stated, “In fact, there was no evidence that Mr. Reyes was possibly armed.”
When the chase ended in the 3200 block of Coyote Lane in west Evans, Deputy Terry Reed pulled his patrol car alongside Reyes' car, and the deputy got out of his car with his gun drawn. He said later that Reyes then pointed his finger at the deputy, imitating a gun and made a motion like he was shooting.
Several times, Reed ordered Reyes out of the car, but the report said it would have been difficult to hear because Reyes' car horn was blaring because of a malfunction, and there were air horns and sirens approaching from other police cars.
Two Evans officers were at the back of the car, one armed with a shotgun, the other with a Taser. Two deputies were on the passenger side of the car, and all were shouting for Reyes to show his hands and get out of the car. An Evans officer tried to Tase Reyes, but his baggy clothing prevented him from being shocked. Reyes slumped down for a second, then lunged at the officers.
While Brownlee and two other deputies tried to restrain Reyes, the Evans police officer tackled the suspect, knocking the deputies to the ground with him, the report said. In the middle of the pile, Reyes was Tasered again, this time on his bare skin, and the officers released their grips on him so they wouldn't be shocked.
That's when Brownlee shouted “He's got my gun!”
Another deputy, holding Reyes' right hand, shouted “He doesn't have your gun, I have his hand!” But Brownlee continued to shout that Reyes had his gun. That's when the officers heard three shots, and Brownlee had “gone limp.”
The unidentified Evans officer then shot Reyes three times in the back.
Police said Brownlee's holster had a cover that prevented someone from pulling the gun out from the front, but Reyes apparently reached around Brownlee's back and pulled the weapon from behind.
Greeley Police Officer Dan Czapenski arrived at the scene as he heard the shots, and saw deputies performing CPR on Brownlee. The officer placed handcuffs on the wounded Reyes to ensure the safety of the officers.
The district attorney's report concluded that the Evans officer was “justified in using lethal force against Mr. Reyes because he reasonably believed that it was necessary to defend himself and/or others from Mr. Reyes, use and continued threatened use of deadly physical force.”
District Attorney Ken Buck said no charges will be filed.
Evans Police Chief Rick Brandt put the officer back to work last week, being notified then that no charges would be filed. Brandt said the internal investigation into Evans officers' involvement in the chase will now begin and could take from 10-14 days.
“Now that the DA has cleared our officer, we're starting our internal review, and it was given to IA (Internal Affairs) today. The chase portion is going through a standard pursuit review.”
Brandt said Evans' chase policy is that officers “will normally not” engage in chases that come into city limits, but decisions are subject to officers' discretion based on circumstances.
“Our policy doesn't say ‘thou shalt not,' ” but it does give sergeants leeway, Brandt said.
Weld Sheriff John Cooke said he has formed a committee to review the police report on the chase and shooting, “And then we'll look at training and policies to see if anything needs to be changed.”
He said among the changes they will consider are pursuits, felony car stops, the type of holsters the deputies use and the vests they wear.
Cooke also said, “Involving a chase, if an officer is out of his jurisdiction, they usually turn it over to the local departments to continue.” He said the chase, from the Morgan County line to Evans, was inside the sheriff's jurisdiction.
Buck said some police departments involved in the incident have been contacted by an attorney representing Reyes' family, and said they are looking into the case, possibly for the purpose of filing a civil suit.
Tribune reporter Sharon Dunn contributed to this report.
Chase timeline
» 9:37 a.m.: Fort Morgan police receive stolen vehicle report.
» 9:45 a.m.: Fort Morgan officer contacts owner of car Rueben Reyes was driving.
» 10:02 a.m.: Morgan County dispatch airs be-on-the-lookout for Reyes.
» 10:09 a.m.: Reyes arrives at home of vehicle owner; police are waiting. Fort Morgan officers briefly pursue him, but call off.
» 10:29 a.m.: Wiggins police officer begins chase at U.S. 34 and Morgan County Road 4.
» 10:35 a.m.: Morgan dispatch notifies Weld County dispatch of the pursuit, approaching 100 miles per hour; driver was dangerous and possibly armed.
» 10:36:40 a.m.: Weld dispatcher enters call into the Computer Aided Dispatch system as “Dangerous Possible Armed … High Speed Chase.”
» 10:37:41 a.m.: Weld Dispatch notes “suspect is armed and dangerous, armed robbery occurred in Morgan, speeds are 107 mph.”
» 10:37:42 a.m.: Weld sheriff's deputies Terry Reed and Sam Brownlee dispatched to assist in pursuit.
» 10:40 a.m.: Colorado State Patrol joins pursuit.
» 10:44 a.m.: Deputies Reed and Brownlee begin pursuit.
» 10:46 a.m.: State patrol advises they have stop sticks on U.S. 34 at mile marker 120 and mile marker 114.
» 10:47:33 a.m.: Weld Sheriff Commander Bill Spalding asks what the suspect is armed with.
» 10:50:35 a.m.: Reyes avoids stop sticks and jumps median on U.S. 34, traveling into oncoming traffic.
(Wiggins officer pulls out of the chase.)
As chase enters Greeley, Colorado State Patrol are called off; Greeley police are ordered not to engage by on-duty sergeant.
(Weld sergeant suggests possibility of calling off the pursuit.)
» 10:51:32 a.m.: Officer One (who remains unnamed in the report) joins pursuit.
(Weld sergeant again suggests possibility of calling off the pursuit.)
» 10:58:48 a.m.: Officer One advises dispatch that suspect vehicle is stopped.
Radio contact broken while officers attempt to remove Reyes from the car.
» Approximately 11:02 a.m.: Officers radio for help after Brownlee is shot.
Source: Weld District Attorney's report on final investigation of Rueben Reyes. Some portions also came from scanner traffic captured by radioreference.com.

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念】“江戸前”占いタコ、２強に断 キングダムに軍配（サンケイスポーツ）
وليد الرجيب / أصبوحة / قرارات تشبه الكويت الحقيقية
description.content:
في لقائه مع الأدباء والمفكرين والفنانين يوم الاثنين 20 ديسمبر الجاري، قال سمو رئيس الوزراء الشيخ ناصر المحمد الصباح في ما معناه: أن الحكومة ستدعم في خطة التنمية طموحات الأدباء والفنانين لأن الاستثمار الحقيقي هو الاستثمار البشري، وإن للأدباء والفنانين دورا اجتماعيا مهما. كما نشرت جريدة «القبس في عددها الصادر يوم السبت 18 ديسمبر الجاري، خبراً مفاده أن البلدية وافقت على تخصيص مساحة لدار الأوبرا في العاصمة، وخصصت مواقع لمراكز ثقافية ومسرحاً في كل محافظة.
وقد كتبت مقالات عدة، قلت فيها ان أي تنمية تعني، أن الثقافة أولاً والتعليم أولاً، فلا تنمية بلا ثقافة، إذ لا معنى للمباني والطرقات والمشروعات حتى ذات المردود الاقتصادي، إذا لم نستثمر في عقلية وروح الإنسان، ومن غير الطبيعي أن تكون المباني والأجهزة حديثة، وعقلية الإنسان متخلفة، كما أنه لا ضمانة لاستمرار التطور والتقدم سواء في الأنظمة والإدارة أو في المظاهر المدنية والحضرية في ظل عقليات تعيش في الماضي أو تعيش في أمية ثقافية بسبب تخلف التعليم وإهمال للثقافة والفنون وعناصرهما.
فتقدم الأمم يقاس بما وصل الإنسان إليه، لا بالأبراج والمباني والسلع الاستهلاكية، فالتعليم والثقافة هما من الصناعات الثقيلة، أي الصناعات التي تنتج ثقافات وعقليات وشخصيات بناءة وفاعلة.
ومراجعة سريعة إلى واقع التعليم والثقافة في كويت الحاضر، اللذين تميزت بهما الكويت خلال عقود، نجد انهما تراجعا وبشكل ملموس في السنوات الأخيرة، فمناهج التعليم والسياسات التربوية، أدت إلى مخرجات ضعيفة علمياً وثقافياً، فتخريج مدرسين ومدرسات ضعفاء تعليمياً، وعبر أجيال، ينتج عنه ضعف جدلي عبر السنوات، ولا تكمن هزالة المناهج الدراسية، في تخلفها عن مواكبة التعليم في العالم، وكونها تركز على التلقين والحفظ، ولكنها أيضاً تكمن في التوجهات التعصبية والمتخلفة التي فرضها الإسلام السياسي عليها في السنوات الماضية، وحتى التعليم الجامعي تراجع عن أهدافه الأساسية، وتم التراخي والتغاضي عن الشهادات المشتراة والمزورة، فأصبح لدينا في جامعة الكويت، ومعاهد التعليم التطبيقي، بعض الأساتذة الذين ليسوا بمستوى الدور العلمي المنوط بهم.
أما الثقافة السائدة وتجلياتها الأدبية والفكرية والفنية، فلا يمكن مقارنتها بالثقافة السائدة قبل سنوات، فعلى المستويين الرسمي والأهلي، انحدرت إلى أدنى مستوياتها، حتى أضحت لا تمثل الشخصية الكويتية والعقلية الكويتية، التي عرفت بحبها للثقافة والأدب والفن.
فوعد سمو رئيس الوزراء لأهل الأدب والفكر والفن، والذي نشكره عليه، وتخصيص البلدية مواقع لدار الأوبرا والمراكز الثقافية، هما استحقاقان طال انتظارهما، وهما في الواقع يشبهان الكويت التي يعرفها من في الداخل والخارج، وهما يمثلان عدالة حكومية في ما بين الرياضة والاقتصاد والثقافة، والعقبى للتعليم وأشياء أخرى.
وليد الرجيب osbohatw@gmail.com

description.hltext_display: Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild
description.content:
vor 8 Min.
Offenbach (dpa) - Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen. « », bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach am frühen Mittwoch. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall.
Für den Heiligabend am Freitag sagt der DWD für weite Teile Deutschlands leichten Schneefall voraus. Bei Temperaturen um den Gefrierpunkt soll es zunächst am Vormittag in Berlin, Frankfurt/Main, Stuttgart und München noch Regen oder Schneeregen geben, zum Abend hin wird es dann laut Prognose aber deutschlandweit leicht schneien.

description.hltext_display: Md. Troopers in 3-State Tractor-Trailer Pursuit
description.content:
After wrecking the tractor-trailer on Interstate 81, the driver resisted arrest and was subdued with a Taser and a police dog, according to Pennsylvania State Police, Chambersburg.
Thomas L. McNeel, 42, Pontotoc, Miss., is charged with 17 crimes and traffic violations in Pennsylvania. He was arraigned Monday afternoon before Magisterial District Judge Duane Cunningham, then taken to Franklin County Jail. He is being held in lieu of $250,000 bail.
Charges are pending in Maryland and West Virginia, according to Cunningham.
Police brought McNeel to Cunningham's office in restraints. The trucker wore a battered pair of cowboy boots, a heavy winter jacket and blue jeans, and he spoke with a thick southern accent.
When police took him into custody following the chase on Interstate 81, McNeel was reportedly disoriented, telling officers that he thought it was Wednesday and that he was in Georgia.
According to police, troopers were dispatched shortly before 9 a.m. to the state line to intercept a purple 1998 Freightliner pulling a white trailer and being pursued by Maryland State Police. The rig was allegedly involved in "numerous hit and runs" in Maryland and West Virginia.
No injuries were reported in any of the three states where the pursuit took place, according to Pennsylvania State Police spokesperson Trooper Tom Pinkerton.
When the rig crossed into Pennsylvania, it was "being pursued by numerous marked and unmarked police cars from Maryland and West Virginia," according to the affidavit. A trooper deployed "stop sticks" on the highway at the border, and the truck hit them.
Pinkerton said stop sticks are devices "used to deflate a fleeing vehicle's tires." He declined to discuss exactly how they are designed or used by PSP, because, "techniques used to stop a pursuit are protected by state law."
The truck continued north after crossing the border, with about 15 police vehicles following it, according to the affidavit. As the pursuit continued, the truck began to "weave all over the roadway," driving onto the median three times.
McNeel is also accused of "intentionally try(ing) to run motor vehicles off the road" during the portion of the chase that took place in Pennsylvania. Pinkerton said the typical loaded tractor-trailer weighs about 40 tons.
Police said McNeel was traveling at about 35 mph without tires on the front two wheels of his rig. By the time the truck reached the Greencastle exit at mile marker 5, "both front tires of the power unit were no longer there and the operator was barely able to keep control," the affidavit states.
McNeel attempted to exit the highway, then changed his mind and lost control, crashing into the median and stopping. Both lanes of I-81 were closed until about 10:30 a.m. as a result.
Two troopers approached the wrecked truck and commanded the driver to get out, but he allegedly refused. When police used a Taser on McNeel's chest, he attempted to enter the truck's sleeping compartment and a police dog was sent in after him, according to police.
During the arrest, police allegedly found a "white powdery substance" and a plastic straw for "snorting drugs" in McNeel's possession. He allegedly told police that he had ingested methamphetamine, but was "generally incoherent" during the arrest.

description.hltext_display: Red Sox add Jenks to bullpen
description.content: Boston, MA (Sports Network) - The Boston Red Sox made it official with Bobby Jenks on Tuesday as the reliever signed a two-year contract on Tuesday. Last Thursday, the Boston Globe reported that the deal will pay the hard- throwing right-hander $12 million, although no financial terms were disclosed. The 29-year-old Jenks has compiled a 14-18 record with a 3.40 earned run average and 173 saves over the last six seasons, all with the White Sox. He was not tendered a contract by the Chicago White Sox two weeks ago, making him a free agent. Jenks is initially expected to be used in a set-up role to Boston closer Jonathan Papelbon.

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content:
vor 7 Min.
Berlin (dpa) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
Man habe mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrührten, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. Die Politik werde zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht würden, so Ramsauer.

description.hltext_display: Fallece el conductor de un camión con bombonas de butano tras chocar contra una valla en la A-65 en Palencia
description.content: PALENCIA, 22 (EUROPA PRESS) Un varón de 49 años cuya identidad responde a las iniciales F.J.G.C. ha perdido la vida esta madrugada tras sufrir un accidente con su camión, que estaba cargado de bombonas de butano, según han informado a Europa Press desde el Centro de Gestión de Tráfico. Los hechos han ocurrido a las 04.10 horas de hoy, miércoles 22 de diciembre, en el kilómetro 7,7 de la A-65, en Palencia capital, donde un camión chocó contra una valla de seguridad. El Centro de Gestión de Tráfico ha precisado que se están investigando las circunstancias de este accidente y no se descarta que la muerte se haya podido deber a causas naturales.

description.hltext_display: Palauteryöppy venäläiskuskien valoista – nyt puuttuu poliisi
description.author: Jenni Tamminen
description.content:
Liikkuva poliisi alkaa valistaa venäläisiä autoilijoita siitä, miten sumuvaloja ja hätävilkkuja saa käyttää Suomen tieliikenteessä.
- Viime talvena tästä tuli paljon palautetta, niin Liikkuvalle poliisille kuin paikallispoliiseille ja asiasta kirjoiteltiin myös yleisönosastoilla täällä Kaakonkulmalla. Kansalaiset ihmettelivät, miksi poliisi ei puutu asiaan, kertoo Uudelle Suomelle ylikonstaapeli Raimo Väisänen Liikkuvan poliisin Imatran yksiköstä.
Liikkuvan poliisin Kouvolan Yksikkö ja Kaakkois-Suomen Rajavartiosto ovat nyt tehneet tiedotteen, jota jaetaan venäläisille rajanylityspaikoilla. Tiedote on Väisäsen mukaan käännetty vain venäjän kielelle. Tiedotteessa kerrotaan, missä tilanteissa sumuvalojen ja hätävilkkujen käyttö on sallittua.
Väisäsen mukaan suurella osalla venäläisautoilijoista on jatkuvasti sumuvalot päällä.
- Ajokulttuuri on erilaista. Sitä pysähdellään minne sattuu ja laitetaan hätävilkut päälle, Väisänen kuvaa.
Väisäsen mukaan kyseessä on kokeilu. Poliisi uskoo, että tiedottaminen tehoaa liikennekäyttäytymiseen. Väisänen huomauttaa, että samalla muistutetaan myös suomalaisia autoilijoita samoista asioista.
Etu- ja takasumuvaloja saa käyttää vain sumun tai rankan vesi- tai lumisateen aikana.
Takasumuvaloa saa käyttää lisäksi myös silloin, kun ajoviiman tiestä nostama lumi, pöly tai loka oleellisesti rajoittaa ajoneuvon näkymistä taaksepäin. Pelkkä pimeys ei ole peruste käyttää sumuvaloa.
Virheellinen sumuvalojen käyttö on rangaistava teko Suomessa.
Hätävilkkuja saa puolestaan käyttää vain, jos ajoneuvo on onnettomuuden, vaurion tai muun pakottavan syyn johdosta jouduttu pysäyttämään sellaiseen paikkaan, missä se voi aiheuttaa erityistä vaaraa muulle liikenteelle.
Ajoneuvo on aina pysäytettävä turvalliseen paikkaan pois päätieltä, kuten esimerkiksi linja-autopysäkille, levähdyspaikoille tai sivuteiden varteen.
Myös hätävilkkujen virheellinen käyttö ja väärin pysäköiminen ovat rangaistavia tekoja.

description.hltext_display: Padres pick up C Johnson from Seattle
description.content: San Diego, CA (Sports Network) - The San Diego Padres added some catching depth on Tuesday by acquiring Rob Johnson from the Seattle Mariners for a player to be named later or cash considerations. The 28-year-old backstop hit a mere .191 with two homers and 13 runs batted in over 61 games for the Mariners last season. Over parts of four big league seasons -- all with Seattle -- Johnson is a career .200 hitter with five home runs and 42 RBI in 161 contests.
