description.hltext_display: 西甲：大力神与桑坦德竞技互交白卷
Das Weltbild von Wikileaks: Am liebsten ordentlich und einsam
description.author: Nicole Karafyllis
description.content: Von Nicole Karafyllis Als der Kinderarzt Hans Asperger 1943 seine Habilitationsschrift über die „Autistischen Psychopathen" im Kindesalter an der Universität Wien einreichte, beschrieb er die geniale Fähigkeit der kleinen Jungen, die Welt ganz klar zu sehen. Autisten zeigten eine besondere Klarsichtigkeit, ihre ideale Welt ist geordnet, die Dinge haben ihren Platz. In dieser geordneten Welt hat jedes Ding genau einen Namen. Metaphern, Ironie, Diplomatie – all jene Formen von Distanz zum Objekt der Erkenntnis scheinen viele Autisten nicht zu verstehen. Die eindeutige Lesbarkeit der Welt ist ein alter Menschheitstraum. Gegenwärtig wird er über die Plattform WikiLeaks neu verhandelt. Informationen bedürfen keiner Vermittlung und keiner wertenden Distanz mehr, so die Proponenten von Wikileaks. Informationen tragen vielmehr die Essenz ihrer Bedeutung in sich. Diese Position war im Mittelalter prominent, allerdings unter anderen Vorzeichen. Es war Gott, der die Essenzen in die Dinge legte, und es war daher auch nicht allen unbedingt möglich, die von Gott geordnete Welt klar zu sehen. Klarsichtigkeit war vielmehr an göttliche Gnade gekoppelt. Von daher birgt der normative Anspruch auf Transparenz, den Julian Assange und seine Jünger vertreten, ein zutiefst religiöses Element. Das Genie zeigt sich dabei in einer neuen Form, als transhumanes Subjekt, das wegen seiner technischen Fähigkeiten im Umgang mit Daten und Computern über die menschliche Gattung hinausweist und die Masse der Nicht-Sehenden in Gnadenakten informiert. Als Hans Asperger damals den Autismus als Psychopathie kategorisierte, wies er darauf hin, dass es sich um eine Störung handelt, unter der mehr die Gesellschaft leidet als der Betroffene selbst. In den letzten Jahren ist der Asperger-Autismus zu einer kulturellen Metapher für die Einsamkeit des postmodernen Subjekts geworden, das in der IT-Gesellschaft virtuell seine Netzwerke knüpft. Viele derjenigen, die sich zur intellektuellen Oberschicht der Cybersociety zählen, identifizieren sich mit dem Asperger-Syndrom. Die Hacker-Szene feiert sich gerne in sogenannten „nerd-clubs". Dann gehen die Heimarbeiter der Transparenz wieder nach Hause. In der Populärkultur hat sich seit dem Film „Rain Man" (1988) den Eindruck verfestigt, Autist seien stets weiße Männer aus der Mittelschicht, die von Zahlen und Technik besessen sind. Dieses Bild hat die vielen Autisten, die nicht über besondere kognitive Fähigkeiten verfügen und um bessere Therapieangebote kämpfen, in den Hintergrund treten lassen. Deshalb fällt in amerikanischen Autismus-Selbsthilfegruppen oft der Ausdruck „neuroelitism": Neuro-Elitismus. Eine der Ikonen der neuroelitären Cybercommunity ist Bill Gates, der zwar nie medizinisch als Asperger-Autist diagnostiziert wurde, aber dessen Schwierigkeiten im sozialen Umgang und außergewöhnlich hoher IQ für eine Ferndiagnose schon vor Jahren ausgereicht haben. Julian Assange wird sicherlich bald in der spekulativen Pathografie nachfolgen, denn er passt perfekt in das generierte Diskursmuster von männlicher Genialität, sozialer Zurückgezogenheit, Klarsichtigkeit und IT-Elite. Auch die dem Autisten unterstellte Unfähigkeit zu lügen, fundamental gewendet in einen natürlichen Anspruch auf Wahrheit, erhöht die Plausibilität. Dass einer der führenden Autismusforscher, Simon Baron-Cohen aus Cambridge, ständig publiziert, der Autist mit seinem „extrem männlichen Gehirn" sei der neue „leader" der IT-Gesellschaft, befördert entsprechende Diskurse. Allerdings bezieht man sich mit diesem Geniekonzept auf eine Ontologie und Weltsicht, die direkt in die Hochscholastik führt. Schon im Sommer titelte der britische Observer einen Artikel über Julian Assange mit „Mönch des Online-Zeitalters", spielte damit aber nur auf dessen angebliche Zurückgezogenheit und Autarkiestreben an. Der Autist ist eine kulturelle Metapher für Solipsismus und Nominalismus. Die Welt existiert für ihn nur insoweit, wie mentale Repräsentationen sich direkt auf Objekte beziehen können. Dabei werden die Relationen durch die Objekte selbst generiert. Wenn Computer und Gehirn strukturell immer mehr identifiziert werden, darf man sich nicht wundern, wenn nun das Konzept „Wahrheit" mit einem Informations-Determinismus versehen wird. Aufklärung wäre dann eine Totalität an zur Verfügung stehenden Daten „für alle". Dabei scheinen kulturelle, intersubjektiv und historisch gewachsene Semantiken entbehrlich. In dieser mittelalterlichen Ontologie, die, elektronisch tiefergelegt, im engeren Sinne gar keine mehr ist, da sie zwischen Sein und Seiendem nicht mehr trennt, sind die kulturellen Fundierungsverhältnisse nicht mitgedacht. Die Cyberwelt hat vielmehr eine verkabelte Ontologie der Hardware. Der aufklärerische Gedanke Kants, dass das „Ding an sich" der Erkenntnis nicht zugänglich ist, scheint in dieser Parallelwelt nie angekommen. Plurale Deutungsmöglichkeiten scheinen dort gefährlich. Die Sehnsucht nach Ordnung ist zu groß. Die nach Einsamkeit auch. Nicole Karafyllis ist Professorin für Philosophie an der Technischen Universität Braunschweig und zur Zeit Senior Research Fellow am IFK Wien. Text: F.A.Z.Bildmaterial: dapd

description.hltext_display: المالكي يؤكد على اقامة افضل العلاقات مع دول الجوار
description.content:
بغداد 21 ديسمبر2010(شينخوا) اكد رئيس الوزراء العراقي نوري المالكي في المنهاج الوزاري للحكومة التي يرأسها ونالت ثقة البرلمان يوم الثلاثاء على وجوب اقامة افضل العلاقات مع محيط العراق وحل المشكلات العالقة مع دول الجوار التي خلفها النظام السابق.
وقال المالكي في المنهاج الوزاري لحكومته الذي تضمن 43 بندا ان برنامج الحكومة يقوم على أساس بناء عراق مستقل ديمقراطي اتحادي تعددي يتمتع بسيادة كاملة.
واضاف المالكي ان المنهاج يقوم ايضا على العمل بجد لاعادة العراق الى وضعه الطبيعي محليا واقليميا ودوليا بسيادة قيم العدالة والمساواة وحكم القانون وان يستمد قوته من تنوعه الديني والفكري والقومي والمذهبي ومن طاقات أبنائه وكفاءات رجاله ونسائه.
وتحدث المالكي في البند الثامن من منهاجه الوزاري عن اهمية اقامة افضل العلاقات مع الجوار العراقي قائلا ان المنهاج الوزاري يؤكد على "ادامة العمل لتحقيق أفضل العلاقات مع محيط العراق العربي والاقليمي والدولي والانفتاح على العالم".
ويشدد ايضا على وجوب "حل المشاكل العالقة مع دول الجوار التي خلفها النظام السابق" ، داعيا الى "توثيق العلاقات بين العراق والمجتمع الدولي خاصة مع جيرانه على أسس الاحترام المتبادل والمصالح المشتركة".
واكد على "عدم التدخل في الشؤون الداخلية والعمل على ضبط الحدود الدولية ومنافذها وتفعيل المواد الدستورية الخاصة بها".

description.hltext_display: Severe winter weather caused by global warming? (Daily Caller)
description.author: Editor - Political News
description.content: Daily Caller - As Colorado braces for epic snowfall, Great Britain literally comes to a halt because of record blizzards, and the whole northern hemisphere enters what is predicted to be an especially harsh winter, some climate change experts are blaming the cold spell on global warming.

description.hltext_display: Firefox Live: Mozilla adotta due panda rossi di Knoxville per salvarli dall'estinzione
description.content:
I nomi verranno decisi tramite sondaggio, e chiunque può osservare i due cuccioli di panda rosso direttamente dalle loro gabbie, in uno zoo di Knoxville, Tennessee. E' Firexox Live, la nuova iniziativa di Mozilla Foundation che ha adottato una famiglia di "volpi di fuoco" composta da cinque esemplari. I panda rossi sono a rischio estinzione a causa della loro pelliccia, particolarmente ricercata per la realizzazione di colli di pelo e cappelli.
Mozilla Firefox Live Corsera: Firefox adotta due firefox

Firefox Live: Firefox adotta due cuccioli di Firefox
Mood complessivo del post: GOOD! Aggettivi positivi nel post: evoluto, famoso, interessante. La nostra analisi semantica analizza gli aggettivi positivi e negativi, opportunamente pesati, presenti nell'articolo misurando la componente emotiva del testo e dunque il punto di vista dell'autore nei confronti del tema trattato. L'analisi del sentiment non esprime un giudizio, ma traccia il contesto emotivo che accompagna un argomento in un dato istante. Ad esempio: a un personaggio molto popolare accade un evento spiacevole, il sentiment dei post che ne parlano risulterà molto negativo, ma ciò non implica alcun giudizio negativo nei confronti del personaggio stesso.

description.hltext_display: ·赵本山回应与宋丹丹上春晚：没有的事 媒体瞎写
description.content:
编辑：晶晶 稿件来源：东方网 发布时间： 2010年12月22日 11:19
页面功能 【字体：大 中 小】【关闭】
昨日，北方某媒体刊登消息：赵本山2011兔年春晚小品虽然供挑选的本子已有几个，但基本有了眉目，更倾向于一个新题材本子，名字叫《同桌的你》，搭档为宋丹丹。昨晚，在深圳“央视2010-2011年跨年晚会”现场，赵本山接受记者采访，回应：“那是没有的事，是瞎写！”
谈到春晚时，赵本山明确表示：“2011年春晚肯定要上，但演什么题材，与谁搭档，因剧本还在创作中，目前，还不能向媒体公布。所以，与宋丹丹再度携手上兔年春晚是在提前误导观众。”
当晚，《乡村爱情4》剧组亮相跨年晚会。紧接着，主持人董卿问：“兔年春晚准备得怎么样了？”赵本山当众说：“刚才，我与央视副总编辑朱彤，谈到春晚。他让我的小品，在除夕夜12点半才演。我担心观众熬不住。不过，我是听央视指挥的。现在，我已准备了几个小品，都在紧张创作中，我是尽全力，力争拿最好作品奉献给全国观众。”当看见台下嘉宾位置上坐着的潘长江、潘阳父女俩，赵本山幽默地当场鼓励他说：“长江啊，努努力，节目毙了，再写一个！又接着上！”
昨晚，宋丹丹的一位助手，也向华西都市报记者表示，宋丹丹与赵本山是很好的朋友，但因眼下正在忙于拍戏，没有时间与赵本山上春晚。但赵本山表演的春晚节目，宋丹丹会认真观看的。

description.hltext_display: Gulliver's Travels 3D
description.content:
In this contemporary re-imagining of Jonathan Swift's classic tale, Lemuel Gulliver is a perpetual underachiever and wannabe travel writer at a New York newspaper. When he finally makes an effort to actually venture out of the city to write a travel piece, a storm-tossed voyage lands him on an island inhabited by tiny folks called Liliputians. After a rocky beginning, the gargantuan Gulliver becomes an inspiration to his new six-inch-tall friends. He brings them modern-day wonders like a PDA and music video games - while they help him learn that it's how big you are on the inside that counts. See it in 3D at select locations.
Cast:Jack Black, Jason Segel, Emily Blunt, Billy Connelly, Amanda Peet, Catherine Tate, James Corden, Olly Alexander
Director:Rob Letterman
Writer:Jonathan Swift
Duration:85
Official Site:http://gulliverstravelsthemovie.com/
Genre:Comedy, Action/Adventure
Distributor:20th Century Fox

description.hltext_display: 埃托奥再度当选“非洲足球先生”
description.content:
12月20日，喀麦隆前锋埃托奥在埃及开罗举行的非洲足球协会年度颁奖仪式上。当日，埃托奥战胜了南非世界杯加纳队队长吉安和科特迪瓦球星、去年的“非洲足球先生”德罗巴，重夺“非洲足球先生”称号。新华社/路透
12月20日，喀麦隆前锋埃托奥（右）与加纳队球员吉安在埃及开罗举行的非洲足球协会年度颁奖仪式上。当日，埃托奥战胜了南非世界杯加纳队队长吉安和科特迪瓦球星、去年的“非洲足球先生”德罗巴，重夺“非洲足球先生”称号。新华社/路透

description.hltext_display: Karunakaran's condition critical
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
The condition of ailing Congress leader K Karunakaran turned critical today and he was put on ventilator support at a hospital here.
Karunakaran (93) was hospitalised on December 10 following severe breathing problems. Though his condition was critical in the initial days, he showed improvement last week, hospital sources said.
Opposition leader Oommen Chandy visited Karunakaran at the hospital today.

description.hltext_display: FleetCor Completes IPO - Quick Facts
description.content:
(RTTNews) - FleetCor Technologies, Inc. (FLT) said Monday that it has completed its initial public offering of about 14.58 million shares of its common stock at a price to the public of $23 per share.
FleetCor's common shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol "FLT."
430,961 shares were sold by FleetCor and about 14.15 million shares were sold by certain of FleetCor's stockholders, including about 1.9 million shares pursuant to the underwriters' exercise of their over-allotment option.

description.hltext_display: Création de parkings collectifs
description.content:
La création de parkings collectifs se révèle comme une mesure nécessaire pour de nombreuses personnes vivant en zones urbaines. Il faut en effet savoir que la gestion du stationnement des véhicules génère de plus en plus de problèmes pour nombre de ces citadins. Comme tout aménagement nécessitant des travaux, la démarche de mettre en place des parkings collectifs est soumise à des
réglementations bien précises, qui découlent naturellement du Plan local d'urbanisation. Ce document, propre à chaque commune ou groupe de communes, permet de cadrer les modifications apportées au schéma de la ville concernée, afin d'optimiser l'exploitation de l'étendue. La plupart des PLU prévoit une entrée propre qui évoque les conditions requises pour la création de parkings collectifs. Il est notamment question de prévoir des places de parking suffisantes, lors de nouvelles constructions de locaux destinés à servir à un certain nombre de personnes en même temps. En outre, chaque commune s'occupe de définir, selon les situations qui lui sont propres, les limites telles que la situation de ces parkings collectifs par rapport aux divers chemins d'accès. Elle s'assure également de notifier les instigateurs du projet, quant à la limite de terrain disponible pour ce genre d'entreprise. En général, le calcul de cette superficie est fait en fonction du nombre d'usagers prévus d'y recourir, du moins pour ce qui est de la superficie globale. Car il faut savoir, que les dimensions de chaque place sont aussi normalement soumises à des normes précises, en tenant compte d'ailleurs du type de parking souhaité, en créneau, en épi ou autre. Les entités qui envisagent de mettre en place des aires de stationnement collectif devraient aussi savoir qu'elles sont soumises à deux types de législations, selon le nombre de places prévues. À partir de 10 places, le parking projeté fera l'objet d'une déclaration préalable auprès de la ville. Si les places prévues dépassent 50, un permis d'aménager est même requis. Il faut enfin rappeler que tout aménagement de parking doit tenir compte de la limite des espaces verts et des marges de reculement. Bien entendu, l'aire de stationnement ne devra, en aucune manière, faire obstruction à des voies publiques déjà tracées.
Date de création : 22/12/2010 07:37
Contributions de Dede

description.hltext_display: What a Night for an Eclipse!
description.content:
Channel: Weather & Scenery
Location: Mountain Home, Idaho
Tags:
lunar moon eclipse
This is a photo composite of the lunar eclipse from 12:15 to 1:35am, December 21, 2010. Clouds threatened to put a damper on this rare event early in the evening. Fortunately, the weather cleared up and made way for one beautiful night. Between the weather, the eclipse, the stars, and a meteor shower, it was an amazing night to look towards the skies!

description.hltext_display: NYT: Israel to Again Press for U.S. Release of Spy
description.content:
Israel to Again Press for U.S. Release of Spy
http://www.nytimes.com/2010/12/22/world/middleeast/22mideast.html
JERUSALEM — The prime minister of Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu, will
officially and publicly appeal to President Obama in the coming days for the
release of Jonathan Jay Pollard, the American serving a life term in a North
Carolina jail for spying for Israel, Mr. Netanyahu’s office announced
Tuesday.
A public request, as opposed to Israel’s discreet, backroom efforts in the
past, would constitute a new approach in the campaign for Mr. Pollard’s
release and an additional twist in a long and painful chapter in
Israeli-American relations.
Mr. Pollard, a former United States Navy intelligence analyst who pleaded
guilty to spying for Israel, a close ally, has already spent 25 years in
prison. Many American law enforcement and intelligence officials have
opposed granting him clemency.
Mr. Pollard’s supporters argue that his life sentence was disproportionate,
that the information he passed to Israel can no longer harm American
national security, and that his health is failing.
Mr. Netanyahu has tried in the past to trade Mr. Pollard for pliancy in
Middle East peace-making, in the hope that the release of the spy would
appease conservatives in the Israeli government. Mr. Netanyahu made Mr.
Pollard’s case a bargaining point with the Palestinians at the Wye
Plantation talks in 1998.
Most recently, in September, Israeli officials tried to float a trade-off in
which they would extend a temporary moratorium on settlement construction in
the West Bank, a Palestinian condition for negotiations, in exchange for the
release of Mr. Pollard.
Mr. Pollard recently made a personal request for a public appeal for his
release. The request was relayed in writing by Mr. Pollard’s wife, Esther,
who met with the prime minister on Monday. Mr. Netanyahu’s office said he
took the decision after a series of talks and contacts with senior
administration officials in recent months.
Israel’s willingness to go public represents a turnaround in what has been a
complicated relationship. At first Israel disowned Mr. Pollard, saying that
he was an actor in a rogue operation. But Mr. Pollard was granted Israeli
citizenship in 1995, and Mr. Netanyahu, during his first term in office in
the late 1990s, officially recognized Mr. Pollard as an Israeli agent.
“I intend to continue acting with determination for Pollard’s release,” Mr.
Netanyahu said in a statement on Tuesday, “both because of the state of
Israel’s moral obligation to him and so that he might live with his family
and restore himself to health after his prolonged incarceration.”
Lawrence Korb, who was assistant secretary of defense in the Reagan
administration, and who supports clemency for Mr. Pollard, accompanied Mrs.
Pollard in the meeting with Mr. Netanyahu on Monday.
Mr. Korb told reporters here on Tuesday that he had told the prime minister
that to “get the ball rolling,” Mr. Netanyahu should ask for Mr. Pollard’s
release publicly and “not as a quid pro quo, but as a matter of justice.”
In addition, Mr. Korb said, Israel should acknowledge that it was wrong to
have recruited a spy against its closest ally, and that Israel is willing to
cooperate fully with the Americans in order to bring the chapter to a close.
That, he suggested, might help some supporters of Mr. Pollard in the United
States to come forward, who may otherwise fear being seen as disregarding
national security.
Mr. Pollard, who worked for the navy as a civilian intelligence analyst,
began spying for Israel after he approached an Israeli officer in the spring
of 1984. He was arrested 18 months later.
--
JUSTICE FOR JONATHAN POLLARD
Website: http://www.JonathanPollard.org
Follow J4JP on Twitter:http://twitter.com/J4JPollard

description.hltext_display: On the Steelers: Roethlisberger healing in many ways
description.author: Ed Bouchette
description.content:
The physical beating quarterback Ben Roethlisberger has taken on football fields is nothing compared to the pounding his reputation took before the season began. Through it all, he has guided the Steelers to a surprising 10-4 record and a playoff berth with a steady hand, a sturdy disposition and play that has typified his seven-year career with the Steelers.
He also has made strides in reclaiming a reputation that was left in tatters last spring.
"I've definitely seen the change in him for the positive. I saw it a long time ago," said defensive end Brett Keisel, one of the quarterback's closer friends on the team. "I think he just changed his overall outlook on who he wants to be, what he wants to be, where he wants to go and how he wants to do it."
The change came after a thunderbolt from Milledgeville, Ga., in March where a 20-year-old woman first accused him of sexual assault and then declined to pursue it. After a lengthy investigation, Roethlisberger was not charged with a crime. But NFL commissioner Roger Goodell suspended Roethlisberger for the first four games of the season and ordered him to complete a program that included counseling.
Goodell said in training camp that Roethlisberger had gone above and beyond what he asked him to do, and his teammates say they have seen it throughout the year. Roethlisberger's dealings with the media have been the most cordial and relaxed in his pro career, and those who work with Steelers charities say that while he always has been good in that area, he has devoted more time and effort this year without drawing attention to his charitable work.
"Obviously, there's been a lot of scrutiny against him this year," Keisel said. "The best way you can counteract that is to go out and be a better man, be a better teammate, be a better guy in the community and I think he's done all that."
Roethlisberger said he has made a strong effort to turn around his life and reputation, and that he hopes people think better of him now than they did in the spring.
"When everything happened, I wasn't a guy who came out and said that I don't care what people think about me, because you do," he said, sitting in front of his locker Tuesday. "You're a human being; you care what people think. I hope and I think a lot of people really felt that I was genuine in the things I said, because I was. Hopefully, they have forgiven me or they are working toward it.
"We said it wasn't going to happen overnight. I strive every day to be a better person, a better son, everything. That's what I think we all should do."
After his teammates went 3-1 without him, Roethlisberger returned and has played like the same quarterback who became one of the most popular players in Steelers history while helping the team win two Super Bowl titles.
He has a 92.6 passer rating and has thrown for 14 touchdowns and five interceptions. He also is the team's third-leading rusher with 150 yards, second most of any season only to his 204 yards in 2007.
He has led the team on three winning touchdown drives in the fourth quarter or overtime. And he has taken a pounding as well.
Oakland defensive end Richard Seymour cold-cocked him long after a play in which Roethlisberger threw a touchdown pass. He has been hit late and in the head a number of times without a flag being thrown, although Baltimore's Haloti Ngata was later fined $15,000 for a hit Dec. 5 that broke Roethlisberger's nose. He also has been playing with a broken right foot since it was injured Nov. 28 against the Buffalo Bills. The injury was aggravated against the Jets Sunday.
"He's one of the toughest players I've ever seen," receiver Mike Wallace said. "They talk about Michael Vick taking a lot of hits and extra stuff and not getting calls, but he gets the same treatment I think Michael Vick gets. He's just not as fast and I think he takes more pain sometimes. He's so big, they bring him to the ground all kinds of ways and he doesn't complain.
"It's crazy how much he's been through and still been able to play. He got his nose broke, taped it up and went right back in and said nothing about it."
Roethlisberger has been sacked 29 times in 10 games compared to his career high of 50 in 15 games last season. He has been a more effective runner, too; his 6.5-yard average is by far his highest.
"At times I think I've played OK, at times I think I wish I'd have played better," Roethlisberger said. "All things considered so far, hopefully it's just a start."
He also has not missed a snap since returning from his suspension despite the two injuries.
"He's as tough as there is," Keisel said. "He's obviously taken some lumps this year -- he's out there playing with a broken foot, a broken nose. A lot of guys would say 'I'm going to sit this one out.' He shows you how tough he is by playing."
Quick hits
Jonathan Scott will remain the starting left tackle. There was some speculation when Scott was removed from the game for the final drive Sunday and replaced by Trai Essex. Coach Mike Tomlin declined to say on Monday who would start. Scott, who had a "stinger" at the time, is not on the injury list this week. ... Aaron Smith, who began lifting weights two weeks ago and was fitted with what he called an elbow brace this week, has no idea when he might resume practicing. He has been out since surgery to repair his triceps, torn Oct. 24. "You have another scan and see how things are healing and let the doctors make the choices," Smith said. ... Troy Polamalu did not practice Tuesday and is not likely to play Thursday night, missing his second consecutive game.
For more on the Steelers, read the blog, Ed Bouchette On the Steelers at www.post-gazette.com/plus. Ed Bouchette can be reached at ebouchette@post-gazette.com. Ed Bouchette's blog on the Steelers and Gerry Dulac's Steelers chats are featured exclusively on PG+, a members-only web site from the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette. Our gives you all the details.

event_or_fact.property: I've definitely seen the change in him for the positive.; I saw it a long time ago; I think he just changed his overall outlook on who he wants to be, what he wants to be, where he wants to go and how he wants to do it.
he has made a strong effort to turn around his life and reputation, and that he hopes people think better of him now than they did in the spring
Roethlisberger had gone above and beyond what he asked him to do, and his teammates say they have seen it throughout the year.
You have another scan and see how things are healing and let the doctors make the choices
When everything happened, I wasn't a guy who came out and said that I don't care what people think about me, because you do
He's as tough as there is

Obviously, there's been a lot of scrutiny against him this year; The best way you can counteract that is to go out and be a better man, be a better teammate, be a better guy in the community and I think he's done all that.
He's one of the toughest players I've ever seen
At times I think I've played OK, at times I think I wish I'd have played better; All things considered so far, hopefully it's just a start.

description.hltext_display: Füße gut - alles gut
description.author: mleske
description.content:
Nordic Walking steht bei IOS-Technik 2011 im Mittelpunkt
Kaum einer, der es nicht schon ausprobiert hat: Ob sanft und gemütlich oder schnell und sportlich – beim Nordic Walking werden 90 Prozent der gesamten Körpermuskulatur aktiviert und es kommt zu einem erhöhten Sauerstoffverbrauch, von dem der gesamte Stoffwechsel profitiert. Kein Wunder, dass sich Nordic Walking in den vergangenen Jahren zu einer Breitensportart entwickelt hat. Doch bei aller Euphorie verweist der Sportmediziner Dr. Volker Alt auf wissenschaftliche Forschungsergebnisse, in denen die Belastung des Sprunggelenks hervorgehoben wird: „Die Ursache liegt im längeren Schritt und in der längeren Abstoßphase“, sagt der Präsident der Medical Fitness Association, die es sich zum Ziel gemacht hat, moderne wissenschaftliche Erkenntnisse aus der medizinischen Prävention zusammenzutragen, um sie einer breiten Öffentlichkeit zu vermitteln. Während die Sportindustrie mit Nordic Walking Schuhen reagierte, sieht IOS-Chef Axel Klapdor sein Konzept erneut bestätigt: „Die richtigen Schuhe sind ganz wichtig fürs Nordic Walking“, betont Klapdor. Dennoch bleiben sie ein standardisiertes Massenprodukt, denn jeder Fuß hat seine eigene Passform. „Wir haben spezielle Nordic Walking Einlagen konzipiert, die für jeden Kunden ganz individuell angefertigt werden und den ganzen Menschen aufrichten, ohne die Gelenke zu belasten. So kann der Fuß den Körper optimal tragen!“ Dem kann auch der Nordic Walking Ausbilder Dr. Alt nur zustimmen: „Jeder Fuß besitzt eine einzigartige Individualität. Mit speziellen Einlagen kann der natürliche Bewegungsablauf unterstützt und vor Überlastungen geschützt werden.“
Kontakt
Karin Wiessmann
IOS-Technik GmbH
Jakob-Kaiser-Str. 7
47877 Willich
02154-9284-2400
Diese Pressemeldung veröffentlicht IOS Innovative Orthopädie Systeme. Bei Fragen wenden Sie sich bitte an Karin Wiessmann unter kwiessmann@ios-technik.de, die für die Pressearbeit verantwortlich ist.

description.hltext_display: ·米高梅公司重组成功 与望远镜电影公司正式合并
description.content:
据美国媒体报道，上个月刚刚申请破产保护的米高梅近日宣布破产重组成功。这个曾经为观众带来《007》系列、《乱世佳人》等经典电影的制片公司在与债权人及新投资人协商后达成一致，“新公司”将继续保留米高梅的名字，也就是说经典的“狮吼”片头将延续下去，而原来排在拍摄序列中的第23部《007》和《指环王》前传也不会受到影响。
据悉，米高梅电影公司已经与好莱坞另一家制片公司———望远镜电影公司(Spyglass)正式合并，并获得5亿美元的注资。原米高梅C EO斯蒂芬库伯黯然离职，而新任公司主席和C EO则由望远镜公司的创始人罗杰伯恩鲍姆和盖里巴伯共同担任。
根据新重组方案，新投资人、亿万富翁卡尔伊坎(也是狮门影业的投资人，曾试图让米高梅与狮门合并)将以入股的方式帮助米高梅偿还大约50亿美元的债务和利息。作为交换，原米高梅的债权人将会在重组后的米高梅公司获得95%的股份。新任C EO罗杰伯恩鲍姆和盖里巴伯将拥有新米高梅公司1%的股份，但继续控制望远镜公司。
而据媒体报道，米高梅两部重头新片都进入了实际制作阶段，曾前两部007电影的配乐师大卫阿诺德最近透露，第23部007电影已经回归，“不过变数太多，只有拿到剧本才能最终确定，但我对丹尼尔克雷格在新一部邦德电影中的表现非常期待。”另外，《指环王》的前传———《霍比特人》一直在紧锣密鼓的筹备当中。最近《黑天鹅》的导演达伦阿罗诺夫斯基也公开表示，他很想翻拍米高梅的经典作品之一———《机械战警》。

description.hltext_display: 【CEO来信】马化腾：开放和分享是一种能力
description.content:
作者：马化腾 2010年12月22日 来源：中国企业家网
评论：
条
字号：大|中|小
分享到：
腾讯公司董事长马化腾(图片来源：中国企业家网)
开放和分享并不是一个宣传口号，也不是一个简单的概念。开放很多时候被用作一个姿态，但是我更理解这是一个能力
编者按：
他一直以低调著称，在互联网大佬们的言论频繁见诸报端的时候，他只是坚持做“产品经理”兼“高级客服”，经常在凌晨时分回答用户关于产品的提问;
随着“隐私门”的爆发，他被动地站在了舆论的风口浪尖之上。面对着风生水起，他携团队所采取的措施更是引发多方争论，甚至惊动了监管机构;
而就在风波渐渐平息之际，他在中国企业领袖年会上突然宣布了一个重要决定：腾讯将进入为期半年的战略转型筹备期。根据他的描述，在开放、分享的原则下，半年后的腾讯将有着“完整而彻底”的转变。也因为这一决定，他被形容为“顺势上位”的聪明人;
有人说，他是霸道的，固执地捍卫着企鹅帝国的疆土，不容对手踏入半步;也有人说，他是擅谋划的，以后起直追与后发制人的方式，取胜于无形中。而用他自己的话来说，他是一个经常自创危机感的人。创立公司以来的12年里，他一直如履薄冰，深怕由于某个疏漏而遭用户抛弃，甚至没有一天感觉到“高枕无忧”。
他是马化腾，腾讯公司的掌舵人。近日，马化腾接受《人民日报》专访，就中国互联网的发展趋势和腾讯未来的转型作出解析。马化腾表示，中国互联网的发展仍有很大的发展空间。谈及腾讯未来发展的原则，他以“开发、共享”作答。在他看来，开放和共享式的发展，更是一种能力的表现。(胡晴)
以下为马化腾观点摘录。
马化腾：
过去10多年来，包括腾讯在内的中国互联网走过的历程一直不乏创新。
现在互联网计算机信息技术越来越走向大众，互联网越来越“傻”，越来越易于使用，而这需要后台有非常聪明的技术在支撑。一家企业或者几家互联网企业，其研发实力是不足以满足未来日益个性化、日益复杂化的需求的。
所以最近腾讯提出云组织和云创新的概念——也就是说通过信息技术和互联网技术，社会的各个资源可以在需要时快速聚集起来，在完成任务后又立刻消散，能够进行下一轮新的组合。我们认为这个时代正在向我们走来。
腾讯公司的愿景是“做最受尊敬的互联网企业”，12年来，这是腾讯一贯的目标。是否能达到这个愿景，我想应该交给大众来评判。
在度过了早期求生存的阶段后，随着企业不断成长,我们已越来越感觉到，在求发展过程中如何将企业的经济效益和社会效益结合起来，将是腾讯未来继续成长发展中非常重要的一个因素。
(而)随着腾讯实力越来越强大，我们也感觉到能力越大，身上担子越重，责任也越大。腾讯不是一个孤立存在的企业，它和非常多的合作伙伴、企业、社会、政府、用户息息相关，我们越来越感受到企业社会责任不仅仅是为股东负责，或者为投资人负责，或者为员工负责，更重要的是要为我们用户、社会承担起重要的责任。
开放和分享并不是一个宣传口号，也不是一个简单的概念。开放很多时候被用作一个姿态，但是我更理解这是一个能力。分享不是一个愿景，更多是说你如何建立一个可执行的制度，才去执行你的分享和共享。所以，在自身的能量和能力还没有达到一个更高水平的情况下，或者很多制度没有建立完善的时候，去谈开放分享对人对己都是不负责任。
我们提出半年时间转型，希望这是一次慎重、彻底、完整的转型。预计半年后的2011年6月5日，大家将会看到腾讯很多举措。当然在这个过程中还会有一系列活动展开。
我们希望能建立一个安全、开放、透明的云，将QQ从纯粹的客户端变成一个可以通过Web、通过手机各种终端来访问的平台，并支持腾讯产业链的合作伙伴所有微创新的服务。
互联网的发展是中国改革开放的一个缩影，腾讯的成功有很多因素，但改革开放的历史机遇是我们最大的财富。如同打开了一扇扇大门，改革开放给了中国人重新打量认识世界的机会，也给了那些血液躁动的年轻人创业成长的机会。
同时，互联网是个变化很快的行业，竞争非常激烈。12年来，我最深刻的体会是，腾讯从来没有哪一天可以高枕无忧，我们每天都如履薄冰，始终担心某个疏漏随时会给我们致命一击，始终担心用户会抛弃我们。
因此，我们一直奉行的信条是“一切以用户价值为依归”。我认为，这是腾讯能够一路走来、发展壮大的原因，也是互联网经济的核心要素之一。
事实上，我一直认为，中国互联网仍然有很大的机会。譬如搜索和电子商务，还有网络广告，我们还有很大的发展和提升空间。
关于中国互联网的可持续发展，我还是要强调一个良好的产业发展环境的重要性，只有“阳光下的竞争及合作”，用户及消费者才能最终受益，产业也才能进入良性发展的轨道。
中国互联网正处于一个变革前夜，我们非常荣幸见证这么一个历程。最近，我们也注意到，优酷、当当这些互联网公司在美国股市再次掀起中国概念热潮。这些都是中文互联网逐渐崛起的表现。
腾讯希望做互联网上的水和电。腾讯目前的海量用户及我们拥有的业务数量，也为我们下一步的发展及创新提供了现实的基础。过去，创新是腾讯取得今天成绩的重要驱动力;未来，创新依旧是驱动腾讯发展的最主要动力，还会加强。我们希望通过自己的努力，通过整个行业的分工合作，中文互联网必将成为国际市场上最重要的创新及引领力量之一。
(摘自《人民日报》12月22日《中国互联网正处于变革前夜--专访腾讯董事会主席兼首席执行官马化腾》一文，作者：张意轩。有删减)

description.hltext_display: العاهل السعودي يغادر مستشفى بأمريكا بعد إجرائه عملية جراحية في الظهر
description.content:
الرياض 22 ديسمبر 2010 (شينخوا) غادر العاهل السعودي الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز مستشفى (بريسبيتريان) بمدينة نيويورك الأمريكية بعد إجرائه عملية جراحية ناجحة اثر معاناته من آلام في الظهر.
وذكر الديون الملكي، في بيان أوردته وكالة الأنباء السعودية اليوم (الأربعاء)، أن الملك عبد الله بن عبد العزيز غادر المستشفى الليلة الماضية وتوجه إلى مقر إقامته بنيويورك لقضاء فترة من النقاهة واستكمال علاجه الطبيعي.
وكان العاهل السعودي الملك عبد الله بن عبد العزيز( 86 عاما) قد توجه إلى الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية خلال نوفمبر الماضي حيث أجرى هناك عمليتين جراحيتين من آلام في الظهر وصفت بانزلاق غضروفي، بحسب بيان من الديون الملكي السعودي.
يذكر أن الملك عبد الله بن عبد العزيز قد تولى الحكم في السعودية عام 2005 خلفا للملك الراحل فهد بن عبد العزيز فيما يقوم بإدارة شئون المملكة حاليا ولي العهد الأمير سلطان بن عبد العزيز (85 عاما) الذي سبق وان أجرى عملية جراحية العام الماضي في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية.

description.hltext_display: Ligue 1: Guy Lacombe en appelle aux supporters monégasques
description.content:
MONACO (Reuters) - L'entraîneur de Monaco, Guy Lacombe, sur la sellette depuis quelques semaines, a appelé les supporters à soutenir mercredi contre Sochaux leur équipe, auteur d'un match nul encourageant (2-2) samedi au Parc des Princes contre le Paris Saint-Germain.
L'ASM est actuellement 17e et premier non relégable, avec trois points de retard sur Valenciennes, 16e, et surtout avec un seul petit point d'avance sur Caen.
Une défaite contre Sochaux, 11e, associé à une victoire des Normands, qui reçoivent Rennes, plongerait les Monégasques dans la zone de relégation.
Le technicien monégasque a apprécié la réaction solidaire de son groupe auquel il avait demandé "l'union sacrée" et espère que ce résultat du week-end face au PSG dans la capitale servira de déclic et renversera la tendance.
"Ce qui m'importe avant tout, c'est que la situation du club se redresse. Le point qu'on a pris à Paris montre que la roue peut tourner et avec l'appui du public, tout peut être facilité", a-t-il dit en refusant d'évoquer son cas personnel.
"ATTACHEMENT AU CLUB"
"Il faut qu'ils sachent que l'on joue pour eux et que, quel que soit leur nombre, leur soutien nous est indispensable surtout dans un match aussi important que celui de mercredi face à Sochaux", a-t-il dit. "Si la victoire est au bout tout le monde sera heureux. Ils doivent montrer leur attachement et leur appartenance au club."
A l'image de leur entraîneur, les joueurs savent qu'il leur reste un match très important à bien négocier pour effacer les doutes des dirigeants, s'offrir une fin d'année plus tranquille et repartir dans une atmosphère plus sereine en début d'année.
Stéphane Ruffier, le gardien et capitaine de l'ASM venu s'exprimer en conférence de presse, n'a pas manqué de relever lui aussi l'importance de cette rencontre contre Sochaux.
"Il s'agit pour nous maintenant de bonifier ce bon résultat que nous avons fait dans la capitale, mercredi à domicile. La victoire et les trois points sont une obligation", a-t-il dit.
"Sachant les qualités de notre adversaire et ses performances récentes, il va falloir nous montrer encore plus déterminés et motivés que contre Paris", a-t-il ajouté.
"Je suis confiant, on a démontré en faisant aussi match nul à Lyon et Marseille qu'on est capables de se hisser au niveau et de faire des choses bien."
Etienne Ballérini, édité par Gilles Trequesser

description.hltext_display: Studenti in piazza e cortei a sorpresa contro il ddl Gelmini
description.content:
La città è blindata e gli studenti sono pronti a manifestare anche oggi il loro dissenso contro il ddl Gelmini che dopo il caos voto di ieri, potrebbe essere approvato oggi in via definitiva al Senato. I collettivi universitari si recheranno dal presidente della Repubblica Giorgio Napolitano per recapitargli una lettera. Se Napolitano firmerà la legge Gelmini "sancirà la cancellazione del diritto allo studio" scrivono gli studenti.
Corriere: Ddl Gelmini al Senato, scoppia il caos La Stampa: Cortei a sorpresa ma nessun assalto Il Post: La riforma Gelmini, a questo punto Repubblica: Riforma, assemblee e cortei Lo speciale sulla protesta di Repubblica
Messenger
Rassegna stampa dai blog
Mercoledì 22 il Coordinamento delle scuole secondarie di Roma in piazza...
Mood complessivo del post: BAD! Aggettivi positivi nel post: profondo, attivo, fondamentale. Aggettivi negativi nel post: pretestuoso, pericoloso, mortale. Aggettivi più utilizzati: pericoloso. La nostra analisi semantica analizza gli aggettivi positivi e negativi, opportunamente pesati, presenti nell'articolo misurando la componente emotiva del testo e dunque il punto di vista dell'autore nei confronti del tema trattato. L'analisi del sentiment non esprime un giudizio, ma traccia il contesto emotivo che accompagna un argomento in un dato istante. Ad esempio: a un personaggio molto popolare accade un evento spiacevole, il sentiment dei post che ne parlano risulterà molto negativo, ma ciò non implica alcun giudizio negativo nei confronti del personaggio stesso.

description.hltext_display: 吴君如携女儿逛街 影后门外排鱼蛋粉
description.content:
内容提要：吴君如前日带同女儿陈是知与老友曾华倩见面，一行三人到九龙城食驰名德昌鱼蛋粉。由于周日关系，食肆大排长龙，贵为影后的吴君如见状便像其他街坊一样在门外排队等候。
吴君如携女儿逛街 影后似街坊门外排鱼蛋粉
吴君如带女儿和曾华倩逛街。
吴君如前日带同女儿陈是知与老友曾华倩见面，一行三人到九龙城食驰名德昌鱼蛋粉。由于周日关系，食肆大排长龙，贵为影后的吴君如见状便像其他街坊一样在门外排队等候。虽然她和曾华倩都戴上黑超，但二人排队期间仍被不少街坊认出，不时围观二人，但二人未有理会。
至于4岁的陈是知，全程蹦蹦跳，又拿着公仔舞来舞去，十分精灵可爱，君如一度忍不住当街和女儿玩耍。排队等足10分钟后，吴君如一行三人始获安排就坐，并点了鱼蛋粉和冻饮。但三人只待了15分钟，便拿着冻饮外卖离开。

description.hltext_display: Brook Hill sends 8 to TAPPS Division III all-state squad
Tribe tame Wildcats in district opener
广汽本田理念S1引领合资自主新潮流
description.content:
技术同步、品质同源、服务同网
广汽本田执行副总经理姚一鸣宣布，理念S1是广汽本田汽车研究开发有限公司根据中国汽车市场发展趋势和消费需求而开发的首款量产车型，继承了广汽本田的先进技术和优异品质，是一款高品质的入门级国民车，面向中国汽车最为蓬勃发展的市场。理念S1将于明年春季在广汽本田特约销售服务店正式上市销售。
理念S1是广汽本田自主品牌的第一款产品，是广汽本田一直以来坚持市场化，以满足中国消费者需求为己任，感世界而动，坚持创新的阶段性成果，是广汽本田为中国消费者提供的又一精品力作。
专为中国汽车消费者打造的入门级国民车
从研发之初，广汽本田就立志于将理念S1打造成一款真正让中国消费者喜爱的理想国民车。为此，广汽本田在国内进行了长时间的大规模市场调研，深入中国十多个各类城市，走访了超过3000名消费者，倾听他们对于一辆家庭轿车的全方位需求。理念S1不仅能够彰显他们活力四射、开放自信、精明务实的个性，又能增加他们正在成长为社会中坚力量的自豪感，符合他们的价值观念、审美习惯和消费特点，尤其是能在技术、服务、品质等多个方面满足他们的较高标准，是一款与之生活追求契合、消费需求吻合，能够给消费者带来自豪感，倍感亲切的精品力作。理念S1的出现，无疑将为更广泛的中国消费者提供绝佳的工作生活两相宜的轿车之选。
为了让理念S1真正成为中国企业为中国市场度身定做的国民车型，广汽本田汽车研究开发有限公司历经三年的独立开发，依据中国消费者需求、立足中国家用车市场，进行了本土的研发。新车前脸厚重大气，搭配时尚锐利的大灯设计，彰显独特的产品魅力，尾部造型动感饱满，令人过目不忘，侧面线条简洁流畅，时尚而不失大气，动感又不失稳健。在动力方面，理念S1将搭载1.3L、1.5L两种排量的发动机，动力和油耗双优，能够为消费者带来环保、愉悦的驾乘体验。
理念S1在研发设计、生产销售等方面，秉承了理念（EVERUS）品牌寓意“我们永远的理念”，即“以打造国际一流汽车品牌为追求目标，以中国人的价值观为导向，以广汽本田强大的研发体系、制造体系和营销体系为依托，完美诠释中国式的现代生活品味”。
广汽本田双品牌战略进入市场实操阶段
“磨刀不误砍柴功。”作为在中国汽车工业合资自主发展道路上诞生的首款量产车型，理念S1倾注了广汽本田的大量心血，是广汽本田汽车研究开发公司“三年磨一剑”的标志性产品。
早在2007年7月19日，广汽本田率先成立广汽本田汽车研究开发公司（GHRD），成为中国第一家正式启动自主品牌战略的合资汽车企业。这一大胆突破的行动受到业界广泛关注，被誉为开辟了自主品牌发展的全新模式与道路。
2008年4月20日，广汽本田在北京车展上发布自主品牌中文名称“理念”及品牌标识，“理念”品牌的首款概念车也精彩登场，随后的广州车展和北京车展上，“理念”的第二款，第三款概念车也相继亮相。“理念”品牌的英文名称“EVERUS”亦在2010年的北京车展上发布。
本届广州车展上亮相的理念S1，正是广汽本田汽车研究开发公司的心血之作，同时也是广汽本田双品牌战略即将进入市场实操阶段的标志。据悉，伴随着增城工厂24万辆能扩工程的启动，广汽本田产能将在2011年底达到48万辆，为“Honda”、理念（EVERUS）的双品牌运营奠定良好的基础。
而为保证理念S1起步即领先，广汽本田从调研到开发，从零部件采购到生产保障，从销售到服务，打造理念S1的每一步都力保高水准。据介绍，理念S1不仅将与广汽本田现有产品共线生产，拥有相同的品质保障体系，同时也将在同一个销售网络中销售，并享有相同的售后服务体系，从而实现了“技术同步、品质同源、服务同网”。这意味着，广汽本田实现了一个企业，两个品牌，同一宗旨，同一体系，同一制造，同一服务的双品牌运营。理念S1自诞生起，就以广汽本田12年的积累为高起点。因此，理念S1将带给中国汽车市场的，不仅仅是一款真正意义上的国民车，更是一个在合资自主发展道路下严格按“起步，就领先一步”要求诞生的汽车品牌。
依托12年合资经验积累的中国车
广汽本田执行副总经理姚一鸣表示，理念（EVERUS）的最大优势，在于可以在广汽本田12年积累的基础上进行更进一步地发展。12年的合资经验积累，让广汽本田有足够的研发、采购、生产、销售、服务经验来发展理念（EVERUS），为国内风起云涌的合资自主浪潮树立了新的行业标杆。理念S1就是这一12年合资经验积累的首次集中展现。
据介绍，理念（EVERUS）品牌完全由广汽本田独资的广汽本田汽车研究开发有限公司开发，知识产权完全由广汽本田所拥有，配上全新的自主品牌标志。所以，理念（EVERUS）品牌流淌的血液来自合资公司，品牌的DNA是广汽本田的DNA。同时，理念（EVERUS）作为广汽本田旗下的两大品牌之一，其品牌产品享有与广汽本田现有产品相同的技术、品质和服务，即“技术同步、品质同源、服务同网”。理念（EVERUS）品牌的许多零部件都依据中国消费者需求进行开发，并完全按照广汽本田的技术标准及要求开发国内的供应商，确保机能性方面的零部件品质实现和广汽本田一致性。众所周知，广汽本田在多年的发展过程中树立了技术先进、品质可靠、服务优秀的良好口碑，所以，理念（EVERUS）品牌产品的技术和质量非常值得期待。理念S1也因此更加受到市场的高度关注。
与此同时，理念S1所依托的是包括广汽本田汽车研究开发公司在内的具有完整意义上的汽车企业的综合实力。从2007年广汽本田汽车研究开发公司成立之日起，自主研发就开启了广汽本田全新的发展时代。广汽本田通过理念品牌的发展，建立并强化了公司的研发、制造及营销体制，并使得已有的制造及营销功能得以拓展，能够与研发进行联动，实现了由汽车制造工厂向完整汽车企业的转变。
树立中国汽车自主研发新标杆
本届车展上亮相的理念S1，承载着广汽本田开辟自主品牌发展全新模式与道路的企业责任，也是广汽本田强调市场意识，尊重顾客需求的发展观念。广汽本田发展理念品牌，是厚积薄发，顺势而为。它开创了新形势下自主品牌发展的新思路和新模式，建立了一整套合资自主研发的体系及方法，为同行提供了极为宝贵的经验参考。
对此，姚一鸣表示，发展自主品牌，不仅仅意味着将为消费者提供更多的选择，对广汽本田来说也意味着企业体系竞争力的全面提升。三年来，通过理念S1整车设计、零部件采购、生产工艺和品质控制等方面工作的开展，广汽本田建立了一套自主研发的体系与流程，总结出自主研发工作开展的方法，初步建立了自主研发的数据库，同时建立了关键零部件的开发与采购体系，促进了广汽本田的人才自立化发展。这些成果为广汽本田自主研发能力的提升和未来的可持续发展提供了强大保障，同时也为国内其他合资自主品牌的发展提供了可资借鉴的宝贵经验。
一位行业专家分析，中国汽车合资企业的第一个自主品牌，诞生在广汽本田并非偶然。广汽本田的股东双方――Honda始终秉承以技术为先导的企业理念，而广东是中国改革开放的策源地，一直以来以“敢为天下先”的精神走在全国前列,“广货”的品质和水准多年来在中国消费者心中有口皆碑。广汽本田多年来经营良好，款款产品热销，积累了很好的品牌形象。理念（EVERUS）诞生于以品质、服务见长的广汽本田，传承了Honda对技术、品质孜孜以求的DNA，承袭了岭南文化中脚踏实地、务实敢为的精神，从而为中国汽车业的自主研发探索出了一条新路。

description.hltext_display: San Francisco Dentist Offers State-of-the-Art Technology In Aesthetic And Restorative Dental Care
description.author: AndrwKar
description.content:
San Francisco, CA, 22-DEC-2010: Aesthetika.net is pleased to announce that Dr. Rebecca Castaneda, San Francisco Dentist offers state-of-the-art technology in aesthetic and restorative dental care that is effective and long-lasting. The doctor has developed the methods and techniques necessary to provide you with the beautiful smile you want quickly and effectively.
The doctor uses her renowned artistic and technical expertise to create natural looking smile that reflect the overall health and well-being of her patient. When the doctor meets with a patient, she conducts a thorough examination to determine what will be required to achieve the desired look for the patient. Extensive testing and x-rays are taken to determine an individual's bite and the alignment of their jaw.
After analyzing the information collected, the doctor will discuss how to most effectively achieve the desired results. Dr. Castaneda provides patients with options that will allow them to reach their goals for a beautiful and healthy smile in the most comfortable and warm environment available.
When interviewed recently, Dr. Castaneda stated, "As a Doctor of Dental Surgery, I realized that many people have issues with their teeth that are never addressed. In order for a patient to get the beautiful and healthy smile that they want, it is important that they get the appropriate dental care and, if necessary, the surgery that is required to give their teeth a healthy environment in which to thrive. My practice is devoted to helping individuals achieve their goals and I enjoy seeing each patient develop the confidence and self-esteem that having a beautiful smile gives them."
To get more information on the methods and techniques used by Dr. Rebecca Castaneda, San Francisco Dentist to help individuals achieve the beautiful smile they want through restorative dental care, visit http://www.aesthetika.net today. Individuals or members of the press interested in getting more details about this press release will find contact information below.
Dr. Rebecca Castaneda
Aesthetika.net
450 Sutter Street, 1616
San Francisco, CA 94108
Telephone: 415.986.1616
Email: smile@aesthetika.net
Website: http://www.aesthetika.net
Kontakt
Dr. Rebecca Castaneda
Aesthetika.net
450 Sutter Street, 1616
San Francisco, CA 94108

description.hltext_display: Emotions and tradition clash over anti-gun move
description.content: Supporters and opponents of a proposal aimed at limiting access to guns have launched their campaigns ahead of a nationwide vote in February.Switzerland has the highest number of arms per capita, with estimates varying between 1.2 million and 2.3 million. But exact data are not available as there is no central arms register. Shaken by a number of high-profile killings over the past decade a broad alliance of human rights groups, churches, women’s organisations, trade unions and centre-left political parties has succeeded in forcing a nationwide ballot on an anti-gun initiative.� As in other countries many arms are in the hands of hunters, collectors and marksmen in Switzerland. Yet one of the peculiarities of the country is that members of the militia army keep their personal army-issue guns at home - in many cases even following completion of mandatory service.� It is a long tradition that carbines, pistols and even assault rifles - a standard infantry weapon - are kept in Swiss households.� For decades the high number of firearms in the public sphere appeared to give little cause for concern. The problems only came to the fore in the context of a series of attacks and family killings, including the attack by a lone gunman on a cantonal parliament in 2001 and the murder of a former Swiss ski star by her husband four years ago.� A recent survey by criminologist Martin Killias estimates that up to 300 people are killed by army-issue firearms annually in Switzerland. A 70-strong coalition from civil society - backed by the centre-left Social Democrats and the Greens - last year handed in the necessary number of signatures for an initiative which seeks to set up a national arms register and ban army-issue firearms from private households.� It also aims to tighten regulations for licensed gun holders in an effort to fight possible abuse.� “It’s hard to understand why it should not be possible to set up a national database for a tool that can be used to kill - and that in a country where every cow, dog and parrot is registered,” said Jean-Pierre Monti of the union representing employees of the federal police force.� Jacques de Haller of the Swiss Medical Association adds that the initiative is not a pacifist smokescreen to weaken the army.� “We want to save lives, not do away with the army,” he said.� Storing army firearms in private homes is a serious security risk as the suicide rate among young men is particularly high, prevention specialists warn.� The slogan of the campaigners is, aptly, “Protect your family – vote yes to preventing gun violence”. Posters picture a teddy bear with blood dripping from a hole in its chest. However, most parties in parliament, notably from the centre-right and rightwing, as well as the government have come out against the initiative.� Opening the campaign at the beginning of December, Justice Minister Simonetta Sommaruga said the current gun law was sufficient to protect the population against misuse� and that the initiative would be difficult to put into practice.� Yvan Perrin, a parliamentarian for the rightwing Swiss People’s Party argues that a central database is a first step towards banning firearms altogether.� Perrin adds that a ban to keep army-issue guns in households is tantamount to disarming soldiers and would seriously undermine mandatory shooting practice and traditional shooting competitions.� “Allowing members of the armed forces to keep their guns at home is a sign of respect by the state for its citizens,” Perrin said.� The initiative wants army-issue firearms to be stored in arsenals and discharged soldiers - except for licensed marksmen - would no longer be able to keep their guns.� But the exemptions leave Perrin unconvinced.� “If they insist on a strict application of the initiative hardly anybody will be able to prove that they do need the weapon,” he argued. Less than eight weeks before the vote on February 13, the campaign still has to pick up but it has already become clear how emotional and controversial the issue is perceived to be by the public.� An interview with a former senior defence ministry official who came out in favour of the initiative prompted a wave of readers’ feedback – from both supporters and opponents.� Defence Minister Ueli Maurer felt it was necessary to respond publicly, alleging the retired official was out of touch with reality and lacked credibility.� Opponents of the initiative have dismissed a call by a United Nations committee to restrict access to firearms in Switzerland as an interference in internal affairs.� “The Swiss are responsible citizens and they decide themselves about Swiss laws,” a curt statement put it.

description.hltext_display: Home from hospital
description.content:
Coming together at Christmas is especially hard for families with a child in intensive care.
Visiting restrictions in hospitals can separate parents and siblings, friends and relatives.
But staff at a London trust have found a way of halving the time in hospital for children who need a ventilator to breathe.
They say their approach is saving the health service millions of pounds.
Fourteen month-old Phoebe Langlands has a rare respiratory condition called Congenital Central Hypoventilation Syndrome (CCHS) which means she stops breathing when she sleeps.
Christmas together
Most children in her condition would be stuck in intensive care. But she is already home in Bromley with her parents and four siblings, getting ready for a lively family Christmas.
Her father John says they are all delighted to have her home. "It means that we can all be in the same place at once. "We haven't got to go to hospital to see Phoebe to have a Christmas with her. The children haven't got to wait for us to come home. "We will have our Christmas like a normal family would do, which is very pleasing because we can all enjoy ourselves." Phoebe has a small, portable ventilator set up next to her cot. In the last few years the kit has become smaller, more portable, and more sophisticated, giving patients and their carers greater freedom.
The Royal Brompton hospital in London has found that this equipment, backed up by the right training for parents and community health staff, helps to get children out of intensive care and settled at home.
John and his wife Pippa get regular help checking and setting the ventilator. There's always access to expert advice and a healthcare assistant stays each night to keep an eye on Phoebe.
That is a big commitment for the family and for the health service, but the alternative is many more months for Phoebe in ICU.
Dr Gillian Halley, a paediatric intensive care consultant at the Royal Brompton, says it's incredibly frustrating to see children in the unit who should not have to be there. "What the child really needs is to be out of hospital, to be in a home environment where they can be picked up and cuddled and played with, and have normal bedtimes and bathtimes and playtimes with the family and have their brothers and sisters around them." Space for others
She and her colleagues have helped dozens of children like Phoebe to get home more quickly, halving the time spent in intensive care to as little as three months, and saving the trust hundreds of thousands of pounds per patient.
And she says once they are home the children invariably thrive. "They develop better, they have more social skills, they have more time with their family. "They have more playtime and quite often we see an improvement in their physical condition as well. "The lung function improves and we can start to wean them off the ventilators because they've been at home and getting all that stimulation from the parents and the family and visitors to the home." Dr Halley says getting these children out of hospital also frees up intensive care beds for others who need the highly specialised support they can provide.
The Health Secretary for England, Andrew Lansley, said it was "fantastic" to see what the scheme had achieved. "This project not only allows families to be together for Christmas, but shows how treatment can be more effective and efficient, reducing the cost which means savings can be channelled back into the NHS to improve services further."

event_or_fact.property: it's incredibly frustrating to see children in the unit who should not have to be there
they are all delighted to have her home
getting these children out of hospital also frees up intensive care beds for others who need the highly specialised support they can provide
it was "fantastic" to see what the scheme had achieved
once they are home the children invariably thrive

description.hltext_display: حماس تربط استمرار المصالحة مع فتح بالإفراج عن المعتقلين السياسيين
description.content:
دمشق 22 ديسمبر 2010 (شينخوا) أكدت حركة المقاومة الإسلامية (حماس) أن إضافة المعتقلين السياسيين من قيادتها وعناصرها في سجون السلطة الوطنية الفلسطينية في الضفة الغربية إلى قائمة تبادل الأسرى مع إسرائيل بات خيارا مطروحا، باعتبار أن الأجهزة الأمنية التي اعتقلتهم تنفذ تعليمات إسرائيلية، وربطت موضوع متابعة جلسات حوار المصالحة الوطنية مع حركة التحرير الوطني الفلسطيني (فتح) بالإفراج عن هؤلاء المعتقلين لديها.
ونقلت صحيفة ((الوطن)) السورية في عددها الصادر اليوم (الأربعاء) عن عزت الرشق وصالح العاروري عضوا المكتب السياسي للحركة في مؤتمر صحفي عقداه بدمشق قولهما " نحن وفينا لكم ولكل أبناء شعبنا حين قمنا بعملية أسر جندي اسرائيلي (جلعاد شاليط) وقدمنا آلاف الضحايا شهداء وجرحى وأيضا بيوتا مهدمة وحصارا على شعب كامل تقديرا منا لنضال شعبنا، فهل مكافأتنا تكون من الأجهزة الأمنية في الضفة أن تعمل تحت غطاء حركة فتح على تدمير كل ما هو شريف وجميل في هذا الوطن ".
وأوضح العاروري ردا على سؤال، أن خيار إضافة المعتقلين السياسيين في سجون السلطة إلى قائمة تبادل الأسرى مع إسرائيل " لم نكن نفكر فيه لكن هذه القضية وتصاعد موضوع القمع والتعذيب في الأشهر الأخيرة طرح الموضوع على جدول الأعمال، وأصبح الآن مطروحا "، مضيفا " إذا لم يكن هناك من حل إلا أن يحرروا عن طريق صفقة مع إسرائيل ربما يكون هذا خيارا مطروحا ".
وربط العاروري مسألة متابعة جلسات جوار المصالحة مع حركة فتح بالإفراج عن المعتقلين السياسيين، وقال " نحن من حرك المصالحة لأن في ذلك مصلحة الشعب الفلسطيني، لكن لا يمكننا أن نجلس مع وفد فتح ونصافحه، وأبناؤنا يقتلون داخل السجون بالإضرابات المفتوحة عن الطعام وتحت التعذيب "، موضحا أن هؤلاء " الأسرى لم يصلوا إلى هذه الفترة الطويلة من الإضراب عن الطعام إلا وقد تساوى عندهم الموت والحياة التي يعيشونها في سجون السلطة ".
بدوره وردا على سؤال، إن كانت هذه المواقف من حركة حماس هي محاولات للتهرب من المصالحة، قال الرشق " ليس هناك هروب.. نحن من حركنا المياه الراكدة في قضية المصالحة، وطرقنا أبوابا من أجل إنجازها ونحن حريصون عليها، لكن هل مطلوب أن يبقى المعتقلون السياسيون المضربون عن الطعام يعانون بصمت دون أن يسمع صوتهم أحد، وهل المطلوب أن يصلوا إلى مرحلة الهلاك، لذلك أقول إن " الذي يقوم بمثل هذه الممارسات هو الذي يلبد الغيوم، ولا يساعد على إيجاد أجواء ملائمة للمصالحة ".
يشار إلى أن أعضاء من حركة حماس المعتقلين في سجون السلطة الوطنية الفلسطينية قد دخلوا في اليوم السابع والعشرين من إضرابهم المفتوح عن الطعام وهم محمد شوقية، ومجد عبيد، وأحمد العويوي ،ووائل البيطار، ووسام القواسمي، ومهند نيروخ.
وكان نايف حواتمة الامين العام للجبهة الديمقراطية لتحرير فلسطين قد اعتبر في مقابلة خاصة مع وكالة أنباء (شينخوا) أمس (الثلاثاء) أن الحوار الثنائي بين حركتي فتح وحماس " لن ينتج مصالحة بين الحركتين ولن ينتج إعادة بناء الوحدة الوطنية الفلسطينية لأن الحوار يدور على مصالح فئوية ضيقة لكلا الطرفين ".

description.hltext_display: ·《创：战纪》称霸北美 首� 票房超过《阿凡达》
description.content:
迪士尼为宣传《创：战纪》而特别制作的米妮版海报。
赶在圣诞前一周，备受影迷期待的《创：战纪》(Tron：Legacy)隆重上映，以首周末4360万美元的成绩给略显低迷的北美市场注入新鲜活力。作为迪士尼的年度大作，这个成绩虽然没有达到预期，还是遥遥领先了其他电影。据悉，影片已经确定于明年1月11日登陆内地银幕，IMAX版本也将同步引进。
由约瑟夫科金斯基执导，《创：战纪》是1982年科幻片《电子世界争霸战》的续集。继承了老版的科幻概念和视觉元素，结合目前顶尖的C G和3D技术，影片采用2D +3D切割真实世界和电子世界的创新方式上映，周四午夜登场当晚就创下了360万美元的票房，超过了《阿凡达》的350万和《盗梦空间》的300万。值得注意的是，《创：战纪》的午夜票房中有约100万美元是来自IMAX银幕，超过总数的四分之一，这个占比超过了《阿凡达》和《钢铁侠2》，创下了IM A X首映的新纪录。
不过高开之后影片并没有达到预期中的目标———首周6000万美元的票房，这多少让出品方迪士尼有些失望，下了1.7亿美元血本的迪士尼也只能寄希望于影片能像《阿凡达》那样在海外市场有不错的表现，据目前的统计数字来看，《创：战纪》在26个国家和地区的3832家影院收入2300万美元。

description.hltext_display: Viral Video: Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg on "Why We Have So Few Women Leaders” [BoomTown]
description.author: Kara Swisher
description.content:
Yesterday, BoomTown posted about how the five hottest Web 2.0 companies have no women on their board of directors .
In the middle of the report, I embedded a video from a recent speech Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg made at an women-focused TED event, which I thought spoke eloquently to the topic.
In fact, the social networking giant–as well as social gaming site Zynga, social buying site Groupon, geolocation site Foursquare and microblogging site Twitter–was one of the companies without any women on its board.
Including Sandberg, although she attends its meetings (but not its executive sessions).
Here’e her TED talk, which is well worth watching:

description.hltext_display: 赵本山宋丹丹均否认春晚再合作
description.content:
本周五，央视兔年春晚语言类节目第四次审查将在中央电视台继续举行。昨日，有媒体率先爆料，称赵本山会在四审时亮相，并将与宋丹丹再次合作，出演小品《同桌的你》。不过，据记者从央视春晚剧组得到的消息，赵本山出现在四审的可能性微乎其微，而进组后演什么节目也还没有确定。同时，本山传媒艺术总监刘双平也在接受南都记者采访时表示，“网上的消息是不准确的”，宋丹丹经纪人王梦琳的态度则有些模棱两可“现在一切都还没确定”。
据网上消息显示：文章的作者从赵本山身边工作人员处独家获悉，2011兔年春晚本山小品虽然供挑选的本子已有几个，但基本有了眉目，更倾向于一个新题材本子，名字叫《同桌的你》，演出搭档则选择曾经在央视春晚几度合作的著名喜剧演员宋丹丹。该工作人员表示，这个小品非常值得期待，也是本山和宋丹丹“山丹丹”组合在央视春晚的第六次牵手。
为了核实事情的可靠性，记者先后向本山传媒艺术总监刘双平和宋丹丹经纪人王梦琳进行了求证，得到的答案和网上的消息也有一些出入。刘双平表示，“赵本山春晚小品的剧本目前还在筹备之中，网上的消息是不准确的”。王梦琳则称“还没定下来，等有了确切消息会通知大家”。随后，记者又联系了春晚剧组一位不愿透露姓名的工作人员，对方表示赵本山应该不会在本周五的四审上亮相，“按往年的惯例，本山老师基本上很少参加审查，都是直接参加彩排。而且据我了解，目前本山老师的剧本还没有敲定。”（记者埃里克）

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said.
Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".
Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.
He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."
He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time.
"We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."
On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."
He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

description.hltext_display: TOM专访斯巴鲁市场企划部部长高桥一哉
description.content:
王伟：各位tom的网友大家好，这里是2010年广州国际车展，我们现在是在tom的直播间。今天我们有请到的是斯巴鲁市场企划部的高桥一哉部长。下面请高桥部长介绍一下今年斯巴鲁参加广州车展参展的阵容，以及有哪些亮点车型？
嘉宾：首先最大的亮点就是发布了一款2011款新森林人这一款车型，最大改善的特点就是使用了第三代我们斯巴鲁水平对置发动机。这款发动机跟以往的发动机做了很大的改善。其中一点是提高了燃油经济性。其他的阵容全车系，基本上所有车系都有展示。还有一个亮点就是我们前天刚在佛冈结束的拉力赛，我们车手的韩寒夺冠的赛车也拉到现场。大家请到我们的展台参观。
王伟：我们知道在不久前斯巴鲁的销量突破了10万辆。我想知道森林人作为咱们在国内销售的重点车型，如果说它占到了70%的销量比例，那对于整体的车型来说，森林人销售了这么多，是不是会对于其他车型的销售有点偏头重脚低的感觉？
嘉宾：我们从2004年进入中国开始销售。那时候销售中间主要车型还是森林人。但是正好去年也是在这个广州车展，我们在这发布了一款新傲虎车型。这个傲虎车型正式销售是从今年初开始，这个傲虎车型受到广大消费者的青睐。有些地区，尤其是广东地区傲虎的车型销量已经超过了森林人。所以说近期来看不仅仅是森林人的销量占的比例大了，我们的傲虎车型，还有去年发布的力狮车型的销量也慢慢增长，尤其是傲虎车型的增长速度特别快。
王伟：我个人也非常喜欢森林人这款车，在路上跑的非常多，也非常受到国内消费者的欢迎。但是有一个问题，现在目前为止，甚至于在国内销售的国产自主SUV的变速箱都已经到了5速自动，我们的森林人为什么还一直在引用4速的变速箱？
嘉宾：当然我们作为厂家，一直在开发的过程中看到，什么样的变速箱会最适合这款车，这是一直在做研究的。在研发的过程中有一个最大的科技，就是5速自动变速箱和4速变速箱的区别，就是重量。这个5速比4速的要重很多。第三代水平发动机这款发动机目的是提高燃油经济性。然后我们用5速和4速的变速箱和新一代的水平发动机比较了一下，觉得还是4速的燃油经济性比较好，所以说我们选择了用4速。我们的数据显示，在2.0升的SUV里面，我们现在森林人燃油经济性是最好的一个车型。
王伟：有很多人都一直在关注这个问题，我想这回他们有答案了。咱们再来说说新傲虎，在国内新款又加长又加大了。我想问包括后悬挂都采用了双外形的后悬挂。这些调整以及调教都是出于什么目的？
嘉宾：刚才您也提到这款傲虎车型比以前的要更长更大了，所以说我们要注重想让这款车在操控的时候怎么稳定车身，所以采用了双外形后悬挂。我们斯巴鲁品牌强调的就是驾控性，所以我们必须采用双外形后悬挂来控制这个车辆，我们品牌所强调的驾控性比较体现在这个车型上。还有一个双外形悬挂可以提高后轮的抓地力，拐弯的时候的抓地力，所以说我们选择了这个悬挂。
王伟：在咱们斯巴鲁全系的车系里面采用双外形的悬挂还有什么其他特性？
嘉宾：其他的话就是力狮。
王伟：像这种后轮双外形悬挂，跟翼豹那种是完全的两种概念是吗？
嘉宾：现在的斯巴鲁的所有车型，基本上就是有一些区别。
王伟：关于斯巴鲁一直在国产化的问题大家都很关注，包括跟北汽集团和庞大集团有消息说要进行合资。北汽占了25%，庞大占25%，斯巴鲁占5%，这个情况是怎么样？
嘉宾：我们斯巴鲁品牌的车辆销量是每年增长，所以说我们当然也会去考虑在中国生产的问题。但是我们只是现在还在从各方面去探讨这个事情，而这个事情还没有决定下来。
王伟：我知道咱们斯巴鲁在前身是飞机的制造商。现在有很多飞机一直在沿用这个水平对置的发动机，这个水平对置的发动机解决AWD，这个东西相对于传统的最直接的区别在哪？
嘉宾：最大的区别我说一点，水平对置发动机活塞是横向去动的，跟那些竖着的或者斜着的位置要低很多，所以说在车辆或者别的东西重心低的话稳定，操控性稳定，这是最大的区别。还有一点就是我们和水平对置发动机配套的是直列放的变速箱和AWD底盘系统，这是我们斯巴鲁独有的一套东西是我们的强项。而且我们从1972年就开始做四驱系统，我们对这方面的操控稳定性，四驱的安全性是非常有自信的。
王伟：截止到目前为止11月份，斯巴鲁整个在国内销量大概是什么情况？有没有完成今年既定的全年的目标？
嘉宾：首先说一个销量的台数的话，我们11月底是52000台，再加上我们预计12月底会达到57000台。我们年初的预期目标是5万台。虽然我们的数量跟所有市场的数量来比是很小的一个数字，但是作为斯巴鲁厂家来说是比较满意的数字。
王伟：2011年咱们在市场的销量，以及一些市场活动，会不会推出一些新车？
嘉宾：首先我们刚推出的森林人作为明年主要重点去考虑怎么推广，怎么销售是一个重头。哈尔滨我们会做一个试驾会，还会做一些别的让大家期待的一些东西。
王伟：现在在混合动力以及新能源方面各个厂家都在研发。斯巴鲁在混合动力方面会有哪些举措，还是会有一些具体的车型，还是会有一个什么样的情况？
嘉宾：我们正在探讨将来2012，或者2013年左右会发布一款混合动力车型。
王伟：是量产的车型？
嘉宾：是。特定在日本的国内有一款纯电动的车型，在日本对政府机关，一些团体在销售。
王伟：也是斯巴鲁的？
嘉宾：对。
王伟：是小型的，续航等等介绍一下。
嘉宾：它是微型的一个小车，充满电的话现在是，我也记得不太清楚，好像是80公里这样子。
王伟：等到哈尔滨的时候再请教。今天在非常愉快的气氛当中，我们与高桥先生做了一次非常密切的关于斯巴鲁的市场，斯巴鲁的车型，以及斯巴鲁未来的一些市场运作方面的信息。今天由于时间的关系，我们跟斯巴鲁跟高桥先生聊到这里。希望以后tom的网友继续关注tom汽车，继续关注斯巴鲁。谢谢高桥先生。

description.hltext_display: Umfrage der Deutschen Vermögensberatung (DVAG) zeigt: Junge Deutsche zunehmend zufriedener
description.author: dvag
description.content:
Posted Dezember 22nd, 2010 by dvag
Frankfurt am Main, 22. Dezember 2010 ‒ Das Jahr 2010 neigt sich dem Ende zu – ein Anlass für viele Menschen, die vergangenen Monate noch einmal Revue passieren zu lassen. Die Deutsche Vermögensberatung (DVAG) hat deshalb in Zusammenarbeit mit dem Sozialforscher Wolfgang Gibowski in einer Bevölkerungsumfrage durch das Berliner Marktforschungsinstitut USUMA über 1.000 Bürgerinnen und Bürger gebeten, ihr persönliches Resümee für 2010 zu ziehen.
Laut den aktuellen Umfrageergebnissen der DVAG zur Entwicklung der allgemeinen Lebenszufriedenheit ist immerhin ein Viertel der Menschen zufriedener als noch vor einem Jahr, 20 Prozent empfinden allerdings eine Verschlechterung. Für etwas mehr als die Hälfte der Menschen hierzulande hat sich in ihrem Leben im Vergleich zum Vorjahr nicht viel verändert. Dabei gibt es keine nennenswerten Unterschiede zwischen Frauen und Männern, so die Deutsche Vermögensberatung.
Die meisten „U 30“ in diesem Jahr mit dem Leben zufriedener
Betrachtet man die Ergebnisse der Umfrage der DVAG genauer, fallen dennoch interessante Unterschiede auf: Bei den jüngeren Menschen bis 29 Jahre gibt die Mehrzahl an, dass sich ihr Leben zum Besseren verändert hat (55 Prozent). Dagegen empfinden nicht einmal 5 Prozent dieser Gruppe, dass sich ihr Leben verschlechtert hat. Bei den Menschen im Alter zwischen 30 und 50 ist das Ergebnis relativ ausgewogen: Für 33 Prozent hat sich das Leben persönlich verbessert, für 23 Prozent verschlechtert und bei rund 42 Prozent ist es unverändert. Ab 50 sieht die Sache anders aus, denn meist ändert sich nichts (60 Prozent), und wenn, dann eher zum Schlechteren (25 Prozent).
Kein Wirtschaftsaufschwung für die private Finanzlage
In der Frage zur Entwicklung ihrer persönlichen finanziellen Situation, gaben nur 18 Prozent der Befragten an, dass sich ihre Lage verbessert habe, für 28 Prozent hat sie sich hingegen sogar verschlechtert – und das trotz des klaren wirtschaftlich Aufschwungs in Deutschland. Für 54 Prozent blieb alles beim Alten, zeigen die Umfrageergebnisse der DVAG.
Ähnlich wie bei der ersten Frage der USUMA-Umfrage im Auftrag der Deutschen Vermögensberatung nach der Beurteilung der persönlichen Lebenssituation im Allgemeinen, verbessert sich die finanzielle Lage bis zum Alter von 30 Jahren bei über einem Drittel der Befragten, danach nimmt dieser Wert kontinuierlich ab. Ob Mann oder Frau macht hier, wie auch bei der ersten Frage, keinen nennenswerten Unterschied.
Zufriedenheit stark von persönlicher Finanzsituation abhängig
Auffällig ist jedoch, dass die persönliche Zufriedenheit offenbar eng mit der eigenen finanziellen Situation verbunden ist. Von denjenigen, für die sich ihre finanzielle Lage in diesem Jahr verbessert hat, sagen auch 68 Prozent, ihr Leben habe sich verbessert. Dort, wo sich die finanzielle Lage dagegen verschlechtert hat, geben 48 Prozent an, ihr Leben habe sich eher verschlechtert.
„Persönliches Glück hängt zwar nicht nur, aber eben auch mit Finanzen zusammen“, sagt Dr. Ralf-Joachim Götz, Chefvolkswirt der Deutschen Vermögensberatung (DVAG). Und er ergänzt: „Da viele Menschen schon in jungen Jahren den finanziellen Aufstieg schaffen, sollten sie auch rechtzeitig mit dem Sparen für ein sorgenfreies Leben im Alter beginnen. Denn wer im Rentenalter ohne private Absicherung dasteht, kommt schnell aus dem finanziellen und damit oft auch aus dem emotionalen Gleichgewicht. Glück im Alter kann man nicht unbedingt kaufen, aber man kann es fördern – beispielsweise mit einer privaten Rentenversicherung, die zudem vom Staat unterstützt wird.“
Angaben zur Methode der Befragung: In der Zeit vom 15.-18. November 2010 wurden im Auftrag der Deutschen Vermögensberatung (DVAG) von der USUMA GmbH Berlin 1011 Erwachsene telefonisch befragt. Die Fehlertoleranz beträgt bei Ergebnissen von 50 Prozent plus/minus 3 Prozentpunkte. Die wissenschaftliche Leitung liegt bei Wolfgang G. Gibowski – Beratung & Kommunikation Berlin.
Über die Deutsche Vermögensberatung (DVAG):
Mit ihren über 37.000 haupt- und nebenberuflichen Vermögensberatern betreut die Deutsche Vermögensberatung über 5,4 Millionen Kunden branchenübergreifend rund um die Themen „Vermögen planen – Vermögen sichern – Vermögen mehren.“ Der 1975 von Prof. Dr. Reinfried Pohl gegründete Finanzvertrieb erzielte im Geschäftsjahr 2009 Umsatzerlöse in Höhe von rund 1,1 Milliarden Euro und einen Jahresüberschuss von rund 140 Millionen Euro. Aktuelle Informationen und Unternehmensnachrichten finden Sie unter www.dvag-aktuell.de.

description.hltext_display: Jonathan Takiff: There's still time to buy a gadget gift before Christmas
description.author: Jonathan Takiff Philadelphia Daily News
description.content:
THE GIZMO: Stocking stuffers for gadget lovers.
YES, MARTHA: There's still time to find a smart something to please the gadget geek on your shopping list.
OPEN ME FIRST: Need motivation for tree-trimming and present-wrapping? One of Sony's "Yule Log DVD" videodiscs, featuring a burning fireplace visual scored with a classic holiday album, could do the trick. Hit play with "Elvis' Christmas Album," Barry Manilow's "A Christmas Gift of Love," the rocking REO Speedwagon "Not So Silent Night" or the classic Phil Spector "A Christmas Gift For You" featuring Darlene Love and the Ronettes. By the way, the fire keeps "burning" after the music's logged out.
IT'S IN THE CARDS: What's our new definition of a gift that keeps on giving? A subscription to an on-demand music or video entertainment service that streams over the Internet to a personal computer, Internet-ready TV or specialty set-top box.
Best Buy is the place to find Napster music service gift cards, available in $5 (per month) to $60 (a year) increments. Napster plays through PCs and Macs, plus Squeezebox- and Sonos-streaming audio players. Parent company Best Buy is currently giving away a month's subscription to Napster with every CD it sells. May be the last disc you ever buy.
Usable on more devices, Rhapsody also offers a $5 a month all-you-can-listen-to music plan, but at www.Rhapsody.com pushes the $9.99 Premier version, also enabling music play and storage on a mobile phone.
With Netflix's new, $7.99 streaming-only (no mailed disc) option, you can buy someone a year's worth of on-demand movies and hit TV shows for less than $100 at www.netflix.com. Up to six Netflix-enabled devices (and what isn't these days?) can be linked to one account.
Clearly, there's a whole lot more to satellite radio than Howard Stern. But for devotees, the big story is the shock jock's recent re-signing for another five years. A $55 Sirius gift card will keep a Sternoid on cruise control for three months.
PHONE JUICE: For the occasional/emergency user (say a grade-schooler or senior), a basic, bargain mobile phone ($20 and up) with pay-as-you-go service makes a great gift. Best deal going is the $100 card for AT&T phones that keeps available minutes alive for an entire year. Lesser cards expire 90 days after activation.
CABLE NEWS: The dirty little secret of high-definition TVs is that sound emanating from flat-panel sets is pretty low-def. That's why manufacturers ALWAYS include audio output jacks (both digital and analog) to funnel the stereo/surround soundtrack to a better-quality receiver and speakers (or all-in-one soundbar).
One good way to make the connection is with a Belkin Digital Optical Audio Cable, spotted at Target in a 6-foot length priced reasonably at $14.69.
GAME PATROL: Wanna please a Wii gamer? Nintendo has a new-generation controller, Wii Remote Plus, that builds in the fine-tuning previously requiring an add-on component and case (Wii Motion Plus). The new WRP remote alone sells for $40. Or for just $5 more you can get one bundled with "Fling Smash," a swinging, swatting, knock-stuff-over romp ideal for casual players.
Got a portable gamer who's rough on stuff? The Nintendo DS Mini Backpack (about $10) has cute looks and reduces wear and tear.
ON THE ROAD AGAIN: An Energi To Go Portable Power Travel Kit from Energizer ($59.99 at discount/hardware stores) can charge up an assortment of devices. It comes with a 2000 MAh lithium polymer battery, AC plug, DC (car) plug and cord with four tips - Micro and Mini-USB, iPhone/iPod and Nokia connector. All pack into a well-designed carry case.
Less yet more, the ZAGGsparq 2.0 portable charger ($99 at www.zagg.com) boasts a 6000 MAh rechargeable battery and flip-out AC plug. It can rejuvenate two USB-connected devices simultaneously.
THEY'LL FLIP: You know a product has arrived when accessory makers start offering add-ons. Bower has just introduced the .45x Wide Angle Magnetic Lens ($39.99 from beachcamera.com), first to carry an official "Designed for Flip Video" logo. Easy to install, the lens captures more people or scenery, without diminishing picture clarity. Works with Flip Ultra, Mino, UltraHD, Mino HD and SlideHD cameras.
BLU-CHRISTMAS: Gotta throw in some worthy Blu-ray library builders for anyone getting a Blu-ray high-definition videodisc player this holiday. "Sherlock - Season One" (BBC) mods up the crime-solving Holmes with weird and amusing effect. The even stranger, repeat-when-necessary thriller "Inception" (Warner Bros.) proves an apt match for Blu-ray's added detailing.
For family fun, jump on the Shanghai, China-set remake of "The Karate Kid" (Sony) with movie star offspring Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan, the touching and technically remarkable "Toy Story 3" (Walt Disney), the joyous documentary "Babies" (Universal), and French-flaired animation charmer "Despicable Me" (Universal), even more of a roller-coaster ride in 3-D.
Ditto the totally in-your-face, break-dancing celebration "Step Up 3D" (Touchstone). And newly freshened/enhanced for Blu-ray are "Collectors Editions" of "The Bridge on the River Kwai," (Sony) and "The Exorcist" (Warner Bros.), and the "25th Anniversary Trilogy" boxing of "Back to The Future" (Universal), which takes us all the way to 2015!
Send e-mail to takiffj@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: Two killed after inhaling gas at Dr Reddy's Lab
description.content:
Tags: Dr Reddy's Lab, Two killed, News
Two workers of the drug firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories lost their lives and two others fell unconscious in an accidental gas leak this morning at its manufacturing plant at Bollaram on the outskirts of Hyderabad.
"Only after examination by the medical experts, we can know the name of the chemical which leaked," police said adding further details were awaited.
In a statement, Dr Reddy's Laboratories said an employee of the company and a contract staff had died in the accident.
"The authorities are currently investigating the unfortunate deaths of an employee and a contract staff working at our manufacturing facility in Bollaram, Hyderabad," it said.
"No other persons were injured. We will advise on further details once the investigations are complete," the company's statement added.
The firm's Bollaram manufacturing facility produces active pharmaceutical ingredients (API).
Police said the victims at the company's facility that is located in Medak district of Andhra Pradesh were on night duty.
There was a chemical leakage from a unit at Bollaram village of Dr Reddy's Laboratories which resulted in two deaths and two falling ill, it said.
Reacting to the news, shares of Dr Reddy's tanked 4.13 per cent to a month-low of Rs 1,618 per piece on the Bombay Stock Exchange in early morning trade.
The scrip saw a similar fall on the National Stock Exchange, and quoted at Rs 1,616.10, down 4.18 per cent in the morning session.

event_or_fact.property: Two killed, News Two workers of the drug firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories lost their lives and two others fell

description.hltext_display: 袁咏仪� 智霖4岁爆帅儿子顽皮可爱
description.content:
袁咏仪张智霖4岁爆帅儿子私房照 顽皮可爱
袁咏仪在1990年夺得香港小姐冠军及最上镜小姐称号后进入娱乐圈，在凭借电影处女作《阿飞与阿基》夺得第12届香港电影金像奖最佳新人奖后，又以《新不了情》和《金枝玉叶》夺得第13、14届金像奖最佳女主角奖，成为金像奖历史上首位蝉联影后！2001年2月，袁咏仪和张智霖在国外旅行时秘密结婚，回香港后在铜锣湾郭富城经营的餐厅里补摆了喜酒。2006年11月12日，两人爱情结晶张慕童出生了！

description.content: Red Cross bloodmobile conducted a blood drive Dec. 9 at St. Michael’s Hall, Girard. A total of 53 persons registered to give blood.

description.hltext_display: Dalit woman abducted, gangraped for week
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
A 35-year-old Dalit woman was allegedly abducted and gangraped for nearly a week, a senior officer said here on Wednesday.
The woman was abducted on November 6 from Sadar Kanta area in the city by Chottelal Jha and his aide while she was going to her parents house in Gandhi Nagar locality, Superintendent of Police Akash Kulhari said.
The two men then took the woman to Mayaon village where they along with four others raped her for a week, the SP said.
"The woman somehow later managed to escape from their clutches and reached her in-laws house. The couple then informed the police about the incident on Tuesday after which an FIR had been lodged at Kotwali," he said.

description.hltext_display: Торгово-промышленная палата Армении имеет 20 представительств в разных странах мира
description.content:
ЕРЕВАН, 22 ДЕКАБРЯ, АРМЕНПРЕСС. . Как сказал в беседе с Арменпресс начальник Управления внешних связей ТППА Владимир Амирян, Палата выступает с различными инициативами в помощь отечественным предпринимателям. Так, предпринимателям-экспортерам предоставляется необходимая им информация о ситуации на мировых рынках и их зарубежных коллегах, потенциальных партнерах.
По словам В.Амиряна, наличие своих представителей в разных странах содействует и установлению бизнес-контактов между предпринимателями. ТППА имеет свои представительства в России, Чехии, Канаде, Болгарии, Таиланде, Аргентине, Сингапуре, Ираке, Туркменистане, Укранине, Хорватии, Германии, Нидерландах. В этом году представительства ТППА открылись также в Литве и Сирии.
ТППА представляет интересы своих членов-предпринимателей в Международной торговой палате, в Европалате, Международной ассоциации охраны промышленной собственности, в Международном выставочном бюро, в Международной организации труда. ТППА является полноправным членом Международной торговой палаты, Всемирной федерации палат, Европалаты, Ассоциации ТПП Черноморской зоны, Исполнительного совета ОЧЭС, а также Совета руководителей ТПП стран-членов СНГ. В Армении действуют 11 областных торгово-промышленных палат, которые, сотрудничая с компаниями-членами ТППА, оказывают широкий ассортимент услуг в плане улучшения бизнес-среды.

description.hltext_display: 提与林志玲分手言承旭现场落泪
description.content:
久未露面的言承旭前晚亮相湖南卫视《快乐大本营》的录制现场，几乎从不参加综艺节目的他首次面对“重口味”的“快乐家族”倍受折腾，一会被精心设计的贺寿环节感动得合不拢嘴，一会又被林志玲之前参加《快乐大本营》录制的片段弄得真情流露泪洒舞台。
言承旭的粉丝基本都属于母爱泛滥型，对“自家的孩子”很是维护，这一特性当天几乎让《快乐大本营》的录制临时停摆。事情发生在“快乐家族”旁敲侧击言承旭绯闻的环节，在言承旭坦言自己在感情世界中总是被甩的那一个之后，何炅等人有意将话题引到了其绯闻女友林志玲之上，并问言承旭要不要看看林志玲之前做客“大本营”时的片段，见言承旭有些犹豫，何炅大声问台下观众：“你们要不要看？”结果粉丝很不配合地齐呼“不要”，令何炅谢娜当场尴尬无语。此时节目导播还是按节目流程将林志玲的片段播了出来，何炅连声喊“停，我们需要得到言承旭的允许”，VCR仍然没有暂停，一言不发的言承旭也很坦然地回头注视着大荧幕。只不过这种坦然的状态在他看完VCR之后发生了改变，只见他的脸色明显变得很难看，低头一阵沉默之后，言承旭说：“我知道很多时候是我自己不好，我自己的性格当中一直有很深的孩子气，不能给对方安全感。虽然我知道不能一直这样下去，我也希望自己能够快点长大……”这时他再也无法控制情绪，当场落泪，台下粉丝们“阿旭加油！”的呼声响彻演播厅。

description.hltext_display: Sistema Shyam To Hit Capital Market Next Fiscal
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Sistema Shyam Telecom Ltd., or SSTL, plans to hit the capital market in the second half of next fiscal after completing its 20% stake sale to the government of Russia for $600 million early next year, say reports.
SSTL is a joint venture company between Russia's oil-to-telecom group Sistema, which owns 73.7% holding, with India's Shyam's Group holding 23.7% and the rest by public. SSTL operates in 13 of India's 22 telecom zones and holds licences for all circles.
Post issue, Sistema's stake in SSTL will reduce to around 54%, we below the government cap of 74% foreign investment mandated in Indian telecom sector.
Chief Executive Vsevolod Rozanov said, "We expect that next year we should be ready for listing. Then the board will make a decision depending on the market condition."
The Telecom Regulator Authority of India earlier recommended cancelling some telecom licences, including 10 held by Sistema Shyam, for failing to meet roll-out requirements. Rozanov said this would not affect Sistema's plans in India, as the company did not receive any show cause notice.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com
Copyright(c) 2010 RTTNews.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved
