description.hltext_display: 《子弹》奔2亿央视主播批评“太脏”
description.content:
《让子弹飞》16日公映后好评如潮，预计上映5天票房破2亿。在一片好评中也出现公开狠批《让子弹飞》的公众人物。日前央视《新闻联播》主持人郭志坚在个人博客上发文称，《让子弹飞》的脏话、血腥场面和性暗示把他折磨得只能提前离席，并担心该片将给孩子们“正在成长的身心注入一股非理性的冲动”。《让子弹飞》片方对此回应称，电影出来各种评论声音很正常，姜文不会对任何个人评论做单独回应。
央视主播称提前离席
12月16日下午，郭志坚在博客中写道：“充斥全片的脏话（国骂）、血腥场面和性暗示把我这个普通观众折磨得只能提前离席。我不是电影专家，绝不敢对电影的艺术水准妄加评论，不过作为一个普通观众我也知道，好电影里的硬汉形象绝不是用满嘴脏话塑造出来的，电影的吸引力也不是靠展示当众剖腹和把手放在女性敏感部位，更别说用山西话喊的下流语言，这些只能让观众感觉极不舒服。”虽然郭志坚没有点名批评，但不少网友认为郭志坚目标对准的是《让子弹飞》。
郭志坚还表达了自己的担忧：“我国的电影没有分级制度，但试问当一个孩子看了这些‘拳头加枕头’的画面后是否会给他们正在成长的身心注入一股非理性的冲动，我很担心！票房重要，责任更重要！”
鉴于央视《新闻联播》主播的身份，郭志坚的这一番批评瞬时在网络上掀起了波澜。对于郭志坚的批评，只有少数网友表示赞同，“一股非理性的冲动”这一表达也遭到讽刺，甚至有网友“炮制”了姜文对郭志坚言论的回应：“这也是我对《新闻联播》的看法。”
《让子弹飞》官方微博则进行了辟谣：“感谢大家对《让子弹飞》的关心和厚爱，也欢迎大家发表各种评论，需要说明的是：姜文导演从未也不会对任何个人评论做单独回应。请继续支持国产电影，让子弹飞一会儿。”

description.hltext_display: Feds to pay $2.5 million over 'terrorist' wiretaps
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO — A federal judge Tuesday ordered the U.S. government to pay more than $2.5 million in attorney fees and damages after he concluded investigators wiretapped the phones of a suspected terrorist organization without a warrant.
U.S. District Court Judge Vaughn Walker said the attorneys for the Ashland, Oregon chapter of the now-defunct Al-Haramain Islamic Foundation should receive $2.5 million for waging its nearly five-year legal challenge to the Bush administration's so-called Terrorist Surveillance Program.
Walker also awarded $20,400 each to Wendell Belew and Asim Ghafoor, two of the foundation's Washington D.C.-based lawyers. They had their phone conversations with Al-Haramain principals monitored, the judge said.
Every 10 years, a few states gain representatives in the House while others lose them, to reflect population shifts. Your guide to the politics of the U.S. Census. Full story
Earlier this year the judge found that investigators illegally intercepted the electronic communications without warrants. Government lawyers have refused throughout the litigation to disclose whether investigators eavesdropped, "although the fact of such surveillance is not in doubt," the judge concluded.
The Department of Justice lawyer who defended the program in court for the Bush administration and then the Obama administration, Anthony J. Coppolino, didn't return a phone call late Tuesday.
'Critical intelligence'
The judge refused to award any punitive damages, saying the investigators didn't act in bad faith in following the guidelines of the controversial program exposed by the New York Times in 2005.
"The record shows that the government had reason to believe that Al-Haramain supported acts of terrorism and that critical intelligence could be obtained by monitoring Al-Haramain," the judge said.
advertisement | ad info
Advertisement | ad info
Advertisement | ad info
The Treasury Department froze the assets of the Ashland chapter and declared it a "specially designated global terrorist" on Sept. 9, 2004. Treasury officials believe the Ashland chapter delivered $150,000 overseas to "support terrorist activities by the Chechen mujahideen," the judge concluded.
Only on msnbc.com
Pete Seda was convicted in October of tax fraud and conspiracy for helping another official of Al-Haramain smuggle the $150,000 out of the U.S. to Saudi Arabia in 2000. Seda's lawyers are preparing an appeal.
The eavesdropping was initially discovered when Treasury Department officials mistakenly turned over a document to Al-Haramain lawyers that appeared to be a top-secret call log.
Even though lawyers were ordered to give back the document and not rely on it in the lawsuit, they were still able to convince Walker with other evidence that they were warrantless wiretap targets.
Generally, government investigators are required to obtain search warrants signed by judges to eavesdrop on domestic phone calls, e-mail traffic and other electronic communications. But Bush authorized the surveillance program shortly after 9/11, allowing the National Security Agency to bypass the courts and intercept electronic communications believed connected to al-Qaida.
Bush ended the program in January 2007.

event_or_fact.property: the attorneys for the Ashland, Oregon chapter of the now-defunct Al-Haramain Islamic Foundation should receive $2.5 million for waging its nearly five-year legal challenge to the Bush administration's so-called Terrorist Surveillance Program

description.hltext_display: TOM专访东风悦达起亚销售本部副本部长蒋玉滨
description.content:
王伟：各位tom的网友大家好，这里是2010年广州国际车展，我们tom直播间今天请来了东风悦达起亚销售本部的副本部长蒋玉滨女士。下面有请蒋部长介绍一下今年东风悦达起亚在2010年广州国际车展上，我们参展的阵容，以及在这次车展上有一些什么重要的车型？
嘉宾：我们东风悦达起亚这回和起亚联合参展，这回参展的面积是我们有史以来最大的一次，2000平米。在这个展台上带来了我们所有的参展车型，现在的量产车比如刚上市的都是私跑，我们经济型车里面有锐欧，以及我们的科技动力车福瑞迪，赛拉图、欧风全系车型，还带来了我们未来混合动力车的概念车，有一个非常有趣的绿色混合动力车，和未来以后几年可能生产的车型。另外我们在这次车展上隆重地推出K5，这是一款中级轿车，是我们著名设计师彼得・希瑞尔的又一个力作，他是我们企业东风悦达起亚又一个体现，在车展上在展台上可以看到一台白色的K5，另外我们还为K5专门做了专区，用500平米像时光隧道一样，在这个专区里面可以看到我们不同颜色，不同配置的车型，以及一台解剖车。欢迎大家去我们的展台。
王伟：听了介绍之后在我的脑子里面形成了一个非常立体的景象，展台的样子，还有一种感触，就是我们的产品线真的是越来越长，车型越来越多。这么多的车型在2010年咱们东风悦达起亚销量怎么样？
嘉宾：这么多的车型也为我们企业带来了非常好的销量的提升。2010年我们截止到目前今天已经完成了327000台，全年实现33万没有悬念，应该是超额的。但是我们没有那么多车。同比去年相比我们增幅是45%，汽车行业整体增幅可能是30%，我们高于行业。
王伟：既然是车展，咱们就聊聊新车。K5这款车很多网上的网友都非常关注，这款车相信在北美上市之后，在国内大概什么时候会上市？以及这款车上市之后的市场定位什么样？
嘉宾：这款车在北美已经上市了，包括韩国都上市了，韩国获得了非常好的销量，很成功。这个车一经昨天的亮相，也获得了广大见面朋友的一个喜爱。这款车的正式销售将在明年3月份，预计我们在3月10号左右进行上市。这款车我们的目标客户群是城市精英层面，他应该是对生活有所想望，比较格调高雅的一群人。我们希望他跟我们现有的车型经济型车型是更高的目标与挑战。
王伟：这款车目前K5是属于代号，等到上市的时候会有一个正式的中文名吗？
嘉宾：不，这次我们就命名给它K5。一直以来我们在车名字的选择上都会进行很多的征集，但是在这个车的时候我们选了很多名字，觉得只有K5才能更加表现我们全新的一个想法和理念。K字本来就是起亚的一个带头，我们觉得K5更加国际化，更加耳目一新。所以本次命名就为K5。
王伟：除了K5之外，在之前时间应该也不是很长，咱们的智跑也是在国内跟消费者见面了。这款车无论从外形，还是发动机的一些性能，都是非常值得可圈可点的。这款车目前销量怎么样？
嘉宾：它是10月18号在杭州上市，两个多月的时间现在已经销售了8千多台。我们全年目标1万台也没有悬念。它的上市基本上达到，或者甚至超越了我们目前对它的期望。现在应该说我们已交车的订单只能满足意向客户的30%左右，远远地没有满足我们全国4S店首要的任务，是让等待的客户的时间要有耐心一些，然后进行很好的交流，工厂这边也在调整生产计划和步骤，来对应市场需求比较大的车型。应该说智跑以它流线的外观，我们叫动感的SUV车，以及高端配置，配置非常领先，多配置和先进的科学技术的应用，获得了消费者的喜爱。
王伟：智跑确实是非常不错。东风悦达起亚之下还有狮跑，很多人都感觉，比如说智跑是狮跑的升级换代，在市场销售的时候会不会有干扰？
嘉宾：这也是我们原来在战略布局时考虑到，智跑向城市精英层面更高级的轿车。而狮跑更像一台SUV车，目标客户群就是喜爱越野这样的一群人。目前从三个并行销售来看，并没有影响施跑的销量，反而因为来店人数的增加，使得我们狮跑销量跟过去没有特别大的差异。整个SUV市场都是这样，每进来一个车，谁家的销量也没减，SUV整个市场强占了轿车市场。所以我们在起名字叫都市智先锋，首先定位为都市，在城市精英层面。所以我们这款车目前跟我们的名字，还有我们对产品的阐释，跟客户的沟通和理解上基本上相匹配。对都市智先锋这个理解还是基本上客户接受了这款车型。
王伟：东风悦达起亚推出车型速度在逐步地加快，像福瑞迪，还有智跑等等非常快。2011年咱们东风悦达起亚还会有一些新的市场运作吗？
嘉宾：应该说东风悦达起亚产品是一个企业竞争的根本所在，所以从三年以前我们就开始做这个产品系列的研究。一个是在根据中国的细分市场，SUV、B级车、C级车各个领域里面，从市场布局上进行诠释，寻找哪里的市场有增长，我们就进入这个领域。福瑞迪、智跑，还有K5都互相牵连的全新的提升，在这次K5上得到了非常明显的特征。以后在我们所有的LOGO里面都会体现直线的，还有简易直线美学。从那时候起我们每年承诺向社会提供两款新车，基本上以这样速度，这两年我们每年两款，非常快。在明年我们也是两款，一个是K5明年3月份上市，在6月份我们还会生产一款现在代号叫QB的车型，相当于经济型轿车。
王伟：咱们东风悦达起亚我知道有一个设计，您能介绍一下吗？
嘉宾：这是我们对品牌提升的理念。一直以来人们都觉得起亚车是一个非常便宜的非常经济的车型。当然我们在保持高性价比的同时，我们会做一个有设计感，有科技含量的一个品牌。我认为通过三年的努力，人们现在想到的起亚是一个有设计感的起亚，这不仅仅是产品设计，一些营销活动，一切的活动都是有设计的，是我们用思想来做的一些品牌形象的塑造，和我们整个各方面工作的追求。所以是我们对品牌提升整体的诠释。
王伟：今天因为时间的关系，我们tom汽车与蒋本的这次关于东风悦达起亚车型的市场，以及未来的一些新的车型只能暂时聊到这里。希望我们tom的网友继续关注tom汽车，继续关注我们的东风悦达起亚。
嘉宾：谢谢。

description.hltext_display: Arthur and the Two Worlds War (Arthur et la guerre des deux mondes)
description.content:
When Arthur receives a distress call sent from the Minimoys, the invisible people who live in his back garden, he rushes to their aid, ready to fight the evil Emperor Maltazard and save Princess Selenia. But, what he doesn't know is that the plea for help is all part of Maltazard's evil plan to trick Arthur into entering the Minimoys' world, reversing the magic that makes him bigger. Now it's Arthur that stands at just half an inch tall and Maltazard who is larger than life and running riot in Arthur's world. At his new diminutive proportions, has Arthur got what it takes to defeat the evil Emperor?
Cast:Freddie Highmore, Selena Gomez, Stacy Ferguson, Jimmy Fallon, Mia Farrow, Snoop Dogg, Will i Am, Iggy Pop, Robert Stanton, Lou Reed
Director:Luc Besson
Producer:Luc Besson, Emmanuel Prévost
Writer:Luc Besson, Céline Garcia
Duration:107
Official Site:http://www.arthuretlesminimoys.com/arthur3/
Release: Fri 24 Dec 10

description.hltext_display: Usain bolts
description.content:
IT takes a lot to scare Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt.
But the Olympic world record holder and gold medal winner over 100 and 200 metres, admitted to being more than a little rattled when he got behind the wheel of a Ferrari this week.
Bolt paid a VIP visit to Ferrari’s headquarters where he was able to test-drive the Ferrari 458 Italia and 599 GTB Fiorano on Ferrari’s private test track, Fiorano.
The sprinter started as an excited passenger next to the Ferrari test-drivers Dario Benuzzi and Raffaele De Simone, while later on he completed some laps himself behind the wheel.
At the end of the day he couldn’t hide his love for the 458 Italia.
“It’s a little bit like me, very reactive and determined,” Bolt said.
Bolt joked later that his heart was racing when test-driver Dario Benuzzi showed him how to control the car on a wet track.
“I was really scared, but it was a good scare. I’m excited like a child,” he said.

description.hltext_display: 周立波调侃郭德纲缺席：他忙着道歉呢
description.content:
内容提要：12月20日晚，周立波与胡洁的婚礼在上海浦东香格里拉酒店隆重举行，杨澜夫妇，陈凯歌夫妇、张朝阳、成龙、崔永元、钱文忠、刘嘉玲、鲁豫、黄晓明、任贤齐、伊能静、杨坤、陈辰等众多明星都受邀出席了婚礼。
周立波大婚不忘调侃郭德纲缺席：他忙着道歉呢
周立波与胡洁
12月20日晚，周立波与胡洁的婚礼在上海浦东香格里拉酒店隆重举行，杨澜夫妇，陈凯歌夫妇、张朝阳、成龙、崔永元、钱文忠、刘嘉玲、鲁豫、黄晓明、任贤齐、伊能静、杨坤、陈辰等众多明星都受邀出席了婚礼。
从上海的周立波胡洁到香港的杨千嬅丁子高，再到台北的黄国伦寇乃馨——昨日，三对娱乐圈情侣同日完婚，尽管有的主张慈善，表示婚礼红包全捐；有的主打环保，声明婚宴不点鱼翅；有的强调浪漫，弄来马车接亲……但他们的共同点都是：结了，就要让你们知道！导致网友在微博上直呼：明星们，你们还是隐婚吧，别这么大张旗鼓折腾了！
周立波＆胡洁
最大方：礼金全捐

description.hltext_display: TOM专访海马汽车销售部部长李伟胜
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：TOM 汽车
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-21 16:18
王伟：各位tom的网友大家好，这里是2010年广州国际车展。我们现在是在tom的直播间，今天我们有请到的是海马汽车销售部部长李伟胜先生。今年海马汽车参加车展我们参展的阵容，以及亮点车型是怎么样情况？
嘉宾：这次把我们目前在产的7个系列11个产品都带到了这次广州车展。在现场大家其实也能关注到我们目前几个特点，比如一进去可以看到我们很亮的一个赛车，就是我们明年要参加场地锦标赛福美来的赛车，大家都知道海马从05年开始参加了全国的场地锦标赛，早期由我们老的福美来的一代参赛，然后到了我们的欢动参赛。明年开始我们准备由福美来三代参赛。我们在欢动车对09、2010年连续两年获得了车队的季军，车手也多次拿到了冠军，所以非常好的业绩。应该说目前是唯一一个自主品牌在赛场上和合资品牌的产品一较高下的目前只有海马汽车。这是可以看的一个亮点。
第二个大家也可以看到我们从西安到罗马的一个地图，一个非常壮观的地图。这是我们刚刚完成的重走丝绸之路的活动，海马汽车非常荣幸地有机会成为丝路升级车辆的唯一赞助商和提供商，海马骑士承担了这次活动，作为交通工具，8月8号从西安出发，经过两个月15000多公里的跋涉到达意大利的罗马。我们也非常荣幸有机会为这样一个应该说传统文化的探索和大国复兴的活动，做出自己的一些努力。同时我们还带来了两个新能源车型，我们的普力马和丘比特的纯电动车型，今年也带到了现场。
王伟：看来我们的阵容真的不小。海马骑士这款车我之前试驾过，无论从外观还有内室，以及发动机的调教都非常不错。但是从目前国内的SUV市场来讲，咱们海马这边有没有考虑到会匹配一些自动挡的？
嘉宾：我们在明年最晚到3季度自动挡车型会出来，应该说会弥补我们只有手动挡，做一个更大的完善。我们在明年上海车展，骑士也会推出运动版的骑士。
王伟：比如说是在包围上，还是带轮毂上？
嘉宾：外形很多的配置上做了很大的改善。
王伟：目前海马骑士这款车我看在路上陆陆续续地能见到一些。今年销量怎么样？
嘉宾：骑士上市大概半年时间，应该说我们实际在终端交车目前应该是在2万多台，平均一个月3000台车。在没有自动挡车型，全手动挡的情况下目前这个量我们自己还是认为是非常满意。起到了作为海马汽车目前最高端的产品，在和合资品牌的拼杀之中能够获得这样的业绩，目前来讲我们对它还是非常满意的。
王伟：那么我们普力马、海马丘比特这款电动车，目前是还处在一种展示的状况，还是说已经在计划量产的阶段？
嘉宾：目前我们两个电动车的状态，像普力马是属于量产状态，应该是已经在投产了，在杭州投产，春节之前还要投将近两百台车。丘比特目前属于推进之中，可能很快也会量产，首先投放的城市会是郑州。
王伟：为什么会选择在郑州呢？
嘉宾：目前国家有一些新能源的示范城市，海马汽车我们选择了三个城市合作，一个是海口，一个是郑州，一个是杭州。选择海口和郑州，这两个都是海马的基地。杭州目前在新能源示范这块推进的最快的城市，海马也有机会和地方政府和相关的部委有一个密切的合作，我们也非常荣幸有这个机会。
王伟：关于新能源已经涉及到量产了。我想在全国三个示范的城市当中，配套的问题，比如说周边的充电站怎么解决的？
嘉宾：这块有一个统筹，更多的是政府在统筹。我们作为企业来讲，这方面做一些相应的配合。
王伟：咱们整个海马汽车来讲，截止到11月份整个2010年咱们的销量怎么样？
嘉宾：2010年海马汽车我们的销量在去年的基础上大概增长40%左右。相比起行业来讲，我们略微高于行业，行业可能30%几。我们仍然认为我们是自主企业，我们还面临很多困难。所以相比起自主企业来讲，我们这个增长率肯定在2010年非常优秀了，也体现出我们这么多年以来，我们多次跟媒体交流，到现在为止我们仍然认为不是全面释放的时候，还是在不断积累的过程，包括2010年还是我们在沉淀的过程，从产品上沉淀，从品牌上沉淀，从管理上沉淀，然后从终端从市场开拓方面我们还要做很多的沉淀。
王伟：那么2011年咱们这边会有一些新车跟消费者见面吗？
嘉宾：今年我们在完成了四个产品全新换代的基础上，从普力马、丘比特到骑士和福美来。2011年将是继续强化我们这几个产品的一年，重点比如在骑士我们会推出自动挡，会推出运动版。像福美来三代我们会推出两厢车型。像普利马我们推出2011款的车型。在这个基础上继续强化，从车型上。另一个角度，我们还是会不遗余力地在品牌建设上，更多地加大力度。比如说重走丝绸之路活动之后，我们启动了发现中国之美的活动。我们希望把丝路这种模式更多地带到，我们祖国大好河山，各地都有非常多的东西，包括我们有非常多的传统文化的东西，我们把这种发现丝路的东西去发现我们生活中美好的东西。同时也体现出我们作为自主品牌，更多地去融入到我们中国的传统文化里面去，为中国的传统文化多做自己的一些努力和贡献。所以我们启动了发现中国之美的活动，目前在江苏和河北推进，这个活动一直会持续到明年全年。我们争取在全国的二十几个城市前部以这种形式全部走一遍。
王伟：真的是很大型的一个活动。国家有可能在2011年的时候就把小排量汽车的优惠政策收回。对于像咱们的海马汽车这样的企业来讲，对于销量上还有一些车型后续的推进来讲，会有影响吗？
嘉宾：我们也关注到国家的产业政策变化，我们也非常清楚，包括今年30%几的行业增长，我们认为这个增长应该说是偏高的增长率。我们认为一个行业的增长，还是回归到20%左右的增长，比较理性。相关的部委也是朝着这个方向努力。当然这个肯定会对我们有影响，尤其是对小排量的影响比较大一些。我们目前海马汽车的销量里面有50%左右是1.6排量以下的，当然我们另外还有像骑士、普力马车型是在这之上。这个我们会有相应的策略应对，当然肯定会有影响。一方面我们觉得这应该是行业成熟的必经的过程。从营销上我们也会做一些变化，我们尽量地让客户感受到我们产品的价值，和我们在成交过程中我们的诚意，这是我们在推进的。比如福美来三代，在12月份的时候我们就承诺，国家提2.5税，我们也提2.5的税，国家出25%，我们出25%，客户只需要自己再承担50%。这种政策我相信在未来，至少海马汽车25%我们是会继续坚持，即使国家回收政策，还能使客户享受到这种优惠的政策。
王伟：今天因为时间的关系，我跟李部长关于海马汽车了解了很多关于他们的政策，关于他们的市场，还有他们新的车。因为时间的关系，我们今天的访谈只能到此为止。希望tom的网友继续关注tom汽车，继续关注海马汽车。谢谢李部长。
嘉宾：谢谢。

description.hltext_display: Riverside search for missing man
description.content: A major search is under way in Newcastle for a man who went missing in freezing conditions after a night out with friends. Police are combing Newcastle's Quayside for Duncan Gibbon, 21, from Northallerton, North Yorkshire.He was celebrating a friend's 21st birthday in the city and was last seen leaving Fever Bar at around midnight on Saturday.Mr Gibbon was with friends who left the bar in two groups and each thought he was with the other, so he was not reported missing until Sunday.He is white, of slim to average build and 5ft 10ins, with short straight brown hair, clean-shaven, with a clear complexion and blue eyes. He was wearing dark blue denim jeans and a dark blue/grey waist-length hooded jacket. On Tuesday mountain rescue searchers joined specialist police officers in a detailed examination of undergrowth on steep banks between the Castle Keep and the Tyne.Temporary Superintendent Geoff Logan said: "Mr Gibbon has not gone missing before and so this is very out of character. "We are concerned for his welfare due to the length of time he has been missing and the cold weather conditions. "It's imperative that anyone who saw him on Saturday night or has seen him since contacts us as soon as possible so we can piece together his movements and try to find him as soon as possible." Mr Gibbon had an iPhone with him when he disappeared and officers urged him to ring them if he was able to do so.Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

location.province: Metropolitan Borough of Newcastle upon Tyne

event_or_fact.property: Mr Gibbon has not gone missing before and so this is very out of character.
It's imperative that anyone who saw him on Saturday night or has seen him since contacts us as soon as possible so we can piece together his movements and try to find him as soon as possible.

description.hltext_display: Sociedad no puede vivir sin internet de alta velocidad: sondeo
description.content:
NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - La internet de alta velocidad ha tenido el mayor impacto tecnológico en la sociedad durante la última década y es la tecnología sin la cual más personas dicen que no podrían vivir, de acuerdo a un nuevo sondeo.
Un 24 por ciento de 1.950 adultos estadounidenses consultados en el sondeo en línea conducido por Zogby International dijeron que la internet de alta velocidad tuvo el mayor impacto en sus vidas, seguida de cerca por Facebook en un 22 por ciento y Google con un 10 por ciento.
Sobre las tecnologías sin las cuales la gente dice que no puede vivir, la internet de alta velocidad fue primera con un 28 por ciento y el correo electrónico quedó segundo con un 18 por ciento.
Al ser consultados sobre cuál creían que sería el avance tecnológico mayor en el próximo año, un 24 por ciento dijo que estaría en el entretenimiento para el hogar y un 16 por ciento dijo que sería en computación en general.
Pensando en la próxima década, un 43 por ciento de los encuestados pronosticó que habría un uso regular de células madre y técnicas de clonación para crear órganos humanos para trasplantes.
Un 40 por ciento dijo que chips de computadores serían implantados en personas para monitorear su salud, y el mismo número dijo que los robots serían capaces de efectuar trabajos manuales.
(Reporte de Daniel Trotta; editado en español por Patricia Avila)

description.hltext_display: Statement by Gov. Rick Perry on Texas’ Four New Congressional Seats
description.content:
• Austin, Texas • Proclamation
Wednesday, May 19, 2010 • Austin, Texas • Press Release
Monday, April 05, 2010 • Austin, Texas • Press Release
Friday, February 12, 2010 • Appointment
"Texas' gain of four new Congressional seats as a result of our state's booming population is further evidence that Texas remains the best place in the nation to start a business, find a job and raise a family. As our state continues to grow at a rapid rate, we will remain steadfast in our effort to uphold the low taxes, restrained spending, reasonable regulations and fair legal climate that has given Texans the freedom to succeed. I look forward to working with the Legislature in the process of drawing these new seats into our state's district map and ensuring that Texas remains a leader in job creation and a land of opportunity for those willing to come here and risk their capital."

description.hltext_display: Деятельность МТС в Туркмении временно приостановлена
description.content:
Компания «Мобильные ТелеСистемы» (МТС) сообщила о приостановлении работы своей сотовой сети в Туркмении. Лицензией на работу в республике владеет «дочка» МТС – американская Barash Communications Technoligies (BCTI), срок действия кончается 1 февраля 2012 г. Однако 15 декабря министерство связи Туркмении проинформировало компанию о приостановлении действия лицензии на один месяц, начиная со вторника 21 декабря. В понедельник BCTI предупредила абонентов о возможной приостановке оказания услуг.
Оператор пообещал, что за время простоя сети абонентская плата взиматься не будет. Клиенты вправе расторгнуть договор и забрать остатки со своих лицевых счетов, в случае же сохранения номера после возобновления работы сети они получат компенсацию в размере 20% от суммы на счету. По данным «Интерфакса», у офисов единственного конкурента BCTI - оператора «Алтын Асыр» - собрались большие очереди желающих срочно купить SIM-карты. МТС является абсолютным лидером рынка, обслуживая 85% сотовых абонентов республики (2,4 млн на конец III квартала).

description.hltext_display: Zhang says Bale to start in Nanjing film
description.author: MIN LEE/None
description.content:
Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.
Zhang says shooting is to start Jan. 10. He says he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries.
Historians say the massacre, known in the West as the "Rape of Nanking," resulted in the slaughter of at least 150,000 civilians. China puts the number killed at 300,000, making it one of the worst atrocities of the World War II era.

description.hltext_display: 范冰冰《建党》演皇太后与周润发搭戏
description.content:
内容提要：原本打算在《建党伟业》中扮演“小凤仙”一角的范冰冰，因档期原因错过了与刘德华再度扮演情侣的机会，但却因此促成与周润发的合作。
范冰冰《建党》演隆裕皇太后 披黄袍与周润发搭戏
原本打算在《建党伟业》中扮演“小凤仙”一角的范冰冰，因档期原因错过了与刘德华再度扮演情侣的机会，但却因此促成与周润发的合作。
近日，范冰冰低调赶赴横店，为《建党伟业》客串“最后一个从大清门入宫的皇后”——隆裕太后。这个角色与周润发、赵本山有不少对手戏。在昨日首度曝光的造型照中，范冰冰身着黄袍，正襟危坐。这也是继今年5月让她风光无限的戛纳龙袍秀之后，她的又一黄袍造型，气场强大。
电影《建党伟业》的剧情围绕1921年前后展开，之前曾有消息称范冰冰将饰演“小凤仙”，与刘德华扮演的“蔡锷”上演一段生死诀别，但最终因为档期难调该角色由an-gelababy扮演。对此范冰冰也颇感遗憾，最后经过反复协调，范冰冰又得到了一个机会，扮演一位更加重要的女性人物隆裕太后。据悉，这个角色是慈禧太后的内侄女，也是历史上最后一个皇太后。也正是她标志了清王朝的灭亡，以及2000多年封建帝制的结束。造型照曝光的场景，正是隆裕太后与饰演袁世凯的周润发、赵本山、冯巩等人的重头戏。而发哥更要当众向范冰冰扮演的隆裕太后下跪。（记者刘嫣）

description.hltext_display: Microsoft dice que vende 1,5 mln de Phone 7 en seis semanas
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Más de 1,5 millones de teléfonos celulares que tienen el software operativo Windows Phone 7 de Microsoft Corp se han vendido en las primeras seis semanas desde su lanzamiento, lo que cumple con lo que la compañía calificó como expectativas "realistas".
Windows Phone 7, que se presentó en octubre, podría ser la última oportunidad de Microsoft de establecer una mayor presencia en un mercado dinámico ahora dominado por Apple Inc y Google Inc, dicen los analistas.
Las cifras de ventas fueron dadas a conocer por primera vez por Achim Berg, vicepresidente de negocios y marketing para los teléfonos Windows, en una entrevista que se publicó en el sitio en internet de Microsoft.
"Es una cifra decente. El mercado de móviles va a ser una batalla para Microsoft", dijo Colin Gillis, un analista de BGC Partners que tiene una recomendación de "comprar" para Microsoft.
Pero advirtió que el despacho de 1,5 millones de teléfonos corresponde a ventas dentro de los canales de distribución, en lugar de directamente a consumidores, lo que empañó el anuncio.
HTC de Taiwán, Dell Inc, Samsung Electronics y LG Electronics se encuentran entre los fabricantes que han lanzado o planean comenzar a vender los dispositivos con Phone 7.
La industria está observando de cerca los primeros días de lo que podría ser un impulso al crecimiento de más largo plazo. Gillis pronosticó ventas de aproximadamente 25 millones de Phone 7 en el 2011, mientras que los analistas esperan que Apple venda más de 60 millones de iPhone el próximo año.
"Todos sabemos que la competencia es extrema en esta industria y debemos competir en múltiples frentes", dijo Berg en la entrevista.
"Estamos en una senda para comenzar a sacar las primeras de varias actualizaciones durante los próximos meses, y varios operadores móviles alrededor del mundo introducirán Windows Phone 7 en su red en 2011", añadió. Continuación...

Microsoft dice que planea nuevo Windows para tablet PC

description.hltext_display: Caroline Glick - A Time To Shout
description.content:
The new campaign calling for the release of Israeli agent Jonathan Pollard
from prison in the US is in many ways a curious development. Pollard was
arrested in 1985 and convicted on one count of transferring classified
information to Israel during his service in US Naval Intelligence. He
pleaded guilty to the charge in the framework of a plea bargain in which the
US attorney pledged not to request a life sentence.
Despite this, Pollard was sentenced to life. So far, he has served 25 years,
much of it in solitary confinement and in maximum security prisons. His
health is poor. He has repeatedly expressed remorse for his crime.
Pollard's sentence and the treatment he has received are grossly
disproportionate to the sentences and treatment meted out to agents of other
friendly foreign governments caught stealing classified information in the
US. Their average sentence is seven years in prison. They tend to serve
their sentences in minimum or medium security prisons and are routinely
released after four years.
The only offenders who have received similar sentences are Soviet spies
Robert Hanssen and Aldrich Ames. While Pollard transferred documents to
Israel over a period of 18 months, both Ames and Hanssen served the
Soviets - the US's primary enemy - for decades. Their espionage led to the
death of multiple US agents operating behind the Iron Curtain.
Pollard was given a life sentence because then secretary of defense Caspar
Weinberger wrote a classified victim impact assessment to the sentencing
judge in which he insinuated that he had transferred information to the
Soviet Union as well as to Israel. Weinberger reportedly attributed the
deaths of US agents to Pollard's activities.
Weinberger's accusations were proven false with the subsequent arrests of
Hanssen and Ames. As it turned out, the damage Weinberger ascribed to
Pollard was actually caused by their espionage.
OVER THE past five years, and with increased urgency over the past several
months, several former senior US officials who had in depth knowledge of
Pollard's activities have called for his immediate release. Former CIA
director R. James Woolsey has stated that, contrary to Weinberger's
allegations, none of the documents Pollard stole were transferred to the
Soviets or any other country. A few months ago, former senator Dennis
DeConcini, a past chairman of the Senate Select Intelligence Committee, sent
a letter to President Barack Obama asking him to immediately release Pollard
from prison. And in October, Lawrence Korb, who served as assistant
secretary of defense under Weinberger, became one of the most outspoken
champions for Pollard's release. Korb currently works for the Center for
American Progress, which is closely allied with the Obama White House.
The renewed interest in Pollard's plight has garnered a great deal of
attention in the local media as well. After Korb's initial call for
Pollard's release in an op-ed published in The Los Angeles Times in October,
Ma'ariv published a cover story in its weekend news supplement about
Pollard's suffering. Reporter Ben Caspit demanded that Prime Minister
Binyamin Netanyahu formally request that Obama commute Pollard's sentence
and release him from prison.
Ma'ariv's article caused a spike in media coverage of Pollard in November.
And this month, Pollard was back in the news when the government intervened
to help his former wife Ann and her father make aliya after the consulate in
New York discovered they were both ill and living in poverty.
Public pressure on Netanyahu seems to be working. Before Monday, Netanyahu
refused to make any public statements regarding Pollard. At his recent
meeting with Obama, he refused to deliver a letter signed by 109 of the
Knesset's 120 members formally requesting Pollard's release. On the other
hand, heavy public pressure caused Netanyahu to initially agree to speak at
Monday's rally for Pollard's release at the Knesset. Netanyahu canceled his
appearance at the last moment however, and insisted on sufficing with a
private meeting with Korb and Pollard's wife Esther. Obviously more pressure
can and should be applied.*
On the face of things, it seems that this is a particularly inauspicious
time to renew the campaign to release Pollard. This is true first of all
because of the nature of the current president who is the only one with the
power to release him.
By now there is little question that Obama is the most hostile US leader
Israel has faced. It is hard to imagine the circumstances in which he would
agree to do something for Israel that his vastly more sympathetic
predecessors George W. Bush and Bill Clinton refused to do.
In light of Obama's attitude, at first blush it makes more sense to try to
advance Pollard's case through quiet diplomacy. This is the argument that
cabinet secretary Zvi Hauser made in testimony before the Knesset earlier
this month. Hauser appeared before the State Control Committee to respond to
State Comptroller Micha Lindenstrauss' recommendation that Netanyahu set up
a ministerial committee to oversee a public, formal campaign calling for
Pollard's release.
But on second thought, the current campaign is eminently sensible. To
understand why, we must consider the relative benefits of quiet, behind the
scenes diplomacy and loud, public diplomacy.
Quiet diplomacy works well when all sides share a perception of joint
interests and when its exposure is likely to change that perception. For
instance, Israel and its Arab neighbors perceive a shared interest in
blocking Iran from acquiring nuclear weapons. But given the nature of Arab
politics, that perception, which enables the likes of Saudi Arabia, Egypt
and Bahrain to work with Israel on preventing Iran from developing nuclear
weapons, disappears the moment cooperation is made public.
Likewise, Lebanon's Sunnis and Christians share an interest with Israel in
defeating Hizbullah. But their ability to work with Israel on defeating
Hizbullah is destroyed the moment such work becomes public.
Quiet diplomacy does not work when there is no perception of shared
interests. For instance, regimes that repress human rights to maintain their
grip on power have little interest in cooperating with free societies, when
the latter demand that they free political dissidents from prison. Quiet
diplomacy in the field of human rights between the US and the Soviet Union
during the Cold War never succeeded, because the Soviets realized that
opening up their tyranny to domestic criticism would destroy the system.
And today, as Cairo's fake parliamentary elections and Teheran's continued
repression of democracy protesters shows, the Obama administration's quiet
diplomacy with the Muslim world regarding human rights and democracy has
utterly failed.
It is in cases like this where public, noisy diplomacy comes in handy.
Public campaigns are helpful when one government wishes to persuade another
to do something it doesn't want to do. Last week we received a reminder of
the effectiveness of such behavior with the publication of protocols of
meetings held by president Richard Nixon in the Oval Office.
One such meeting involved a conversation between Nixon and secretary of
state Henry Kissinger following a meeting with prime minister Golda Meir.
She had asked Nixon to support the Jackson-Vanek amendment that linked US
economic assistance to the USSR to the latter's willingness to permit Jews
to emigrate. Kissinger opposed the request, telling Nixon, "The emigration
of Jews from the Soviet Union is not an objective of American foreign
policy. And if they put Jews into gas chambers in the Soviet Union, it is
not an American concern. Maybe a humanitarian concern."
On the face of it, Kissinger was right. Using humanitarian considerations to
weaken Soviet tyranny probably didn't help US arms control negotiators score
points with Leonid Brezhnev. But on a deeper lever, he was completely wrong.
The Jackson-Vanek amendment not only forced the Soviets to permit limited
emigration of Jews. It started a process of opening the Soviet system, which
ended up destroying the regime just a decade later.
SINCE TAKING office, Obama has only used public diplomacy in the Middle East
to convince one government to take action it believed was antithetical to
its interests. Last year he waged a forceful, unrelenting public diplomacy
campaign to convince Netanyahu to abrogate Jewish property rights in Judea
and Samaria. And it worked.
Although it harmed the sacrosanct pillar of Zionism that Jewish rights are
nonnegotiable, although it weakened Netanyahu's standing with his party and
voters and although it empowered the Palestinians to expand their political
war against Israel on the international stage, Netanyahu gave in. The public
pressure Obama exerted on him compelled him to act against his interests.
The US is not an evil empire. And it is hard to see how a clear demand for
Pollard's release on humanitarian grounds will have any fundamental impact
on its nature.
And that is fine. But the fact is that Obama has no interest in freeing a
suffering Israeli agent who was railroaded by Weinberger and remains in
prison due to the efforts of Israelhaters who wrongly insist he did untold
damage to US national security. Indeed, many of Pollard's detractors are
members of Obama's political camp.
Israel can't expect a lot of help on this from American Jews, although they
stand to be major secondary beneficiaries if Pollard is released. The impact
of his case on the US Jewish community has been debilitating. Although the
US and Israel are strategic allies which share many of the same interests
and fight the same enemies, Israel's detractors in the US foreign policy
community use the Pollard case as an excuse for questioning the loyalty and
patriotism of American Jews who serve in the US government and support
Israel. His continued incarceration casts a long shadow over American Jewry.
The odds are poor that a public campaign to win Pollard's release will
succeed. But if Israel is going to do anything at all, its actions should be
concentrated in the public realm. As we have seen, quiet diplomacy, the
strategy the Netanyahu government tried until now, will never get him out of
jail.
And Israel must act. Pollard's unfair, unjustified and discriminatory
sentence and treatment are a dismal symbol of Jewish vulnerability. His
personal suffering is inhumane, real and unrelenting. He needs us to stand
up for him.
And so we must. And so we will. The time has come, against all odds to shout
that Pollard must be freed. Now.
==
NB: Tuesday afternoon 21 December, Netanyahu announced he will formally
request that Obama release Pollard
--
JUSTICE FOR JONATHAN POLLARD

description.hltext_display: МЭР: внешнеторговое сальдо РФ выросло до $135,8 млрд
得利卡电动车 东南全阵容闪耀广州车展
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：TOM 汽车
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-21 22:35
得利卡
为汽车领域晴雨表的广州国际车展，以灵敏的行业嗅角与视角，凭借国际化的广大平台，展开以“创新科技•共创未来”为主题的行业盛世，让更多的新能源与创新科技车型得以与消费者见面，东南汽车以永不退缩的进取精神，将以“超越激情”为主题，携东南、三菱品牌多款战略车型亮相，包括由陈宝国代言、即将登陆全国的微客——东南希旺、国内首款轻客电动车——东南得利卡以及新V3菱悦主要车系，三菱品牌新君阁、翼神致尚版限量款、戈蓝2011款、蓝瑟等车型。据了解，本次东南汽车展台总面积近800平方米，整体将在“产品、环保、科技、安全”四个方面进行不同角度的全面展示。

description.hltext_display: Oscar 2011
description.content:
Klar til OscarDet amerikanske filmakademi er nu igennem kandidaterne til næste års Oscar-nomineringer og kan oplyse, at 248 spillefilm kan deltage i dysten om den mest eftertragtede statuette af dem alle - som bedste film.
For at komme i betragtning skal en produktion have en spilletid på over 40 minutter. Den skal desuden have haft premiere i en kommerciel biograf i Los Angeles amt senest ved midnat den 31. december og være på plakaten mindst syv dage i træk.
Hvilke fem af de 248, der slipper gennem nåleøjet, afsløres, når Oscar­nomineringerne offentliggøres i Hollywood den 25. januar.
Spændingen udløses godt en måned senere, den 27. februar.
Titlen som bedste film fra 2009 gik i marts til Kathryn Bigelows krigsdrama "The Hurt Locker", der også indbragte Bigelow statuetten for bedste instruktion.

description.hltext_display: 崔永元炮轰央视索福瑞 事后反悔改口
description.content:
昨天坐到SMG电视新闻中心嘉宾讲坛的主讲席，看到“今天，我们还能怎样做电视”的主题，崔永元先自嘲了一下，“今天已经没有办法再做电视了，而且实际上我现在连一个栏目也没有了，只能靠给大家做讲座为生了”，紧接着，这位抛出“收视率是万恶之源”的电视人，质疑起央视索福瑞的收视率数据。
央视索福瑞目前在中国的收视率市场上一家独大，几乎所有节目的收视数据都来源于此。崔永元表示，“收视率按照国际惯例是由独立的第三方来提供的，所以央视就不能办收视率公司，因为这没法保证公平。此外从统计学角度来讲，怎样才能得到一个准确的数据？误差超过正负5%就只能做参考，但央视索福瑞提供的数据误差在正负70%，基本可以直接扔掉，而就是这样的收视率影响着电视人的制作”。说到这里，崔永元还以日本为参照，“日本这么小的土地，它的数据样板要1.25万个才能达到科学分布，央视索福瑞的样本号称6000个，但我们起码要有12.5万个才够。所以，不用被收视率束缚手脚，因为这个不真实。”
做了8年“口述历史”，崔永元称自己不做主持人后脑子反而更明白了，“成功有不同的标准，比如大家都认识你，比如是圈子里最有钱的。我不排斥这两点，我也想有钱，让杨澜排第二，但现在我最认可的是，做我自己喜欢做的事，同时不窘迫，还能养活自己。”他还特别澄清自己对娱乐节目的态度，“我对娱乐节目不是特别反感，媒体老是歪曲我。我反对的是电视台只有娱乐节目——共性要包容个性，要满足市场不同需求，而且娱乐节目本身也有高低之分。我的意思是说，电视台不要都只办娱乐节目，而且要办好的娱乐节目”。
讲座结束后，崔永元还特地为自己的“口无遮拦”说明，“如果我在讲话时提到了谁，都是没有恶意的”。显然，经历了与朱军的芥蒂后，崔永元如今变得越来越小心了。（记者朱美虹）

description.hltext_display: No spl quota for Gujjars: HC
description.content:
In a setback to agitating Gujjars, the Rajasthan High Court on Wednesday held that members of the community could not be given special reservation in government jobs.
A division bench of Chief Justice Arun Mishra and Justice Mahesh Bhagwati held that Gujjars cannot be given special reservation and an act of 2008 has no substratum of quantifiable data that could justify the reservation.
The move to provide reservation by government could not, therefore, be acted upon, the judges said.
The court also directed the state government to carry out an exercise within a year to establish the backwardness of Gujjars, Raikas, Raibari and Gadiya Lohar communities in the fields of education and government employment.
Gujjars have been agitating for the last two days in support of their demands, including quota in jobs. The Ashok Gehlot government has said it was ready for talks to end the impasse.
The High Court had earlier stayed the quota as it was exceeding the 50 per cent limit.
Threatening to intensify their stir, Gujjar leader Kirori Singh Bainsla had said on Tuesday, "We are not ready to give up till our demands are met."
Rail and road traffic was disrupted in Rajasthan's Bharatpur district due to the Gujjar stir.
Reacting to the High Court's order, Bainsla asked community members across Rajasthan to intensify their agitation in support of their demand.
"The government has cheated us by not presenting our side very effectively in the High Court. It is injustice with us and now I have asked all my people not only in Rajasthan but outside the state also to launch the agitation," Bainsla told PTI from the sit-in site.
"All the rail tracks and highways will be blocked all over the state soon and we are also asking Gujjars in Delhi to stop milk supply in support of our demands," he said.
"Why only Gujjjars, stay quota of ST/SC and OBC if the biased government does not want to give reservation. Though we respect the High Court, but we will not suffer anymore," he said.
A close aide of Bainsla, Dr Roop Singh said, "The strategy to intensify agitation will be announced two hours later after discussing the matter with the community people."
Meanwhile, rail and road traffic remained affected as the agitators continued to squat on rail tracks near Pilukapur in Bharatpur district where security forces had been deployed in strength.
Gujjars have been agitating for the last two days in support of their demands, including quota in jobs. The Ashok Gehlot government has said it was ready for talks to end the impasse.
The Rajasthan High Court on Wednesday held that Gujjars cannot be given special reservation and an act of 2008 has no substratum of quantifiable data that could justify the reservation.

event_or_fact.property: The strategy to intensify agitation will be announced two hours later after discussing the matter with the community people.

The government has cheated us by not presenting our side very effectively in the High Court.; It is injustice with us and now I have asked all my people not only in Rajasthan but outside the state also to launch the agitation

description.hltext_display: Dubai World arm cuts stake in Australia for $1.5B
description.author: ADAM SCHRECK/None
description.content:
DP World, the port management arm of indebted state conglomerate Dubai World, sold the bulk of its Australian businesses to a Citi investment fund Wednesday for $1.5 billion.
Unloading the stake will help the sea cargo handler pay down debt and retain a foothold in Australia while it focuses on emerging markets that have fueled much of its growth.
Under the terms of the deal, DP World will keep a 25 percent stake and continue to manage the ports in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide and Fremantle.
It is selling the remaining 75 percent in the Australian operations to Citi Infrastructure Investors, a private equity division of the New York-based bank.
DP World CEO Mohammed Sharaf told reporters it was not part of a broader effort to dismantle the company's globe-stretching operations.
"We're not in a selling spree out there. We're talking about bringing in strategic partners," he said. "They approached us."
DP World is one of Dubai's more profitable state-linked companies. It ranks as the world's fourth largest port operator, with business at 50 cargo terminals on six continents, including the Mideast's largest in Dubai.
It pulled in $219.2 million in profit in the first half of this year.
The company is part of the city-state's struggling Dubai World conglomerate, but was exempted from its parent's $24.9 billion debt restructuring effort.
DP World said it expects to retain its existing management and staff in Australia. It employs about 2,100 people throughout the country, according to a corporate website.
The $1.5 billion it expects to generate includes the repayment of debts held by the Australian division.
DP World has had a presence in Australia since 2005, when it took over operations in Adelaide following the acquisition of U.S. railroad operator CSX Corp.'s international port business.
It gained operational control of the other four ports through its buyout of Britain's Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Co. the following year.
The agreements that give DP World the right to manage the five ports run for an average of more than two decades, following recent deals to renew its concessions at Adelaide, Brisbane and Sydney, according to the company.
Yuvraj Narayan, DP World's chief financial officer, said all proceeds from the Citi sale will go toward paying down the company's debt.
Executives expect the deal to close toward the end of the first quarter next year.

event_or_fact.property: We're talking about bringing in strategic partners; They approached us.
all proceeds from the Citi sale will go toward paying down the company's debt

description.hltext_display: Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
TOKIO - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren. (ANP)

Ossen Innovation Prices IPO Of 5 Mln ADSs At $4.50/ADS - Quick Facts
description.content:
EST
(RTTNews) - Ossen Innovation Co., Ltd. (OSN), a China-based manufacturer of rare earth metals coated steel materials, announced the pricing of its initial public offering of 5 million American Depositary Shares, or ADSs, each representing one ordinary share, at a price of $4.50 per ADS.
The company has granted the underwriters an option to purchase up to an additional 750 thousand ADSs to cover over???allotments, if any. Ossen's ADSs are expected to begin trading on December 21, 2010 on the Nasdaq Global Market under the symbol "OSN."
The company would use the net proceeds of approximately $19.6 million for construction costs associated with the extension of the company's current facility for the purchase and installation of eight new production lines for coated prestressed materials.

description.hltext_display: 刘欢病愈登台献唱精神饱满与董卿共舞
Microsoft dice que planea nuevo Windows para tablet PC
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp trabaja en una versión de su sistema operativo Windows para aparatos como tablet PCs, según reportes de prensa el martes, y la firma dijo que su software Windows Phone 7 está logrando avances en el creciente mercado de teléfonos inteligentes.
Microsoft planea revelar una versión de su software operativo que corre por primera vez en procesadores diseñados por la firma británica ARM Holdings PLC, informaron el diario Wall Street Journal y Bloomberg. Los procesadores de ARM dominan el mercado de tablet PCs y aparatos portátiles.
Microsoft pretende anunciar una versión de su sistema operativo para que funcione con la arquitectura del chip ARM, que compite con los diseños "x86" preferidos por Intel, informó el Wall Street Journal citando a personas con conocimiento de los planes.
No estaba claro cuándo podría salir ese sistema operativo al mercado, pero el fabricante estadounidense de software podría recuperar terreno perdido en los tablet PCs y otros aparatos móviles que funcionan con baterías al consolidar una nueva sociedad con ARM.
Microsoft y ARM rehusaron realizar comentarios.
Microsoft dijo el martes que más de 1,5 millones de teléfonos celulares que contienen el sistema operativo Windows Phone 7 fueron vendidos en las primeras seis semanas después de su lanzamiento, cumpliendo lo que la compañía consideró como expectativas "realistas".
Windows Phone 7 podría ser la última oportunidad de Microsoft para marcar presencia en el mercado de los teléfonos celulares ahora dominado por Apple Inc y Google Inc, dicen analistas.
Las cifras de ventas fueron reveladas por primera vez por Achim Berg, vicepresidente de negocios y marketing para teléfonos Windows, en una entrevista realizada internamente y publicada en el sitio en internet de Microsoft.
"Es una cifra decente. El mercado móvil va a ser una batalla para Microsoft", dijo Colin Gillis, un analista de BGC Partners, que tiene una calificación de "comprar" en Microsoft.
(Reporte de Alex Dobuzinskis; Editado en Español por Ricardo Figueroa)

description.hltext_display: 'Noah's Ark' approved for tax incentives
J&K not in India: Azam Khan
description.content:
We don't know whether Kashmir is part of India: Azam Khan
Headlines Today Bureau | Badaun (UP)/New Delhi, December 22, 2010 | Updated 12:05 IST
Get social
Samajwadi Party's (SP) firebrand leader Azam Khan stirred a controversy by raising question on whether Kashmir Valley is a part of India.
Khan, who recently made an emotional comeback to the party, has put SP chief Mulayam Singh Yadav into an embarrassing situation after his public statement in Uttar Pradesh's Badaun district on the Kashmir issue.
Khan said there was only one Muslim Cabinet minister in the UPA government - Ghulam Nabi Azad. He insisted that Azad was from Kashmir Valley and "not India" as there was a dispute whether it was a part of India at all.
"Only one Muslim minister is there in the (Union) Cabinet and that too not from India, but from Kashmir. That Kashmir, which is still controversial and we don't know whether that is part of India or not...," Khan said.
Khan's statement was read as anti-national. The BJP immediately reacted by saying that people like Khan who had doubts over Kashmir Valley being a part of India had no business staying in the country.
The SP leader's remark could be seen as playing to the galleries that the UPA government was not fair to the minority community. But the Kashmir remark could raise a lot of heat and put the leader in a spot of bother.

event_or_fact.property: Azad was from Kashmir Valley and "not India" as there was a dispute whether it was a part of India at all.

description.hltext_display: 「チャラ尾」は補欠を極めたい…西武・平尾、磨く選球眼
Набиуллина: повышение пенсионного возраста неприемлемо
> Toys, Supplies Heading To Haiti
description.content:
BOCA RATON, Fla. -- As the one-year anniversary of January's earthquake in Haiti looms, four South Florida organizations are preparing to deliver a Christmas surprise for thousands of families who are still in need. Video Three private planes were poised for their mission Tuesday night.
"I'm actually taking two seats out and this will give us more cargo room so we can put more of the toys in the plane," said plane owner Neil Coppel, with the Haiti Housing Organization.
Coppel and philanthropist Michael Capponi said they plan to distribute toys and clothing to 4,500 people in Belvil, a town outside Port-au-Prince.
"There is such a dramatic need to help those people," Coppel said.
Volunteers haven't just collected toys. They'll also be distributing life-saving supplies.
"One of the most important things right now is their drinking water that's clean. So there's a product called the "life straw," Capponi showed Local 10's Janine Stanwood.
He demonstrated how the straw can act as a portable purification device.
"It's a purification filter so that they basically come, and they drink," Capponi said.
Organizers say almost a year after the earthquake, it's getting tough to keep getting help.
"All of this is going to make a nice Christmas for 4,000 people. Great. But there's a million and a half people who are in need. People just got to keep donating and, you know, keep doing what they're doing," Capponi said.
Coppel's plane is expected to take off from Boca Raton early Wednesday morning. Two other planes will leave from Opa-locka airport. Capponi and Coppel said they both plan to stay through the Christmas holiday.

description.hltext_display: 造型更紧凑 现代瑞纳两厢车展静态详解
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：TOM 汽车
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 09:05
北京现代瑞纳自上市以来就广受消费者关注，短期销量成绩增长的速度也超过预期。今年广州车展，一款万众瞩目的新车将在现代的展台上亮相，北京现代瑞纳两厢版。网上车市广州车展报道团队有幸在展前抢先拍到两厢版瑞纳的详细图片，让我们一起来看看这款小两厢与三厢版有哪些差别。
两厢版车型在设计上基本都会延续三厢版的大部分设计理念，两厢版瑞纳前脸部分并未作出很大的改变，仅中网的风格与三厢版有所区别。整体简洁耐看，是现代设计师在设计瑞纳时的主要精髓所在，家族式设计元素也时刻在车身各处均有体现。

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content:
NEW DELHI - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie.
Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.
''De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.
Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: Apple of Their Eye?
description.content:
Following the iPad’s cotillion ball in April, colleges were lining up to try out the Apple computing tablet before Steve Jobs had kicked off his tennis shoes. Campus technologists greeted news of the device — consistent with the tide of mobile computing but lacking an obvious “killer app” in the education world — with curiosity, enthusiasm, and some skepticism. Could the iPad unseat the laptop as students' portable computer of choice? Might it finally convince students to buy e-books? Or will it prove to be little more than the latest classroom distraction?
One semester of campus pilots has hardly resolved those questions. But early returns from a number of institutions offer some clues about the iPad’s applications, and limitations, on college campuses.
Many colleges observed what iPad’s critics had foretold: that the device is great for consuming content, but not so great for producing it. At Seton Hill University — which has used its decision to give iPads and Apple Macbook laptops to every full-time student as the basis for a major marketing effort, which now includes a microsite — technology officials used a network-access controller to distinguish iPad activity and Macbook activity on the campus wireless network. The network registered twice as much activity coming from the iPads as from the laptops.
Since network use most often implies Web surfing and e-mail reading, officials deduced that students might prefer the iPad for those activities while favoring their laptops for offline coursework. “It seemed to be more of a content consumption device compared to the Macbook,” says Phil Komarny, Seton Hill’s executive director of computer information and technology.
Students participating in an iPad pilot at George Fox University, in Oregon, also suggested that the tablet might be better as a complement to the laptop than as a replacement. At George Fox, each of the university’s 670 first-year students were given the option of taking a free Macbook or a free iPad. All but 67 took the laptop. In an end-of-semester survey, the university asked a subset of those 67 if they thought the iPad was all they needed for their college computing needs. None said it was.
“I can’t use it for writing essays and long word documents, so I would need something else for that,” wrote one student. “Word processing and file-managing require a full computer,” wrote another. Others remarked that the iPad’s touch screen was difficult to type on, and that laptop keyboards are “much more familiar.”
Matt Kirschenbaum, director of the digital cultures and creativity program at the University of Maryland at College Park, asked the students in that program (all of whom were given iPads at the beginning of the semester) if they'd ever left home in the morning toting their iPads but not their laptops. Only a third said they had. “I think the consensus among students is it is what it’s advertised as, which is a consumption device,” said Kirschenbaum. A useful one, he added, but not a miracle machine, and probably not a game-changer.
Librarians at the University of North Carolina at Greensboro, who loaned out iPads to 1,367 patrons (mostly undergraduates) this fall, reported that their borrowers found it “difficult to do extensive writing on iPads” and that the devices were “not a popular choice for paper-writing,” according to Kathryn Crowe, the associate dean for public services there. (Disturbingly, patrons frequently returned iPads with their e-mail, Facebook, or campus information accounts still open, Crowe said.)
A survey of 22 iPad users at George Fox revealed that the most popular academic uses of the devices were using e-mail, surfing the Web, and accessing the university’s learning-management system — all consumption-oriented activities.
“Most of the students had the Pages [word-processing] app and a note-taking app, but only about half of them said they were confident using the touch screen for typing,” noted Greg Smith, the chief information officer there, in an e-mail. “A common complaint was that they did not trust or like the way the iPad would auto-complete words.”
Meanwhile, top non-academic activities included browsing Facebook, playing games (especially Angry Birds), and watching free videos. Based on student feedback, about half of students seemed to treat the devices primarily as entertainment tools, added Smith. “My overall impression is that they all feel very fortunate to have an iPad,” he said, “but treat it as a luxury supplement to their computing needs.”
Students at various colleges did find the iPad useful for small-scale content creation, especially taking notes. Bill Handy, visiting assistant professor in the School of Media and Strategic Communications at Oklahoma State University, said he actually noticed more note-taking in his two business marketing courses this fall, when the university gave iPads to each of Handy’s 120 students. Handy, who admits that he tends to talk quickly in class, says his students often availed themselves of the iPad’s recording function. The popular note-taking app Evernote allows students to store typed and audio-recorded notes in the same file, he said.
Handy added that his students often chose to take tests on their iPads, even though one of his classes met in a computer lab with desktop computers close at hand. “Each student used it to their own needs,” he said. “Some students were using it more as a reader, some were using it to replace their current laptops” — in class, anyway.
As e-readers go, officials at Reed College said the iPad has been an improvement on Amazon’s Kindle DX, which last year faced criticism from students who found it difficult to digitally mark up texts. Not so with the iPad, wrote Trina Marmarelli, an instructional technologist there, in an e-mail.
“Students reported that the iPad was particularly useful for discussing texts in class, because they could quickly and easily navigate between multiple assigned readings and locate specific passages,” she said. “By contrast, students in our Kindle DX study last year found the same tasks to be much more cumbersome and time-consuming with the Kindle than they would have been with paper copies of the readings, and reported that class discussions became more superficial and less engaged with the texts as a result.”
Marmarelli said the Reed students used the iPad for much of their course readings — another changer from last year’s Kindle pilot, where they reported using the device primarily for pleasure. “Because the iPad offered the students efficient tools for annotating, highlighting, and organizing texts, and was more portable and less disruptive than a laptop computer, they were able to avoid printing hundreds or even thousands of pages of journal articles and other texts,” she said.
Portability and easy accessibility are probably the main points on which the iPad has notebook computers licked. And while the difference isn’t huge, it is not insignificant either. “It does seem more palpably accessible than opening up a laptop and waiting for it to wake up,” says Kirschenbaum. That makes the iPad an ideal tool for quick tasks such as checking e-mail or Twitter, or finding something quickly on the Web, he says.
The iPad might be the fastest-selling gadget ever, but it is still in the early stages of permeating college campuses. According to recent data from the Student Monitor, only about 7 percent of students at four-year colleges have e-readers, and only half of those are iPads. At the same time, Apple appears to be winning the hearts-and-minds game: 26 percent of students surveyed in October said the iPad is “in” on their campus (compared to 5 percent for the Kindle). About 16 percent of students who did not already own an e-reader said they were interested in buying an iPad.
For the latest technology news and opinion from Inside Higher Ed, follow @IHEtech on Twitter.

description.hltext_display: 国脚年龄修改问题频现 盘点国内足球部分年龄门
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
■1985年，谢育新等一批U16球员参加亚洲区域大型比赛，还被评为希望之星。然而，事实上谢育新将出生年份由1965年改成了1969年。
■1996年那届国奥队，队员刘越改小了5岁，是队中改年龄最多的队员。
■2000年那届国奥队，被寄予厚望的健力宝留洋一代球员，除了李金羽等极个别球员外，年龄普遍都改小了2岁。
■2000年，山东队队员郝伟对妻子使用暴力，在这次纠纷中，他的年龄问题成了一个焦点：出生年份先后出现从1973年到1977年的5个版本，整整横跨了一个奥运周期。
■2008年，央视新闻频道曾报道，鲁能球员周海滨在多次注册中，出生年份有1983年到1987年5个版本。

description.hltext_display: 足坛当红小生身陷年龄门 冯仁亮涉嫌年龄造假
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
申花小将冯仁亮涉嫌年龄造假？昨天这则新闻被曝后，记者打通球员本人电话询问此事，冯仁亮表示队里有纪律，不能随意接受采访。而申花方面和中国足协都表示，会尽快调查此事。
冯仁亮是申花前主帅布拉泽维奇点石成金的，不过老布入主国奥后，在他圈定的35人大名单里，居然没有这个得意弟子的名字，让人有些摸不着头脑。此外在今年中超“新人王”评选中，整个赛季有抢眼表现的冯仁亮却连评选资格都没有，这是为哪般？
在中国足协的官方秩序册上，冯仁亮的出生年龄为1989年1月8日，既符合国奥的年龄要求，也符合“新人王”的评选标准。而根据爆料，原来冯仁亮在火车头体协时，出生年份就从1988年改到了1989年，并且参加了第11届全运会。也就是说，他在来申花之前，已经改了年龄。有消息称，如果冯仁亮“年龄门”得到证实，申花连同火车头俱乐部将一并受罚。

description.hltext_display: 足协年终考核韦迪打头阵 人员或有调整明年竞聘
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
临近年底，中国足协新班子要进行考核过关。
昨天，记者从中国足协获悉，本周五足协将对中层以上领导进行年终考核。从足管中心主任韦迪开始，到各部门的中层领导都要宣读自己的总结报告，足协最终以“德、能、勤、技、廉”的标准来打出分数。
对于中国足球来说，2010年是不平静的一年，而对于足协的中层以上领导来说，他们中的大多数都是今年才进入足协工作的，能否打出满意的分数，也是为明年的竞聘工作打好基础。足协考核・对象
首次考核新班子韦迪带头发言
记者通过采访获悉，本周五的年终考核，首先进行总结的将是韦迪等四名足管中心高层，他们的陈述将由总局领导亲自把关和考核。
接下来将是足协的中层干部依次进行总结，顺序为：杨新利等新任的五名中层干部、刘殿秋等继任的处级干部、其他未担任部门主任的中层干部。
自从年初南勇、杨一民被捕之后，韦迪、于洪臣等人被总局调到足管中心，另有五名中层干部也陆续到足管中心担任要职。本周五的考核也是韦迪为首的领导班子首次接受个人工作考核。
据记者了解，上周，足协掌门人韦迪分别听取了七大部门主管对该部门一年来工作情况的汇报总结。
同时，各部门领导还简要陈述了新的工作计划，重新规划校园足球活动、完善职业联赛俱乐部准入标准等都在新年工作的规划中。
足协考核・内容
每个人总结8分钟 足协员工打分
本次考核的形式是，中层以上干部每人宣读自己的工作总结报告。“每人有8分钟，据目前了解的情况，就是我们这些干部的个人总结，而不是整个部门的总结。”职业发展与监管部主任刘殿秋对记者说。
在每个人的“8分钟”总结过后，足协员工会根据“德、能、勤、技、廉”的标准给每个人打分，从而得到最终分数。
足协考核・目的
人员或有调整明年准备竞聘
本周五的考核还有一个重要意义，那便是为即将到来的新一轮竞聘打下基础。
按照总局固有的轮岗计划，每四年就要进行一次中层干部竞聘，由于年终工作较多，原定于今年年底进行的竞聘，可能会延后到明年年初。
值得注意的是，今年4月空降足协的五名新中层干部若最终不能得到领导认可，极有可能将返回原单位，或被委派到总局其他单位任职。 文/特约记者王帆

description.hltext_display: 申花小将涉嫌改年龄或受罚 当事人称不知道缘由
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
本报讯（特约记者王帆）上海申花小将冯仁亮，涉嫌更改年龄。
昨天，上海媒体透露，冯仁亮无缘上赛季中超最佳新人事出有因。他被查出曾更改过年龄，因此以超龄为由错失最佳新人的奖项。
上赛季，冯仁亮从天津火车头加盟上海申花，注册的出生日期为1989年1月8日。而据上海媒体报道，他的出生年份应为1988年。
一旦更改年龄一事成为事实，冯仁亮将无法以适龄球员的身份征战明年的伦敦奥运会预选赛。
对于改年龄一事，冯仁亮称自己并不知道怎么回事。据悉，中国足协正在对此事进行核查。一旦属实，两家俱乐部及冯仁亮都可能受罚。

description.hltext_display: СК предложил уголовное наказание за нарушение прав дольщиков
Northern border drug control bill goes to President Obama
description.content:
BUFFALO — Governments at every level will be given six months to come up with a unified strategy to stanch the flow of illegal drugs across the nation’s long and mostly unguarded northern border.
A measure passed Tuesday by the House calls for the Office of National Drug Control Policy to lead the way in coming up with a way to blunt the growing movement of Ecstasy, heroin, cocaine and marijuana across the U.S.-Canadian border. The measure calls for ONDCP to work with the head of each relevant national drug control program agency and state, local, tribal, and international governments to develop strategy.
The Senate passed the measure Monday night.
Democratic Sens. Charles Schumer and Kirsten Gillibrand of New York, Republican Sen. Susan Collins of Maine and U.S. Rep. Bill Owens, D-N.Y., said the only way to patch smuggling holes along the porous, 4,000-mile-plus border is to work together.
Any strategy will have to delineate the roles of each national drug control agency, identify the specific resources it will take to implement the plan and focus on trafficking through Native Indian reservations.
In 2007, agents seized just a single kilogram of heroin and cocaine, compared with 18 kilograms of cocaine and 28 kilograms of heroin in 2009, U.S. Justice Department statistics show. There were 3,423 kilograms of marijuana confiscated last year, compared with 2,792 kilograms two years earlier. Far more of those drugs come across the southern border, but agents seize eight times the amount of the club drug Ecstasy up north than they do on the southern border.
Over the past five years, agents on the northern border have nabbed about 400 kilograms (880 pounds) of Ecstasy each year.

event_or_fact.property: the only way to patch smuggling holes along the porous, 4,000-mile-plus border is to work together

entity.property: head of each relevant national drug control program agency
Office of National Drug Control Policy

description.hltext_display: 新民晚报：选帅不是选秀
description.author: sohu.com

description.hltext_display: 新民晚报：国安选帅肥皂剧引发的思考
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
“国安选帅、下雪和治堵，哪个让你感觉最费劲？”这个问答题目前已经成了京城网络上的热门话题。能和北京堵车相提并论，足见国安选帅的超级纠结。昨天，当葡萄牙人帕切科最终答应执教国安的消息传来，听了太多次“狼来了”的国安高层已经变得十分谨慎。“一定要等他本人到北京签字了，这块石头才能落地。”
选帅渐欲迷人眼
山外青山楼外楼，国安换帅几时休？从9月底至今，“国安换帅连续剧”至今都没有上演大结局。
回顾一下这部肥皂剧的历程，可谓大牌云集――特鲁西埃、拉德科、多纳多尼、图拔、赵允焕、金学范、泽曼、维斯雷恩、吉马良斯、车范根，这些人都曾和国安发生过绯闻。其中，像吉马良斯、维斯雷恩等人，国安更是几次接触。只不过，两个月过去了，国安球迷的胃口被吊得几上几下，最后，这些大牌教头，统统成了浮云，一个也没能接近“御林军”。
如果说，这些大牌教头和国安擦肩而过还只是让人感到失望的话，葡萄牙人帕切科则让人产生的念头只有一个，煎熬。12月15日，人在北京的帕切科几乎已经和国安达成一致，后者甚至已经安排好了一个酒会，准备新帅亮相和签约。不料，帕切科突然爽约，以妻子病情加重为由，当了一回“落跑教头”。之后的十多天，国安方面可谓望穿秋水，苦苦等待。好在，帕切科昨天终于给了个回音，“我会回来的。”
为何被耍的总是我
一次酝酿已久的选帅，缘何成了一出肥皂剧，国安选帅对于中国其他俱乐部来说，值得借鉴和引以为戒的地方，实在太多。整个过程中，国安看似挑三拣四，到处留情，实际上用一位知情人士的话说，“一开始就没有明确的思路，以为撒个网出去，抓到什么鱼都行，你又不是曼联、巴萨，人家哪那么容易陪你玩？”
一个最典型的例子是，之前国安通过经纪人联系到吉马良斯。面对老谋深算、深谙谈判技巧的吉马良斯，国安表现犹如小学生，结果被哥斯达黎加人玩了个团团转。此君曾在半夜突然给国安发来一份传真，要求“在5分钟内给我答复”。等国安好不容易将回执发过去，吉马良斯干脆来了一句，“我已经和其他俱乐部签约了。”让国安高层气得连爆粗口。
对于国安的选帅闹剧，圈内一位资深经纪人表示，“国安这方面经验太欠缺，光知道等着经纪人介绍。往往是一棵树上吊死了之后，才会另想办法。实际上选帅必须要有针对性，按照要求圈定目标后，主动出击，这样把握要大很多。”他以申花去年选中老布为例，“ 朱骏不就是专门飞到欧洲去当面找的老布？很多时候，不要以为世界级名帅一定很难搞，关键看你怎么做。”
当然，这位经纪人也谈到了很重要的一点，目前中国足球在国际上的地位和影响力实在太低。“很多时候，中国俱乐部找上门，只是被人家当做和其他俱乐部谈判的筹码。中国足球水平太低，人家让你等等也很正常，到最后确实没人找了，再来中国也不迟。”

description.hltext_display: 外媒斥帕切科拜金或赴西亚 国安球迷态度令人忧
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
昨日，帕切科在葡萄牙通过传真完成了与国安的草签合同。由于此前帕切科曾因妻子病重中途离开过一次，北京国安并不安心这次草签合同。
更为让人担心的是，从整个谈判过程以及帕切科的所作所为来看，这位“新主帅”是位拜金男，他正在“货比三家”，选择目标显然是薪酬最优厚的俱乐部。所以，他会不会再次落跑让人担心。
另外，由于洋帅到位过晚，球队中心浮气躁的情绪日益蔓延。同时，球迷们对于国安选帅的关注热情，也已经大不如前。
国安选帅・外媒揭发
为什么拒绝克鲁日 帕切科要价太高
何时到北京没定，但帕切科不去罗马尼亚的克鲁日俱乐部已成定局。
今天凌晨，记者来连线了罗马尼亚媒体GSP的体育编辑安德烈。安德烈表示克鲁日的新教练将会在周四公之于众，不过这个人的名字绝不是帕切科。“前天，帕切科拒绝了克鲁日的邀请。”他说。
安德烈向记者透露，克鲁日给帕切科开出的年薪是25万欧元(约等于33万美元)，但帕切科的胃口很大，希望能在此基础上增加10万欧元。“克鲁日百分百不会和他签约了。”安德烈激动地说。
安德烈告诉记者，本来克鲁日老板帕斯卡尼和这位带给葡超博阿维斯塔队唯一冠军荣誉的教练谈得很高兴，就在距离成功最后几百米的地方终止了。昨天帕斯卡尼正式宣布了帕切科不来罗马尼亚的消息。

description.hltext_display: State to lose two seats in Congress
description.content:
NEW YORK — New York proudly calls itself the Empire State, but its national political influence continues to wane with the state slated to lose two congressional seats in 2012.
According to new figures released Tuesday from the 2010 census, New York’s current 29-member House delegation will drop to 27, its lowest level since 1823. Only one other state, Ohio, lost two districts in the 2010 count; no other state lost more than one and several states gained seats.
The Democratic-controlled Assembly and newly Republican-led state Senate are tasked with drawing the new congressional districts before the 2012 election, all but guaranteeing disagreement over the contours of the new map. Since 1980, legislative efforts to redraw districts in the state have all ended in an impasse, requiring federal and state courts to intervene.
This time, former New York City Mayor Ed Koch is spearheading an effort urging lawmakers to sign onto legislation creating a nonpartisan commission to draw district lines, which the Assembly and Senate would later ratify.
He’s secured promises of support from members of both parties, as well as incoming Democratic Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
In an interview, Koch said he expected lawmakers to make good on their pledges despite the shift of power in the Senate. He said the unexpected loss of two districts, rather than one as many had hoped, shouldn’t affect anyone’s view of creating a redistricting commission.
“It’s all about who’s honorable and who is dishonorable,” Koch told The Associated Press. “Some signed the pledges and will now try to weasel out. Those are the people I have to go after yelling ‘Liar liar, pants on fire.”’
The census found New York’s population grew just 2.1 percent since the 2000 count, less than half the pace of growth the state experienced through the 1990s. The fastest growing state, Nevada, saw a population increase of more than 35 percent over the past decade.
New York’s delegation is set to diminish just as Republican representation is growing in the state. Currently, just two of the state’s 29 House districts are held by the GOP but Republicans captured six more in last month’s midterm elections.
New York’s House delegation peaked just after the 1940 census, when it had 45 members. It has slowly declined since, with a precipitous drop of five seats after the 1980 census.
New York lost 3 seats after the 1990 count and 2 more after 2000.
As expected, the new census found states in the south and west gaining population faster than those in the northeast and industrial Midwest.
Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania are all slated to lose one seat apiece. Florida will gain 2 seats to have a 27-member delegation like New York.
Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington will each pick up one seat, and most other states will stay the same.
Texas is the biggest winner, picking up four new seats for a total of 36.

event_or_fact.property: he expected lawmakers to make good on their pledges despite the shift of power in the Senate
the unexpected loss of two districts, rather than one as many had hoped, shouldn?t affect anyone?s view of creating a redistricting commission

description.hltext_display: 国安新帅疑似“拜金男” 外国同行揭其货比三家
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
尽管帕切科基本确定将成为国安新帅，但这部选帅大片却并没有因此画上句号。
昨日，帕切科在葡萄牙通过传真完成了与国安的草签合同。由于此前帕切科曾因妻子病重中途离开过一次，北京国安并不安心这次草签合同。

国安选帅・
外媒揭发

今天凌晨，记者来连线了罗马尼亚媒体GSP的体育编辑安德烈。安德烈表示克鲁日的新教练将会在周四公之于众，不过这个人的名字绝不是帕切科。“前天，帕切科拒绝了克鲁日的邀请。”他说。
安德烈向记者透露，克鲁日给帕切科开出的年薪是25万欧元（约等于33万美元），但帕切科的胃口很大，希望能在此基础上增加10万欧元。“克鲁日百分百不会和他签约了。”安德烈激动地说。
安德烈告诉记者，本来克鲁日老板帕斯卡尼和这位带给葡超博阿维斯塔队唯一冠军荣誉的教练谈得很高兴，就在距离成功最后几百米的地方终止了。昨天帕斯卡尼正式宣布了帕切科不来罗马尼亚的消息。
罗马尼亚媒体愤怒 他伤害了克鲁日
罗马尼亚著名足球网站fotbal romania率先披露了帕切科不来的消息，标题极为醒目：《帕切科不来了！看看克鲁日还有什么选择！》。“帕切科和克鲁日的联系已经成为历史了！”文中遗憾地说。
另一家罗马尼亚媒体ziare在标题中写道：帕切科拒绝了克鲁日！该媒体一周以前还在报道帕切科和克鲁日的“结合”毫无悬念。
《克鲁日日报》干脆转嫁视线，没有在标题中提到帕切科离开的事情，直接说克鲁日将与另外一名教练谈判。与帕切科的谈判失败很显然给克鲁日俱乐部造成了“心理伤害”，该报称，俱乐部草拟与教练签订一个相关协议，防止再出现教练“临阵落跑”的情况。
罗马尼亚当地媒体《城市新闻》也对克鲁日不得不物色新的人选感到遗憾，文中提到，帕切科执教经验丰富，是克鲁日的第一人选。《城市新闻》还引用了俱乐部投资人帕斯卡尼的话：“帕切科是我们最青睐的人选，但是我们还和另外两名优秀的教练有着联系，马上就会有一个结果。我也希望在周三周四之前把这件事情搞定。”
下一站可能去西亚 待遇比北京好
从帕切科的行事方式来看，即便帕切科已经百分之百和克鲁日“分手”，国安这方面似乎也不能高枕无忧，因为还有可能生变。
罗马尼亚媒体fotbal roma-nia透露的帕切科的下一站并不是中国而是西亚。“由于不满意克鲁日方面提出的合同，葡萄牙人已经转而执教一个西亚国家去了。”文章如是说。
记者连线克罗地亚英文媒体《九点》也得到了这样的答案。《九点》体育记者赛尔邦说：“据消息源表示，帕切科不再是克鲁日的选择，因为这几天的时间里西亚国家的球队给他开出了更好的条件。”
看来精明的葡萄牙人在做正式决定前真的是“货比三家”啊。
国安选帅・
球队态度
俱乐部不安心 签正式合同再宣布
昨天，帕切科给国安俱乐部发来电子邮件，表示自己妻子的病情已经趋于稳定，如果不出现意外，将可以在下赛季执掌国安教鞭。
为了表达诚意，帕切科在之前双方草拟的工作合同上签字，并且发来了传真。与此同时，一直声称与帕切科联系紧密的罗马尼亚克鲁日俱乐部也公布了与葡萄牙人正式谈崩的消息。
对于帕切科草签合同一事，国安俱乐部目前还不打算公布这一消息。毕竟双方并没有正式签约，实际上帕切科与国安牵手仍旧还差最后一步。
据知情人介绍，帕切科最早将于圣诞节后抵达北京，完成正式的签约。
在之前的谈判中，国安俱乐部给帕切科开出了年薪80万美元的高价，这也是国安历史上价位第一高的主教练。很显然，克鲁日俱乐部开出的33万美元年薪难以满足帕切科的胃口。
尽管帕切科的表现反反复复，来自罗马尼亚的反馈也令人担心，但俱乐部仍表示相信他的人品。
今天一大早，本报记者到国安俱乐部求证帕切科与俱乐部签约一事是否已经确定。
总经理高潮证实了与帕切科确实“草签”了一份合同，他对记者说：“还没有完成最后的程序，只能说双方的意向已经有了实质性的进展。过几天等事情确定下来，我们会公布这个消息的。”
今天，一位工作人员对记者说：“我们也都关注着这件事儿呢，赶紧签了得了，事情总是有变化，签了就踏实了。”而当记者问到是否见到了所谓的“草签”合同传真件，几位工作人员均表示，并没有见到传真件，他们也都是听说而已。
国安选帅・
球员心思
球员没定心 新人选拔搁置太久
昨天，国安全队前往香河进行集训，在下午的训练结束之后，队员们通过网络得知了帕切科已经与俱乐部草签合同的消息。“真的确定是他了么？”“这次不会再有什么意外了吧。”队员们纷纷议论道。截止到昨天，球员们并没有接到俱乐部的官方通知，队员们仍旧不敢确定。
此前俱乐部一直表示包括自由球员续约、梯队球员选拔都要等到外教确定之后才能进行，甚至很多事情需要外教进行决策。
但目前的情况是，帕切科最早在圣诞节后到位，最晚将在明年启程前往昆明进行冬训时才与球队会合。
但事实上，即将成为自由球员的五名队员合同在12月31日就要到期。球队的“心浮”已经成为了现实，甚至有合同即将到期的球员发出了“外教不到就不谈了？别再这样拖着我们”的微词。
另外在年轻球员的选拔方面，从“89年龄组别”和“91年龄组别”两支梯队所挑选出的优秀球员需要经过主帅的最终确认才能进入一队。
能否参加球队的冬训事关年轻球员的前途，但对于他们的选拔却极有可能由于帕切科到位时间过晚而搁置。
国安选帅・
球迷支招
球迷挺担心 一定要拿到主动权
没有欢呼雀跃，没有热议街头，甚至在球迷论坛没有置顶帖。对于帕切科草签合同，国安球迷们表现出令人意外的冷静，甚至有点揪心。
在昨日帕切科与国安草签合同的消息公布之后，国安贴吧罕见的并没有出现任何的转帖，就连消息公布的帖子也没有出现在第一页，这和之前每每有国安主帅人选爆出，以及帕切科来京时球迷的热烈反应大相径庭。
贴吧中有一位名为“工体是我家”的球迷就草签合同做出了较为专业的解释：如果国安传真过去的合同上,注明了此传真件有等同于合同原件效力的字样,并且国安的法人代表(或相关人员)签了字、国安俱乐部盖了章，那么帕切科的签字和合同才是有效的。
记者随后也联系了几位相熟的球迷，他们均表示：不能让主动权掌握在一个外国教练的手里，俱乐部必须在合同中明确赛季中奖惩的规定，要不很难制约住这位疑似拜金的主教练。
本版文/记者杨阳曾耀莹
特约记者王帆
帕切科签约国安进程
12月14日 帕切科与北京国安谈判，同意执教
12月15日 在前往签约的路上，即将就任国安主帅的帕切科以妻子病发为由，离开北京
12月20日 罗马尼亚媒体报道帕切科将与克鲁日俱乐部签约
12月21日 罗马尼亚媒体报道由于年薪问题，帕切科与克鲁日俱乐部谈判失败，帕切科有意去西亚执教
12月21日 帕切科将合同传真给北京国安俱乐部，愿意签约，但未定来京日期

description.hltext_display: 变形金刚闯进广州车展 雪佛兰spark详解
Pretium Resources Closes IPO And Acquisition Of 2 Gold Projects
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Pretium Resources Inc. (PVG.TO) said Tuesday that it has closed its initial public offering of common shares and the acquisition of the Snowfield Project and Brucejack Project from Silver Standard Resources Inc.
Under the offering, Pretium issued 44.17 million common shares at a price of C$6.00 per share for gross proceeds to Pretium of C$265.02 million.
Pretium's common shares commenced trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange at the opening of trading today.
Pretium said it used C$215.02 million of the proceeds raised under the offering to fund the cash portion of the acquisition of the Snowfield Project and the Brucejack Project from Silver Standard.
The remaining net proceeds from the offering will be used to fund the prefeasibility engineering studies and continuing exploration of the Snowfield Project, the Brucejack Project or the combined project, defined as the Snowfield Project and Brucejack Project together, to fund the acquisition and exploration of other gold and precious metal projects and for general corporate purposes.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com
